choices: Jake, his 8-year-old brother
Julie, his 16-year-old sister
Karen, his girl friend from school, age 13
Andrew, his friend from school, age 15
Alex, 14-years-old, his best friend next door
1.content:
"Whoa! What's this?"

Tom found the dusty metal box all the way in the back of the attic, near the corner wall, buried under boxes of books, papers and magazines. He picked up the box and blew an inch of brown dust off of it, before he opened the weird, rectangular box.

Inside, there was a nice, red linen cloth wrapped around a 10-inch pieces of round wood. He picked up the wood, which was neatly laying in a groove, so that it wouldn't roll around the box. When he removed the cloth, he saw that the stick was a wand: It was round and black, and the end was painted red with a small jewel at the end, which was bright blue.

On the inside of the cloth were the words:

"Muscle Wand - Point At Anyone and This Person Will Gain Muscle"

Tom just stared at the wand with amazement.

"I gotta try this!" he said. He was tired of cleaning out the attic. He was all sweaty now, wearing just his shorts and sneakers. His chest was soaking wet and his face was drenched all over.

He put the wand back in the box and climbed down the ladder before taking the wand back to his room.

Who does he show it to? Does he try it out?
1.title: Tom finds the Wand of Wishes

choices: Jake grows a little more muscular
Jake Hulks out
Jake becomes a total muscle boy
Jake grows into a gymnast
Jake looks like he belongs at the Olympics
11.content:
Tom ran into his room and took the wand out of the box. Just as he was admiring the wand, Jake, his younger, 8-year-old brother walked in.

“Hey, Tom… Do you wanna play a video game?” his little bro asked.

Jake was about 4 foot 8 inches tall and he had short, spiky black hair and he was thin as a rail. Jacob was really smart and he loved to play soccer. Summer vacation had just started and Jake had already started complaining about being bored around the house.

The family had just purchased a new house, just a few blocks down the street, with a swimming pool and walking distance from a large recreational park. Tom was tasked with cleaning out the attic, and that was when he found the wand.

“What is that stick?” Jake wondered.

“It’s a wand! I found it in the attic!” Tom replied. “It’s supposed to cause muscle growth!”

“Does it work?” Jake wondered.

Tom just stared at his younger brother with a grin on his face. Then, he waved the wand and pointed the tip with the blue jewel at the end right at Jake.

Suddenly, a blue beam of light emitted from the tip of the wand, striking Jake in the chest!

BBBZZZZZZZZZZZZPPP!

“Hey! What the heck was that?” Jake gasped, as he took a step back. Obviously, he was startled by the sudden beam of light that struck him in the chest. It didn’t hurt, however, but it left an odd, tingling sensation in his body, specifically, all over his muscles!

“You okay?” Tom asked his little brother. “Did that hurt? Do you feel anything?”

“I… I… Uhh…” Jake moaned for a moment.

Tom just stared at him for a moment, until the most amazing thing happened to his little brother…
11.title: Jake, his 8-year-old brother

choices: ...his brother Tom
...his own reflection
The wand flew out of his hand and the beam hit both of them
111.content:
Tom watches as every muscle on Jake's thin, 8 year old frame rippled to life. The waves started small, but with each new wave, Jake's muscle crested higher and thicker. After just a few seconds, the short eight year old had the body of a well toned teenager. His shoulders widened. His arms thickened. Even his chest and legs balled up with new found strength.

Tom stood in amazement at his brother's slight but none-the-less dramatic transformation. Ten extra pounds on an eight year old was no small thing. Oddly, Jake just stared blankly at his brother. Hanging his arms wide at his sides, forcing veins to appear along each arm, Jake casually said, "So does that thing work or what?"

"What?" Tom didn't understand.

Jake steps closer. "Sure, the bolt of light was cool. But I thought you said it was going to make me bigger. I would love that. I just can't seem to add any more on."

Tom slowly realized what occurred. "The wand..." he whispered, staring at the jeweled tip.

"What about it?"

Tom stared intently at the wand before jolting his eyes back over to his brother. "The power of the wand changes reality AND muscle!"

"Huh? Now you lost me. It glowed for half a second and then stopped. It didn't even have sound effects."

"No, Jake. You don't get it." Tom pointed the wand back at Jake. "You're muscles DID grow---"

"No they didn't."

Continuing uninterpreted, "---AND your mind was altered so that... you wouldn't notice?"

Tom had lost his brilliant thought. "Sounds like a lame power to me. Why wouldn't you want to notice? I'D want to know if I had grown bigger."

Tom twirled the wand in his hand, lost in deep thought. In a zombie like state, he grabbed his brother's thickened bicep and pulled Jake to his closet door. Tom opened the door to revel a full length mirror attached to the other side.

"Tom, what are you doing. I get it. You're a clean freak."

Releasing Jake's arm, Tom continued thinking out-loud. "If no one noticed then you would never have to explain. I could use this wand on anyone, but no one would ever be suspicious if there was nothing to be suspicious of. Right?"

Jake stood dumbfounded and anxious. "You're asking me? What are you even babbling about? Come on, lets just play my game."

"But if I use it on myself, would I notice the change, or would I be changed with it? If HE used it on me," pointing the wand at Jake's reflection, "would I not notice then?"

Without thought, Tom flicked the wand at his own reflection. A short bolt of hot blue light leaped out of the jewel tipped wand, bounced off the mirror and hit Tom square in the chest.

Tom could feel the oddest tingling sensation massaging all of his muscles. With each pulse throughout his body, he felt his clothes tighten around him. His reflection was transforming. Muscles swelled from places they had never existed. His chest filled out, casting a deep shadow on his tightening stomach. His neck thickened and rose, straining the tight collar of his graphic tee.

In moments, the same growth that had changed his brother had also changed Tom with one difference...

"I remember!"

Jake was really confused now, and even a little agitated. "Remember what? Again. There was a flash of light and that was it!"

"And you DON'T remember."

"Don't what?!"

"Can't you see my muscles?" Instinctively fevered to prove his point, Tom grappled Jake's hand and shoved it onto his chest. "See!"

Jake tried to pull away, but his brother's strength was too much. "See what?! You've always been muscular. At least now I know what MY chest will feel like in a couple of years."

Tom could feel all of the pieces falling together. "Only the wand user knows anything has changed. Everyone else thinks that nothing happened."

Jake was actually envious of his older brother's size. Feeling the thickness of Tom's chest just reminded him of how young he was and how old Tom was. And more importantly, Jake had had enough of this. If the wand was so important to Tom...

Jake could see Tom falling back into his own thoughts. Tom's grip loosened on Jake's hand as well as the wand. With a sudden jerk, Jake pulled back from his brother, taking the wand with him.

"Enough Tom! Stop being crazy and lets just go play a game."

"Perfect!"

Jake heaved a sigh of relief. "Finally. I got our Halo 3 game all set up."

"If you fire the wand at me, then you will understand."

"Not again!" Jake face reddened. His new muscles flared. "I'll show you that all of this is so stupid! Then maybe you will stop being nuts!"

Jake flung his arm back and fired the power of the wand at...
111.title: The Power of the Wand

choices: Jake takes the wand and visits a friend of his
Tom takes the wand and visits a friend of his
Jake and Tom attend a family reunion and they bring the wand with them
1111.content:
Jake just got tired of hearing Tom talking about the wand. Did the stupid thing really work? After all, his big brother never could stop talking about it! So, Jake just flicked his wrist, while holding the wand in his right hand, and pointed the tip of the wand straight at his bigger, older brother.

A light blue beam of light then emitted from the tip of the wand and struck Tom in the chest!

“Hey! Whoa! Did… Did you see that?” Jake gasped.

“See what?” Tom asked.

“That light! It came from the wand and struck you in the… OH!” Jake said, as he suddenly noticed the change! Tom’s chest started to push outward more, due to the expanding muscle!

“What? What’s the matter?” Tom asked. Obviously, this time, Tom didn’t notice anything since he wasn’t the one holding the wand.

“Dang! Now I know why you couldn’t stop talking about this thing! It really works!” Jake grinned, as he looked down at the wand, which he was holding in his hand.

“Of course it works! I’ve been using it on you, bro!” Tom grinned, as he spread out his slightly muscular arms.

“I just zapped you with it, and it made you more muscular! Didn’t you notice?” Jake asked Tom.

“No? I’ve always been this way! You’re the one who’s more muscular, little bro!” Tom smiled.

“Am not! I’ve always been muscular!” Jake protested.

“Well, you can’t remember the changed I made to you because the wand alters reality…”

“Oh, really?” Jake pondered. “So… You’d never even notice if I made you bigger?”

“Nope!” Tom responded. “So, can I have my wand back?”

Jake handed the wand back to his slightly-more-muscular-bigger-brother.

“We should go and help out some of our friends who live down the street!” Jake suggested.

“Yeah… That’s an idea!”

“Can we take turns? One day, I’ll go out with the wand, and another day, you go out?” Jake asked.

“Sure!”

“Great! Who gets to go out first?” Jake asked.
1111.title: ...his brother Tom

choices: Jake spots another boy from school
Jake spots a girl from class
11111.content:
"Let me go first!" Jake said, taking the wand back from Tom, since he was more muscular.

Then Jake ran out the door and headed down the street towards Steve's house. Steve was a good friend of Jake's who lived like one block over from Jake and Tom's house. Jake easily ran the distance in less than a minute, thanks to his muscular legs. When he reached the house, he spotted Steve skating down the street in his Healey skate shoes.

"Hi Jake!" the friendly boy said, not thinking anything different of Jake's huge muscles.

"Hiya Steve!"

Steve skated over to Jake and came to a stop.

"What do you got there?"

"Oh this is my Harry Potter wand!" Jake lied. "I'm just playing with it!"

"Ohhh cool! Let me get my Harry Potter scarf!"

Steve started skating towards the front door of his house. As he skated, Jake pointed the wand at him.

A blue beam of light shot from the wand's tip and struck Steve in the back. For a moment, Steve was overcome by that tingling sensation, and he paused as he stood by the front door.

Steve closed his eyes and groaned as his muscles began to inflate, bulging to the point where his clothes began to fit really tight everywhere! His pectorals grew outwards and sideways, filling out his t-shirt completely. His biceps inflated to the size of large softballs! His stomach was now covered with rows and columns of mighty abdominal muscles like ridges on a washboard. His arms were held up by thick, wide lets while his neck grew thicker and wider as his shoulders expanded and his delts and traps grew.

Steve's legs grew longer, wider and deeper as layers upon layers of rock-hard muscles were added everywhere. His quads turned into pillars of steel while his calves inflated to the size of mighty soccer balls, while covered with thick veins.

"Uhhhh..." Steve groaned, as he was feeling overwhelmed by the amazing surge of physical strength that exploded throughout the muscles of his body. The skinny body had suddenly transformed into a young muscle god who was wearing skate shoes!

Steve walked in the house and quickly came out wearing his burgundy and gold colored scarf around his neck and above his broad shoulders.

"Hey! How do you like my scarf?"

Jake just smiled as he stared at the muscular boy! The wand had worked!"

"You look great, dude!"

Steve skated right up to him, with his bulging pecs almost bumping into Jake's own chest.

"Wanna hang out?"

"Yeah..."

Steve and Jake then walked down the street... Two happy, young muscle kids... While Jake was on the lookout for other kids to change with his wand of muscle growth...

Tom sighed when Jake took his wand. Tom sighed and said to himself 'Well, I could veto what Jake wishes. After all, IT is MY wand. I do wish that I can see what he is wishing.' So far, Tom was okay with Jake using it very briefly. But now Tom wanted the wand back. So Tom said I want the wand back NOW. Besides I wish also for Jake and Steve to forgot how they got their strength

The wand reappeared in Tom's hand... after all, The wand ONLY works for TOM and nobody else. When the wand reappeared in Tom's hand. Tom wondered what to wish for next.

He looked at a framed picture of his school's female volleyball team. Tom thought that they could use a boost in strength and skills. Yet Tom thought again and reconsidered just wishing for something smaller... Tom looked at his small pet dog-- Drake . It was a Fox Terrier that was undersized and rather sick from time to time.. Tom looked at both the photo and his devoted pet dog.

He could point the wand at the photo or at his dog.

111111222.title: **reader's choice**

choices: Jake wants more but has maxed out and shrinks
Jake wants to invite over his best friend Scott
Jake wants his brother Tom to grow
1112.content:
Everything felt in slow motion. A long bolt of hot blue light leapt out of the wand’s sapphire jewel. Tom and Jake both watched it sail right past Tom’s arm, strike the mirror and race back to the source. The electric stream enveloped Jake as it struck him powerfully in the chest. Immense waves of sensation overcame Jake’s little eight year old body.

It felt as if his whole body vibrated violently, even though he was standing perfectly still. Jake even dropped the wand at his feet. Every muscle swelled in a maelstrom. Jake’s body was quickly being overcome with huge, blistering muscles. Every vein in his body immediately rose to the surface of his taught, fair skin. Enormous cannons erupted where Jake’s thin arms once were. His sleeves ripped instantly. The veins could barely reach around the thick ripples of each and every tendon of muscle.

His chest ripped his shirt in half without any effort at all. As the enormous slabs of meat continued to swell, even his nipples, now rock solid, ripped through strands of the shirt as they were violently forced to point straight down.

Jake’s abdomen became an impenetrable wall of solid boulders. Each heaping rock neatly stacked one on top of the other, accented by an enormous V-shaped ravine on either hip. Pushing down through his legs, his pants were also defenseless against the onslaught of strength building up inside of the eight year old titan. His upper legs ripped his pants off as quickly as they could, exposing a field of smooth, fair skin thinly guarding a million threads of tightly wound bulges. Each legs shoved the other as they violently filled their own space. Even his calves dared to touch as each became an enormous diamond barely hanging off the back of each leg.

The final victims of this ruthless assault were Jake’s socks and tennis shoes. Even his feet had engorged in veins and muscle which mercilessly destroyed their cramp prison. Jake was completely bare, surrounded by shredded taters of cloth. Looking at him now, there were only two things that distinguished Jake from an Olympian God: his excessively boyish face and the fact that he was still only four feet, eight inches tall.

Jake stood in wonder at what had just occurred. He couldn’t speak, but he could feel. He felt the immense weight of his body pulse with god like strength even though he was standing still. Every flinch and twitch of his muscles brought about violent waves of strength he knew had no match on this earth. Every breath he took, heaved his enormous torso inches in the air before he finally released them. And one thing was now absolutely clear to Jake:

“YOU WERE RIGHT!”

Jake hadn’t meant to shout. He was just really, REALLY excited. His heart was racing faster and faster. It pounded with such force that Jake could hear it in his ears.

Tom merely stood still, staring blankly. Jake was shocked. “Didn’t you hear me Tom! You—were—RIGHT!”

Jake stood excited, arms open, pulsing with unbelievable size and strength. He was completely dumbfounded at Tom’s silence. Tom’s eyes slowly fell upon the wand near Jake’s feet. Tom saw right through the confetti of clothing that partially covered the wand.

Finally, after his long silence, Tom spoke softly, never taking his eyes off the wand. “So, who grew?”

“What?!”

Tom flinched. This time, he wasn’t looking at the wand. He was looking at his own feet. “I wasn’t holding the wand when it flashed. That means, whatever changed, only you know about it.”

Jake was speechless. Tom stepped closer, but even Jake noticed a new timidness that he had never seen before. “For as long as I can remember, I have always been thin. Then, just a few minutes ago, with the power of the wand, I grew myself slightly larger. I also remember growing you with the wand. But to be honest, I don’t know why I did. You have always been so much larger than me… so much larger than everyone… that I can’t imagine why I would want to give you even more size.”

“What are you saying Tom?! I just grew this big two seconds ago! Before this, I was even smaller than you.”

Tom grinned, but didn’t dare lift his eyes. “Really? So, it was you that grew this time? No wonder you couldn’t believe me. If I didn’t already know the truth of the wand, I wouldn’t believe you now.”

Tom forced himself one step closer. It was obviously difficult for him to get this close to Jake, but Jake still hadn’t figured out why. “As I said earlier, in my memories, you were always huge. I remember when you were two how you crushed every crayon in a 64 pack just by merely holding it. It frustrated you so much that the crayons were so fragile.

“I remember when you were five how you lost your temper and broke the dining table in half with one swing of your fist. I also remember a life time of doing everything you asked me to do for fear that the next thing you would break would be my neck.”

Jake’s eyes of excitement suddenly mellowed into wells of regret for a life he had never known. “I—I did all those things?”

Tom only nodded.

“But Tom. I’m not that person. I’m not the monster you remember. I’m just me. I remember a life whereI didn’t break the dining room table, I broke my arm when I fell out of a tree. You were the first person there when I screamed, and you stayed with me the entire time until the doctors forced you to go away.

“I remember a brother that always looked out for me even when I didn’t need looking after. I remember the best biggest brother in the whole world!”

Jake took one heavy step forward, his mighty feet pummeling the carpet. In an instant his enormous arms enveloped his big brother in the tightest embrace Tom had ever felt. Tom was surrounded by the thickest and most dense wall of muscle he had ever known. A lifetime a fear was washing away into tears, and it was all thanks to the wand.

Jake wanted to squeeze his brother as hard as he could. But even he knew that he could easily crush Tom with even an involuntary spasm. As he held his brother, Jake felt his chest moisten. Moments later, he could hear soft sobs. Tom’s head was cradled on Jake’s enormous shoulder’s, but the tears had trickled their way to his nipple, slowly dripped off to the ground.

“I believe you Jake. I believe you.”

Even Jake couldn’t help but get emotional. His eyes weld up. “And I believe YOU Tom.”

After an eternity in heartwarming silence, Jake released his brother. Tom held his head up higher than he ever had (in this reality) and looked down upon his enormous brother. “You really are enormous Jake.”

Tom reached out to touch Jake, but hesitated. “It’s ok Tom. I want you to feel how strong I am and know that I would never use it to hurt you.”

Tom finally planted his hand on Jake’s chest and was instantly stopped by it. Even without flexing, Jake’s muscles were hard as steel. Tom tried to push his fingers through but couldn’t budge a single tendon. “I can barely feel that.”

Jake was equally amazed at the size and strength under his control. Tom then grabbed Jake’s arm and tried to squeeze it. Even his veins didn’t budge. “You are so solid. It’s so incredible.”

Jake grinned. “Watch this. Keep holding my arm.”

Tom obeyed and gripped Jake’s arm as hard as he could. Jake could only feel a slight touch. Jake then slowly lifted his arm out to his side. The whole time, Jake could only hold on. He felt the muscle underneath reshape itself, but it was still hard as rock. Then finally, Jake flex his bicep and slowly curled it into a ball. Tom’s mouth dropped as his fingers were forced together by the expanding mound. He had even less of a grip on Jake’s arm than he did before.

“I never realized just how strong you are. I knew that you were. But now, I really REALLY know.”

Tom’ stood transfixed, holding onto Jake’s arm. Jake couldn’t help but think about the possibilities. What would they do next?
1112.title: Reflections

choices: Scott. He grows even bigger than Jake.
Tom. He gets bigger than Scott, but is still smaller than Jake.
11122.content:
Jake loved how much his brother admired him. With every pathetic squeeze, Jake grew in confidence. "Who else would like this?" he thought to himself. Then he had an idea.

“You know who would love this?”

“Who?”

“Scott!”

Tom continued to stare at and grip Jake’s arm, and Jake kept on flexing. Jake enjoyed the admiration of his brother a lot more than his fear. “The tall, blonde kid?”

“Yeah! And being huge will more than make up for the fact that he is two years older than me!”

“I always wondered why he was so much taller than you. But, of course, I never asked.”

Tom finally released Jake’s arm and Jake let it hang back at his side. “But maybe we should do something first?” Tom politely mentioned.

“What?”

Tom took a breath. “Your clothes.”

Up until this moment, neither of them had really thought about the fact that Jake was naked. His growth had been far more than mere eight year old clothes could contain. “You’re right!” Jake chimed in suddenly becoming self conscious. “And what would mom say?”

Tom sighed. “She wouldn’t say anything. Remember, you rule the school and the house in this reality.”
Jake widened his grin, suddenly becoming un-self conscious. “Really? I—RULE—the school?”

Tom nodded. “Who would dare oppose you? Anything you say pretty much happens, or so you have told me.”
“But Scott is still my best friend?”

“Well, yeah. You two have been close for over a year now. All I know is that you defended him from some bullies once and then you were best friends. A second grader befriending a fourth grader would have been weird if it hadn’t been you. And now, with him in the fifth grade, about to go to middle school… well, you haven’t been very happy about that.”

“That is so strange. The way I remember it, it was the other way around. Scott defended ME from some bullies and from then on, we were best friends.”

Tom stared incredulously at Jake. “Scott defended YOU?”

“Is that so hard to believe?”

Tom scanned Jake’s rippling body with his eyes. He gulped. “You must have been a lot smaller before.”

Jake nodded. “I was.”

“I still find that very hard to believe.”

“Well, believe it Tom. I was half your size before the wand. I actually remember thinking about how bad I wanted to be just as big as you are now before this all happened.”

Tom dropped his jaw. “No way!”

“Yeah! I couldn’t believe how tight your chest was and prayed to have a body half as good as yours when I got older.”

Tom smiled. “Really? You—YOU—were actually jealous of me?”

“Heck yeah I was! But let’s get Scott over here. If everyone is like you say, I am sure no one will mind.” Testing the waters, Jake added, “Even if I don’t ask mom?”

Tom nodded.

Jake was ecstatic! “Really! Man, I could get used to this!”

*****************

After a thorough search, Tom was able to find some clothes that barely fit Jake. He ripped the first three shirts before he finally got the last one on. It seemed, much to Tom’s disbelief, that none of Jake’s clothes were the right size. They were all sized for someone much smaller than Jake. “Maybe the wand only affects people’s minds, not stuff.”

Jake called Scott and he was more than happy to come over. What else would Scott rather do on a Saturday in May than hang out with Jake?

KNOCK. KNOCK. KNOCK.

Jake was still not used to walking around with his incredible size. He found it very difficult to keep his legs from scraping together. Also, he had trouble not plowing his feet into the floor with every step he took. When he gripped the door handle, Jake felt the metal crumple under his grip. “I’m going to have to be more careful.”

Opening the door, he revealed his best friend Scott on the other side. Standing about 6 inches taller than Jake at 5’2” he was an unusually tall fifth grader, but was still shorter than the 5’6” fourteen year old Tom.

“Hey Jake!”

“Scott!”

Jake threw his hand out for the handshake-hug and was very careful not to hurt Scott as he did so. Scott was obviously used to this and bended around Jake easily.

“So, what’s up Jake?” Scott asked, running his fingers back through his thick, blonde hair.

“Well, I’ve got something to show you.”

Jake led Scott to Tom’s bedroom, where Tom was waiting with the wand. “Hi, Tom. How are you?”

“Fine. Thanks Scott.”

Tom had always kept a cordial distance from Scott since he was Jake’s friend. “So what did you want to show me Jake?”

Jake gently griped Scott’s hand and Tom’s free hand. Looking up at his friend, Jake said, “Hang on tight. Tom has a theory.”

“What---?”

Before Scott could think of do anything else, Tom circled closer to Scott and flicked the wand directly at him at point blank range. Within seconds, Scott could feel a most curious tingling sensation rushing all over his muscles. Jake could feel Scott’s grip tighten some as the growth began to take effect. Scott had been incredibly thin and was now starting to quickly bulk up. In a matter of seconds, he had easily gained 20 pounds of muscle, giving him the look of a light weight wrestler.

Scott looked through his shaggy blonde hair and saw a miraculous transformation. “I’m ripped!”

“Well, sort of,” Jake grinned.

Jake didn’t let go, nor did Scott want to. “But how?”

Tom merely held the wand up. “You mean that?!” Scott said with amazement.

“Yeah. And better yet, we found a way for all of us to remember,” Jake smiled.

“What do you mean?” Scott asked.

“Long story short,” Tom chimed in, “We will want to be holding hands before we use the wand again.”

“I just can’t believe it. I mean, look at me! I have even more muscle than you Tom!”

“But no one compares to me,” Jake added going up on his tippy toes. This forced his calves to tighten even harder and grow even larger than they were at rest.

Scott did not need the reminder and was actually a little annoyed by it. “No one has ever compared to you.”

“Well, not exactly,” Jake added, standing flat footed again.

“What do you mean?”

Jake and Tom explained all of the events up to this point from their two perspectives. Scott was captivated and grew even more excited with the more he heard. “So that is how you have always been so big! I mean, so far as I can remember,” Scott concluded.

“And that is also why we have to hold hands when we use the wand,” Tom continued, “Only the wand user keeps a constant reality. That is extended to anyone touching the wand user at the time it’s used, it seems. Otherwise, your mind would have changed when you did and you would have never known what we did.”

Scott had just found jackpot. Tom found solace in the wand. Scott saw a potential for power. “Imagine all the possibilities. No more being pushed around. No more being unnoticed. No more being the little guy. I love you to death Jake, but I would love to be able to defend myself so much more. Go one and hit me with another bolt!”

“Are you sure?” Tom said, “ I mean, we don’t know how far this thing goes. For instance, we haven’t even found a shrinking switch yet. I can’t imagine what would happen if you were to grow uncontrollably.”

“I’ll take my chances!”

“Hold on a sec Scott. I know you’re excited. We all are.” Jake reaffirmed his grip on Scott. “But maybe we should listen to my brother. We should let him think more on this. I still have a Halo 3 game with my name on it. We could go play some while he figures out how to work the wand.”

Scott could not be swayed. He found his ticket to dominance. But obviously reasoning with Jake and Tom wasn’t going to work, so he tried a new strategy. “Fine.”

Jake released Scott and began walking for the door when he heard rustling behind him. Tom and Scott were struggling for the wand.

“Scott! What are you doing!?”

“Ending my life in mediocrity!”

Jake took one step closer but was too late. Somehow the wand was activated while they both struggled for it. Who had activated it and who was it going to hit? An incredible streak of light leapt from the tip of the wand and struck…
11122.title: Scott's Wish

choices: Tom fires the wand at his reflection and becomes even bigger than Jake and Scott
Tom take a gamble & fires at Jake & Scott, causing both to shrink back to normal
111221.content:
A streak of blue lightning struck Scott with a mighty force. Tom stumbled back with wand in hand, and Jake was hopelessly lost as his reality changed.

Scott could feel a swell of power churning stronger and stronger inside of him. Every limb violently rumbled as every muscle wrapped them tighter. His legs forced each other apart, each fighting for space under his tightening waist. His abs rippled harder and larger with eight distinct and growing bulges. His chest quickly thickened with a swelling force. Scott’s once oversized clothes were now barely hanging on for dear life. Several rips formed down the sides of his clothes, but no rip was quite enough to free his enormous physique from their tightening prison.

Scott was at least twice the size of Tom and was catching up to Jake. His arms thickened with unbelievable size. Two deep horseshoes formed on the backs of his arms and were only getting bigger. His biceps were no exception. Each muscle tried to suffocate the other as they grew larger under his tightening skin. Around his shoulders, bowling balls quickly became cannons. Every thread of muscle were thicker than guitar strings and rippled with the subtle force of a tidal wave.

The same went for his back and his neck. Both had flared so large, they left deep gashes in Scott’s shrinking t-shirt. On either side of his neck, two thickening cables ripped their way out of the thinning fabric. Every muscle on Scott’s body was unbelievably large. His skin stretched so tightly around each one that every ripping chord could be plainly seen. Scott was now a titan even greater than Jake. Standing at 5’2”, this ten year old was more than an Adonis, he was Zeus. Jake paled in comparison to Scott’s immense physique. By comparison, Tom was nothing more than a wisp of a boy, and could never match the manhood Scott now possessed.

Scott’s growth finally subsided. He stood still in the middle of Tom’s room. His heavy breaths were the only sounds to be heard. Tom stood ready, gripping the wand tightly. He didn’t know what was about to happen, but he was ready to do whatever was necessary.

Scott broke the silence with a forceful, although high pitched below. “Fine! Keep your stupid wand! Why would I even need it anyway? Who could ever hope to be a big as I am?”

Tom did not release his stance. Jake took a step forward. “No one ever has Scott. That’s why we’ve always been friends. We’re two of a kind. No one could ever hope to be as big as us.”

Jake stood next to Scott and both of them glowed with pride and arrogance. Tom knew instantly what had happened. “Did either of you see a flash of light from the wand?”

“Yeah. So?” Scott glared menacingly.

“Jake?”

“Yeah. What of it?”

Tom gave Jake a knowing stare, flexing his eyebrows up at his brother. It took Jake a moment to realize what Tom meant. “Oh! So, who changed?”

Tom flickered his eyes at Scott.

“No way!” Scott took personal offense to the suggestion.

“Yes. Scott. It was you.”

“That’s impossible!”

All of his muscle pulsed larger. His tan skin reddened and he trained his light blue eyes like a pair of snipers on Tom and his “precious wand.”

“You saw what it did before!” Tom attested with a forceful tone he had never used before.

“What did it do?!” Scott took a step forward, away from Jake.

“We held hands. You grew!” Tom took a step back.

“Like an inch!” Scott breathed heavier. “It barely even did a thing. And who can blame it. I am already the biggest person alive. Always have been.”

Tom nervously shook his head, taking another step back.

Scott stepped closer. “Always will be!”

In a flash, Scott commanded his titanic body into action. He raced for Tom with the force of a runaway train. Tom was frozen in fear. He was about to be annihilated!

Suddenly, Scott fell back and hit one knee on the floor. The whole ground shook. Jake had wrapped his arm around Scott’s neck. The two titans were in battle!

“I can’t hold him off for very long Tom! Whatever you’re going to do, you had better do it fast!”

Scott struggled to free himself from Jake’s head lock. “You think you can hold me! You’re nothing to me Jake! Get that! NOTHING!!”

Scott was clearly about to overpower Jake. His grip loosened. Tom quickly unfroze as the two behemoths fought. What was he going to do!?
111221.title: Scott Gets His Wish

choices: Scott and Jake
Himself (Tom)
1112212.content:
“Hurry it up Tom!”

Scott’s hands were like vice grips around Jake’s rippling forearms. Slowly, but surely, Scott was ripping Jake off of him.

Jake groaned with all of his strength. “Why—do you have—to be—such—an—ASSHOLE!”

Jake clearly had issues with this version of Scott, and Scott was almost free. His entire body engorged itself in blood. Deep shadows filled every crevice of his body, of which there were many. Even Scott’s lats flared with such a wing span that Jake was almost completely obscured.

Tom didn’t have much time left. He had to do something. “Maybe if I make Jake stronger, he can stop Scott.”
With a wave of his arm, he flung his forearm forward directly at Jake’s head. The blue jewel charged once more and shot a powerful blue bolt from its core. A hot sapphire streak raced towards Jake.

“NO!” Scott roared.

Scott burst free with a mighty swing of his arms. But before he could move another inch, the streak of light not only hit Jake, but Scott as well. They were both enveloped in the power of the wand.

“Oh no! What have I done!?” Tom was horrified.

But then a most unexpected thing occurred. “They’re—SHRINKING!”

Sure enough, both of their enormous bodies quickly began to deflate. All the power the wand had granted these two children was quickly being taken away by the same source. Scott’s body shriveled in-between the rips of his shirt. Jake finally looked more like a regular eight year old again. Within moments, the two were back to their original size. Scott was 5’2” and painfully thin, while Jake looked like a really tall eight year old kid.

“No, the wand is mine!”

“No mine!”

The two of them were still wrestling around, but something was different.

“Don’t worry Tom, I’ll rescue you!” Jake gleefully shouted as he trapped Scott into a scissor lock.

“Never you foul fiend! You could never hope to subdue me!” Scott smiled as he quickly turned the tables and put Jake in a head lock.

Tom took a HUGE sigh of relief as the scene unfolded. This was just a game to them now. Something for two friends to bond over. Only he seemed to remember the events as they had transpired moments ago. (And even he didn’t remember things the way they had originally been ever since Jake had fired the wand at himself a few hours ago.)

Scott struggled free from Jake’s clutches and ran for Tom. Tom flinched, but saw the enormous smile on Scott’s face. Scott hugged Jake moments before Jake did. Huffing and puffing, Scott proclaimed victory!

“See Jake? I made it to Tom first. You were no match for my awesome strength!”

Scott flexed his non-existent bicep to prove his innocent point. His arm was so tiny now, it fit inside one of the huge rips his former size had created.

“Someday Scott, you won’t be the biggest kid around and I will rub your face in it!”

Jake and Scott were dripping in sweat, their faces flushed with a deep red, while holding onto Tom with all their “might.” Jake and Scott swaddled themselves in a youthful innocence that Tom had never seen. They were genuine. They were happy, and none of them could have been happier.

“This time, we are going to do this the right way,” Tom smiled down to Jake and his friend.

In between huffs, Jake asked, “What do you mean?”

“Scott, take my hand.”

Scott quickly clutched Tom’s open palm. “And Jake, you take Scott’s hand.”

Jake did so. “And now what?”

“Just watch.” Tom grinned brightly.

Tom gripped the wand once more. With a playful flick of his wrist he transformed…
1112212.title: Maxed Out

choices: He grows a little bit bigger
He grows a lot bigger
11122121.content:
Tom flicked once at Scott and once at Jake. Each time, a short bolt of light leapt out of the wand and disappeared into the kid’s chest. In turn, both boys felt a wave a tingling and sensation grip their muscles. Each of them slowly swelled with muscle. Scott could feel muscle appear where none had been before, from his perspective. Jake felt the weight of new muscle hanging off his body.

After a few seconds of growth, both boys had tight athletic bodies. Their clothes were still loose, but underneath were tight six packs, supple curves and taught, tone muscle.

“Oh wow! Look at me Jake! I actually have muscle!”

Scott let go of Tom and Jake’s hands and did a double bicep flex. Even with the tattered shirt, it was an impressive pose. Balls of muscle quickly formed and stacked on top of Scott’s arms.

“Same here Scott. I’m cut!”

Jake was equally as excited. He pulled up his shirt, exposing a tight six pack. He flexed it and crunched forward, causing the cuts to go even deeper.

“We’re even bigger than middle schoolers!” Scott proclaimed, joining Jake with an equally impressive abs crunch.

“You think?” Jake asked unsure.

“Oh yeah! I saw them last week when we visited their school. Sure, they are taller than us, but I don’t remember seeing any of them with muscle. Not one!”

Jake let go of his shirt and nodded with satisfaction. “Cool! That means we’re probably the strongest kids as LES too!”

“Feel this!” Scott pushed his arms forward and tightened his chest. Two nice slabs of meat erupted up.

“Oh, cool!” Jake was instantly mesmerized, forgetting his own tightly muscled body and felt up Scott’s chest. “It’s so hard!”

“I know! I just can’t believe it. They feel so weird.”

After giving Scott’s chest a really good couple of squeezes, Jake invited Scott to do the same. “How about me?”

Jake flexed as hard as he could, shaking a little as he held it. Scott cupped Jake’s pecs in his hands and was equally amazed at how hard they were. “Wow Jake! And you’re only eight years old. I bet there never been an third grader with a chest like yours.”

“If they only knew,” Tom thought to himself. He decided to hang back as the boys continued to explore each other’s bodies.

“This thing is just getting in my way.” Jake threw off his oversized shirt, exposing a really tight, gymnast looking body.

Scott stopped in his tracks. “Jake, you ARE ripped.”

“Told you!”

“Well, two can play at that game.”

Scott quickly yanked off his own shirt reveling a slightly larger version of Jake’s tight physique. “You’re even bigger than I am!”

Jake was playfully envious and began rubbing his hands up and down Scott’s rippling six pack. “Told you so!”
“It doesn’t help that you are like twice as tall as me or two years older does it?” Jake slyly grinned.

Scott smiled brightly. “Nope! Not at all!”

Scott had gone back to a double bicep pose. Jake cupped either bicep with each hand. “Their even bigger than they look. I don’t think I can dent them at all.”

Jake tried to squeeze his fingers into Scott’s biceps, but they wouldn’t budge.

“How about me? Think you can dent my arm?”

Jake threw up his arm and gave it a hard flex. Even his face turned red. Scott cupped the muscle in his hand and gave it a hard squeeze. It only slightly gave under the pressure.

“Ah man! And I was hoping it was harder than yours!”

“Two year older remember!”

Tom finally decided to chime back in. “So, what do you guys think?”

Jake beamed at Tom with his impressive boyish face and body. “This is awesome!”

“Yeah, Tom. This is great!” Scott continued to flex various muscles, exploring his new body with awe.
“So what about you? Are you going to join us or what?” Jake asked bluntly.

Tom stuttered. “W-what do you mean?”

“Well, if that wand worked so well on us, I can only imagine what it would do for you!”

Scott immediately stopped flexing and chimed in excitedly. “Yeah! You’re a teenager! If kids like us can have muscles like these, I can only imagine what would happen to a teenager! Man, you’ve got to do it! Get big!”

“Yeah Tom, get really big! It’ll be awesome!”

Tom was shocked with their sudden interest in him. They weren't fighting or trying to kill each other for the wand. They actually wanted to see what it would be like for a more physically developed person to use the wand.

After much mental debate, Tom sighed. "Alright."

Both boys cheered and immediately locked hands with each other and Tom. All of them could feel the new strength Scott and Jake had. Their grips were considerably tighter than before. While they waited for Tom, they even got into a gripping war, trying to see who could squeeze harder.

As the kids wait, what does the teenager Tom decided to do?
11122121.title: Bulking Up

choices: Go search for clothes
Grow the kids more
111221211.content:
Tom sighed and went to the mirror, with the muscular kids in tow, and fired the wand at himself. When the light hit him is muscles grew, but not much. Each muscle grew enough to stand out, but compared to Scott and Jake he was still nowhere near as muscular. "Aww, you didn't even try!" groaned Jake with disappointment.

"Yeah I know, I think I've had enough muscle growth for today," explained Tom. "Tomorrow I'll try harder."

"Oh fine," replied Jake.

"Besides, you guys need some new clothes," Tom added, gesturing to their torn jeans.

"These are annoying anyways," replied Scott, stripping off the torn clothes, while Jake did the same, showing boxers that were strained around bulges that were large for their ages, and and muscular rears too. "You know Tom, if you're gonna be lazy than maybe we should see if we an get any bigger."

"Oh yeah! Will ya Tom?"

"I dunno, there's still the clothes problem."
111221211.title: He grows a little bit bigger

choices: Tom finds some new clothes at the house, and then they go to the park!
There's nothing at the house that really fits Tom. Let's go to the mall!
111221212.content:
Tom pulled the train of muscle kids along with him to his closet. “Where are we going?” Scott asked.

“His mirror! He’ll need it to get big. Right Tom?”

“That’s right Jake.”

Tom opened the closet door, exposing the full length mirror inside. The trio took a couple of steps back, and held each other’s hands tightly.

“Ouch,” Tom yelp feeling a sharp pain in his tender hand.

“Sorry Tom. I still don’t know my own strength.”

Scott loosened his grip, but was sure to hold on.

“Alright,” Tom breathed, lifting up the wand. “Let’s see what happens.”

With a flick of his arm and wrist, Tom fired the wand at his own reflection. A hot streak of blue glowing light erupted from the jeweled tip of the wand, bounced off the mirror and struck Tom in the chest.

Everyone held on tight as Tom’s transformation began. Scott could feel the tremors in Tom’s body through his hand. Tom’s grip was also tightening around Scott’s hand and the wand. Both boys were really excited to see what would happen next.

Tom had been wearing loose fitting clothes that gentle hugged the muscle he had. But now his muscles were quickly expanding beyond what his clothes were meant to contain. Tom’s feet dug further and further into the carpet as his body got heavier and heavier. His pants tried to constrict his expanding legs but quickly ripped down the seams. This exposed a light dusting of hair with fair skin holding back the flood gates of enraged muscle. All of them swelled together, shredding Tom’s pants to ribbons.

His shirt was no different. Tom’s neck and shoulders had ripped through the top part of the shirt. This exposed an intricate web of veins feeding Tom’s engorged muscles. His arms quickly swelled and split both sleeves in two. His biceps curled his growing forearms up his waist as they balled larger and stronger. Even a huge single vein had appeared on each bicep, fighting to find space under his tightening skin.

The final straw for Tom’s shirt was his back and chest. In the front, Tom’s enormous pecs swelled to the point of ripping the front in half straight down from the neck. In back, an elaborate system of hills and valleys pulled the rest of the shirt apart. Every muscle pulsed with size and strength unlike the boys had ever remembered and Tom had quickly become a junior Mr. Olympia. Tom was huge, that was for sure. But with a 5’6” frame, surely a bit more muscle would fit on his long bones.

Tom’s growth finally halted, leaving him in tattered pants and no shirt at all. “You are an animal!” Scott cheered.
Tom finally took a look at his reflect and was shocked by it. “Is that—me?”

“Heck yeah it’s you brother!” Jake smiled. “And look at you! You are so big!”

“He’s huge Jake! He’s huger than huge!” Scott had let go of Tom’s hand and was now running his hand along some thick veins in Tom’s forearm. “These are so sick!”

“What is?” Jake called out excitedly.

“All of these veins in his arm. They are almost as big as his muscles.”

“Do they move?!” Jake exclaimed running his hand along Tom’s other arm.

Scott gave Tom’s huge forearm a squeeze. “Holy crap! They barely moved at all and his muscles didn’t budge an inch!”

“Let me try!” Jake squeezed Tom’s forearm with both hands with all of his might. Tom could barely feel it.

“Nothing! He must be the strongest person ever!”

Both boys continued to run their hands up Tom’s arms until they reach his biceps. “Look at that one!” Scott exclaimed, point at an enormous vein on Tom’s bicep. “This vein is absolutely huge!”

“And his arm won’t budge either!” Jake was repeatedly squeezing Tom’s arm, but couldn’t make a dent. “You’re not flexing are you Tom.”

Tom grinned and looked down at his little brother. “Like this?”

Suddenly Tom lifted his arm in the air and gave it a huge flex. Jake hadn’t let go and was pulled in the air along with it. Dangling in the air, Jake exclaimed, “It got even bigger! I could feel it growing under my hands!”
Tom was really enjoying this. “Do me next!” Scott grabbed on to Tom’s other arm and held on tight.

“I don’t know if I can lift both of you?” Tom actually didn’t know the strength he possessed.

“Sure you can!” Scott reassured him. “You’re still holding your brother up and haven’t even broken a sweat.”

It was true. Tom knew he was still flexing and holding up his brother, but he didn’t feel all that heavy to Tom.

“Alright, here it goes.” Tom lifted his arm in the air and sure enough he was able to get Scott off the ground. He was clearly heavier than Jake was, but nothing that Tom’s new body couldn’t handle. In order to dangled from Tom’s arm, Scott crunched his legs up into his chest. Even though he was a lot smaller than Tom, Scott’s muscle flexing was still impressive.

“This IS amazing! I can barely feel either of you at all.”

“See, told you!” Scott cheered.

“Yeah, told you!” Jake added.

Both boys began to swing back and forth. It must have been because they both spontaneously started at the same time, but somehow Tom lost his footing and feel backwards to the ground with a tremendous THUD.

“Didn’t expect that,” Tom said.

“Did it hurt?” Scott asked, laying beside him.

“Yeah, did it hurt?”

Tom began to laugh. “Not at all! I think the ground got hurt more than I did.”

Both boys giggled with Tom, and the sudden fall hadn’t stopped their exploration of Tom’s humongous body.

“Look at this!” Jake suddenly exclaimed.

“What?” Scott asked.

Both boys laid their head on Tom’s incredibly hard eight pack and were staring up at the underside of Tom’s pecs. “Even when he’s laying down, they are still like a foot off his body!”

Scott poked into the deep crevasse between the cleft of Tom’s pec and his stomach. “And it’s so deep too!”

Scott was able to crunch all of his fingers into the cleft of Tom’s pecs. “Look Jake, their eating my hand!”

Jake giggled. “Oh no! I’ll save you.”

But instead of helping to rescue Scott’s lost hand, he started pushing down on Tom’s lower chest. Still they didn’t budge. “Can you feel that?”

“Who me?” Tom laughed.

“Both of you!” Jake was really getting in to it. He kept pumping his hands up and down right on Tom’s left nipple, trying to my his chest cave in under his strength.

“Not me!” Scott replied, freeing his own hand from captivity.

“I do,” Tom said.

“Does it hurt?”

Tom breathed in, pushing Jake and Scott several inches in the air. “Whoa! Warn us before you do that!” Scott joked, now interested in exploring each brick of his abs.

“Sorry,” Tom chuckled, “Actually, Jake it feels good. It’s like you’re massaging me.”

“What’s a mas-age?”

“That’s massage. That’s when you rub someone’s muscles and make them feel better.”

“And I’m good at it?” Jake asked innocently.

Tom moaned. “Yeah. You’re good at it.”

Jake got a very determined look on his face. “Then this is going to be the best massage you have ever had!” Jake quickly went to work on Tom’s enormous chest. Tom’s chest was finally loosening up a bit, the walls of meat had softened just enough for Jake to bend them slightly under the pressure of his hand. Tom particularly enjoyed it when Jake grabbed the cleft of his chest and rubbed both sides.

It only took a few minutes for Jake to wear himself out. “My arms hurt!”

“Massages can do that Jake.”

Tom rolled up off the floor and imposingly towered above the two boys. “You’re muscles are amazing Tom!” Scott said.

“Thanks."

Scott suddenly snapped his fingers and got a bright smile on his face. "I've got an idea!"

“What is it?” Jake asked.

“I think we should go out and use the wand on somebody else."

"Who?" Tom asked.

"I dunno. Anyone I guess. We could even go showing off our new muscles."

“That sounds cool!" Jake exclaimed. "Maybe we can go to the park or the mall. I’m sure we’ll find someone we know there."

“All true. But remember, to everyone else, we have always looked like this. That means that the people out there may not act the same as we remember them.”

Realization of Tom’s words slowly sank into Scott and Jake. "Like mom," Jake whispered.

Tom nodded.

Continuing from Tom's previous thought, Scott concluded, "Since they weren’t holding the wand, they will think that we have always been this muscular,” Scott said.

“Right,” Tom agreed.

“Yeah. And they will think that you have always been a giant Tom!” Jake explained excitedly. “Tom, my giant brother!”

Tom couldn’t help but grin. “First, I need to find some more clothes, so my vote would be the mall. But what do you guys want to do?"
111221212.title: Tom Gets Huge

choices: They walk to the bus stop at the end of the street.
They go to the subway station two blocks over.
1112212122.content:
“And don’t forget about the two of you,” Tom said pointing at Jake and Scott. “Your clothes have about had it.”

Jake and Scott hadn’t really thought about the fact that their clothes were more like rags. From all of the growing earlier, Jake and Scott’s clothes had been ripped beyond repair. “I guess you’re right Tom,” Scott agreed.

“Yeah, and that’s why we took off our shirts in the first place,” Jake beamed, flexing his arms in a double bicep pose.

Tom chuckled. “No, you took off your clothes to show off, just like you are doing now.”

Tom flexed his arms into a double bicep pose, putting Jake’s eight year old, tightly muscled body to shame. “That’s no fair!” Jake cried, “You’re a teenager! You’re always going to be bigger than us!”

Tom knowingly thought otherwise. Scott chimed in, “So, where do we need to look for clothes?”

“Jake will probably have enough clothes to fit the two of you. Even you Scott, I’ve already given Jake some hand-me-downs when I cleared out my room a while back. And if they don’t fit, I am sure I have something in my room that will fit you Scott.”

“And what about you?” Jake asked.

Tom breathed in heavily, expanding his already enormous chest outward. “That’s a good question. I’m sure I will think of something.”

Jake nodded. “Come on Scott, let’s find some new threads!”

Scott laughed, “You’re not a gangster Jake.”

“I thought it sounded cool.”

Scott shook his head in laughter as they went to Jake’s room. Tom kept the wand close at hand and began searching his room top to bottom for some clothes that would at least fit long enough to leave the house. As he moved around the room, Tom marveled at the way his new body felt. It was heavy and thick, rippling with strength.

He tried to carefully open a draw full of shirts just to fling it right off the rolling tracks.

THUD

Tom looked back at the shattered draw. “Cheap wood,” he blamed the drawer. “I’m going to have to be more careful.”

As he walked over to the draw, which had flown a good five feet in the air before crashing to the carpet, Tom stopped a moment to feel his own muscles. Jake and Scott had practically explored every inch with their curiosity, but not Tom. “These muscles are so hard.”

Tom shook his leg, forcing the ribbons of his pants to sway like a hula skirt. Then suddenly, he stopped his leg and flexed it hard. Immediately, huge chords of muscle rippled to life and swelled twice as large as they had been moments before. “That’s so cool.”

He gently caressed his own leg, feeling every ridge and valley with his fingers. Short wispy hairs tickled his fingers, but the overall smoothness of his skin reminded him of cold steel. He truly was the strongest teenager ever, at least, in his mind.

As Tom continued to explore his new body and desperately try to find clothes to fit him, Jake and Scott were having more success. “How about this one?” Scott held up a plain white t-shirt.

“No,” Jake rebuked, throwing Scott’s selection back into the drawer. “We’ve got to find the perfect clothes. We’re muscle boys now. So, we’ve got to look the part.”

Scott smiled and nodded in agreement. “Yeah. We are muscle boys now, aren’t we.” He couldn’t help but flex his six pack for the millionth time. “They just look so awesome!”

Suddenly, Jake shouted with joy! “Ah-ha! I knew they were in here!”

“What?” Scott tried to see what Jake had found, but Jake purposefully blocked his view.

“About a year ago, Tom got into this superhero kick and started watching a lot of comic shows.”

“I thought YOU did that,” Scott jokingly accused, raising a single eyebrow at his suspicious friend.

Jake looked up with fake disgust on his face. “And who do you think got him into it!?”

Both boys laughed and Jake continued. “Anyway, we both got shirts with different hero logos on them—Yes!”
Jake interrupted himself, finally finding the “gold” he was looking for. He quickly pulled out a pair of shirts. The larger one was red with a faded gold lightning bolt on the front, the other had an odd looking hourglass shape on green cloth. “The flash and green lantern!”

Jake nodded excitedly. “Yep! Here you go Flash!”

Scott quickly slipped the tight red shirt on. Pulling it over his rippling six pack, he flexed his arms back and forth, getting a feel for the shirt. “It fits really good! It’s tight, but doesn’t feel like its going to rip.”

It was true. Scott’s muscles were clearly accented under the shirt. Even the lightning bolt logo followed the deep contours of Scott’s thick chest. “Oh cool! You’ve got them too!” Jake stared in amazement at Scott’s arms.

The sleeves were tight enough around his arms to force a single thick vein to the surface on either bicep. Scott looked down, saw, and was very pleased. “Sweet! And now you.”

Jake pulled the smaller green shirt over his head and had the same luck that Scott did. “It’s perfect!”

Jake’s muscles were perfectly accented by the faded green shirt. “Now we just need to find some new pants.”

In time, all of the boys found something to wear. Jake and Scott made it to the living room first. Jake had found some tight khaki’s to wear, while Scott had taken a pair of black and red board shorts that were about a size too small for him. His legs teased the fabric with their strength, constantly threatening to snap a thread.

“Tom! We’re waiting on you!” Jake shouted.

Finally Tom emerged from his room. Tom look much like a smaller Arnold Swartzenager from the Terminator series as he ominously stepped from the shadows of the hallway into the pale light of the living room. His threatening moves were immediately defused when Jake and Scott got a good look at him, laughing hysterically.

“What?!” Tom asked apprehensively.

“Those clothes are so small on you!” Jake bellowed.

One of the sleeves on Tom’s faded royal blue shirt had already ripped. It didn’t even cover his stomach all the way, exposing the bottom row of abs when he moved. His light khaki shorts were in no better shape. Even his sandals seemed to be struggling to hold his feet.

“That is so awesome!” Scott cried out suddenly, pointing at Tom’s chest.

Jake finally noticed what Scott saw. “We match!”

Jake and Scott immediately pointed at their own chests. Tom grinned. “How funny.”

“Green lantern,“ Jake said, pointing at himself.

“The Flash—“ Scott added, doing the same.

“—and Superboy,” Jake quickly spitted out, laughing.

Tom tried to stare down meanly at Jake, but couldn’t do it convincingly. Tom then finally corrected with, “Super-MAN.”

“Oooooo!” Jake shuttered with overdramatized fear. “I thought you didn’t keep any of the superhero shirts.”

“Well, I guess I did.”

“We’re like the Wonder Twins or something.” Scott added, trying to be cleaver.

“But there’s three of us. So maybe we’re the Wonder Trio then?” Jake added, still laughing a bit.

“I think we can skip the cute names. We’re three muscle guys, about to hit the scene.”

Scott and Jake really liked the sound of that.“Are those clothes going to work Tom?” Scott asked, noticing the first of what would soon be many rips.

“Um, no. That’s why we’re going to the Mall first. I am going to have to get some new clothes before I burst out of these.”

“Maybe you should have grabbed a Hulk shirt,” Jake laughed, ribbing Scott on his side.

“Very funny. Come on, we can take the subway or the bus. I’m sure we will meet some interesting people on the way. And who knows—“

Tom gentle waved the wand with his fingertips. “Maybe we can make some—changes.”

Jake, Scott and Tom smiled in agreement finally set out for the mall.
1112212122.title: Looking for Clothes

choices: The little kid laying in the yard
The chubby older kid hiding in the bush
11122121222.content:
“And you’re sure you didn’t need to call your mom or something?” Tom asked, trying briefly to act responsible.

“Nope. She knows I’m with Jake and I’m sure being with you will make up for leaving the house and going to the mall.”

“Oh, so it’s ok if I get in trouble?” Tom said sarcasticly.

“Yep! That’s what he have you around for!” Jake interrupted for Scott.

The trio casual sauntered down the sidewalk towards the end of their neighborhood. The day was bright and bathing them in sunlight. All of the grass and trees were brilliant shades of green, filling this quiet upscale suburb with life.

Taking a running leap, Jake jumped up onto his brother’s back. Tom quickly reacted, holding his brother up by the legs.

RIIIIIIP!

“See what you did?” Tom said, looking over his shoulder to Jake.

“It’s not my fault you’re huge. You’re the one with the wand,” Jake smiled, gently holding his arms around his brother’s thick neck.

“And it’s hard to hold it with you on my back. What if it snaps or something?”

“I’ll hold it then,” Scott offered.

Tom passed the wand to Scott, making sure not to let go of his brother.

“You’re back is REALLY bumpy!”

Tom laughed. “What were you expecting?”

Jake shrugged. “I dunno. I never really thought about it.”

“Just like with everything else,” Tom joked.

“Hey now! I could hurt you right now!” Jake smiled.

“Oh yeah, big man. How?”

“Like this!” Jake tried to squeeze his arms harder around Tom’s neck. All of his muscles tightened and swelled as he struggled.

Tom waited for the pain, but nothing happened. He could feel the tightness around his traps, but nothing more. He laughed. “You’re going to have to try harder than that little man!”

Tom tightened his grip around Jake’s calves. Jake felt it instantly, “Ow! Alright, I give! No need to get tough.”

“That’s what you get for ripping my shirt. Speaking of, we had better hurry. I am pretty sure the mall has a ‘no shirt-no service’ policy.”

Jake laid his head on one of Tom's immense, cannon ball shoulders. “I’m sure they won’t stop YOU.”

As they reached the end of their street they saw another pair of dark skinned brothers playing out in the front yard. A small child was laid out in the middle of the lawn, counting to a hundred in a most peculiar way as his older brother hid behind a bush.

"Where are THEY from?" Jake asked, noting their dark hair and skin.

"Pacific Islanders maybe?"

After a long silence from Jake and Scott, Tom rephrased. "Hawaiian?"

"See! Why couldn't you say it like that?"

Tom smiled. "I thought I did."

“And how old do you think they are?” Jake asked the group.

“I think the little one is five or six,” Scott said.

“And the older looks a little younger than me, so maybe twelve.”

“The older brother looks fat,” Jake said bluntly.

“Jake,” Tom reprimanded.

“Well, it’s true! Look at him!”

Jake may have not said it very tactfully, but he was being honest. The older brother looked to be about twenty pounds overweight. Thick rolls of fat bulged his huge polo in all directions. “Even the little kid is chubby,” Scott noted.

“You thinking what I’m thinking?” Jake said, giving Tom’s rippling sides a joyful squeeze with his legs.

“Yep. How about you Scott?”

Scott grips Jake’s leg and Tom’s hand with his free one. “Already on it.”

This was the first time Scott was going to use the wand. Who should he use it on first?
11122121222.title: As they left the neighborhood...

choices: ...the super tall, emo kid.
...a pair of chatty teenage girls.
111221212222.content:
Scott had made his decision. “Bigger brother needs to stay the bigger brother.”

He pointed the wand directly at the older boy hiding in the bush. Scott couldn’t be sure, but he looked to be about a two inches taller than him, making the older kid about 5’4”. He pointed the wooden wand at the guy and gave his wrist a flick. Unlike Tom, he didn’t pull the wand back, he just held it out.

The wand's power focused upon this boy and quickly showered him in a bath of light.

“What’s going on?” Tom whispered to Scott.

“I don’t know? I’ve never used the wand before? What am I doing differently?”

“Look!” Jake interrupted, pointing at the boy in the bushes.

The boy had been hiding in the shade of a tree. However, as the light of the wand showered him, it made the boy glow and highlighted every bend in his body. The boy’s muscles quickly reacted and began to swell with awesome size. His polo quickly reformed around the melting fat and instead was being forced apart by swelling muscle.

His legs and arms thickened with thick chords of muscle, as did his back and chest. In moments, he looked as big as Tom and was still growing. This once fat boy was quickly becoming the next Mr. Universe and was completely unaware that anything had happened.

As the wand continued to bath his muscles with its power, another interesting thing occurred. “Scott, stop, he’s shrinking!” Tom noticed.

Scott pulled back on the wand, ending the shower of light. The boy behind the bush stopped shrinking almost instantly. He was defiantly more muscled than he had been when they started, but he was much smaller now than he had just been.

“96… 87... 100!” The little boy cried. “Ready or not, here I come.”

The little boy lept up and ran straight for his older brother. “Found you!”

“Ah, you must have cheated,” his older brother shouted back with a thick voice, jumping back from his hiding spot.

As he ran into the light, the trio could see just how large he had become. His pink polo was tightly strung across his chest. He now had a thick set of arms in a pair of loosened sleeves. And his legs rippled in every direction as he playfully ran from his tiny brother.

They continued their game, unaware that anything had happened. But the recent episode had given Jake, Tom and Scott something to think about. They continued walking towards the subway station.

“What did you do Scott?” Jake asked, still hanging off his brother’s enormous back.

“I don’t know. I pointed the wand just like you did Tom, but this time it wasn’t just a bolt of light. It was more like a showering rainbow.”

“Did you pull your arm back after you flicked it?”

Scott thought back on the event, then looked down at the wand. “No. I don’t think I did. I just held it out like they do in the movies.”

“Then maybe that was it.”

“What was it,” Jake asked.

“If you only flick the wand, it comes out in bolts. If you flick and hold the wand out, it comes out as more of a shower.”

“But did you see what happened to the big guy?” Scott asked Tom.

“Yeah. He got really huge there for a second. He was almost bigger than me. But then suddenly, he started to slowly shrink back down.”

"Almost?" Jake asked accusingly.

"He was huge, alright." Tom acquiesced.

His sudden shrinking stumped Scott and Jake. It took Tom a few moments longer to put the pieces together. “I got it!”

“Great! Because I had no clue! And let me down, my body hurts from rubbing on your muscles so much!”

Tom grinned and released his brother. Jake walked in between Scott and Tom, rubbing his chest tightly. “I think every person has their max. There is a limit to how much muscle their body can hold. After they reach that limit, if you fire the wand at them again, they will shrink, instead of grow.”

“So, when do they stop shrinking?” Scott asked.

Tom remembered Scott and Jake back in the bedroom when they were fighting. “When they get back to their original size.”

“That makes sense!” Jake chimed in excitedly.

Tom tilted his head at his brother. “Really?”

Jake giggled. “Well, some of it. I think I understand the shrinking and growing part. As for the rest, I will leave that to you and Scott.”

“I get it,” Scott said.

“See?” Jake submitted.

“Good. And now we know. The wand does have limits, and it even has a safety feature from making people too large.”

“Is there really such a thing Tom?”

“Yes, Jake. Imagine getting so big that you couldn’t even move. Or having an arm so large that you couldn’t even lift it.”

“But your muscles are huge!” Jake squeezed Tom’s arm and didn’t even make a dent.

“I know. But my body can handle muscle this big. Imagine if your muscles were literally as big as mine. You wouldn’t be able to scratch your own back, let alone move.”

“Can YOU scratch your own back,” Jake replied childishly.

Tom reached his arm behind his head and tried to force it down with no success. As his muscles bulged and tried to obey his commands, all he got for his trouble was another—

RIIIIP!

Jake laughed. “Well, you get my point,” Tom concluded, hanging his arm back at his side.

“I get it Tom,” Scott added, “Just because your stupid brother doesn’t—“

“I’m not stupid!”

The two of them immediately erupted into a wrestling match. Jake threw his shoulder into Scott’s gut, forcing his back flat on the grass. Scott quickly rolled out of it and pinned Jake on his stomach, twisting his arm back. All of this, with the wand still in hand.

“Guy, this is not the time. We are in the middle of the city, only a block away from the subway and I think one or two more good rips will do in my shirt.”

Eventually, the boys listened to reason. As they approached the subway, they started passing a lot of people. So many choices of which to use the wand.

“We can get on any of these cars. Did you guys have a preference?” Tom asked.

Scott answered. “Yeah let’s follow…”
111221212222.title: Shower of Light

choices: The oblivious emo teen
The unsuspecting father
1112212122221.content:
“Who Scott?” Tom asked.

“Him.” Scott pointing his finger directly ahead.

Through the sea of people in the crowded terminal, Jake and Tom immediately knew who Scott was pointing at. About ten feet away was a older teen well over six feet tall dressed in chains and black. Long, straightened black hair mostly obscured his pale white face which was accented with thick black makeup. A thick choker collar with spikes hid beneath his locks, tightly wrapped around his neck. His over sized, all black t-shirt features an enormous burning skull. Each wiry arm was thickly decorated with every manner of dark jewelry similar to his spiky collar. His long black jeans, however, were skin tight, making it look like he stood on two pencils. And long, thick chains connected his belt to his neatly polished boots.

Jake gulped. “That’s quite a—a guy.”

Tom looked down at his brother. “Nervous big man?”

Jake furiously shook his head. “Um, no!” His shaky voice was unconvincing.

“Well, you know what they say,” Tom began, “Their bark is often worse than their bite.”

Jake gripped his brother’s hand. “I’ve never heard that before.”

Tom gave a reassuring squeeze. “I promise. It’s true. Besides, he’s no match for us.”

Jake made a reaffirming nod and stared intently at their new subject. “Right.”

“And you’re sure this is the guy you want us to follow, Scott?” Tom asked.

“Oh yeah. It’ll be perfect. Obviously a guy like that is incredibly insecure.”

“Or depressed.”

“Or scary as all hell,” Jake chimed in.

“Jake.” Tom scolded.

“Sorry,” Jake gulped, “Scary as all H-E-double hockey sticks.”

Scott turned to face Jake. “I think you had better have this.” He held the wand out to Jake.

“What, why me!?”

“I just have a feeling that you should have it right now. Maybe it will help you face the big scary man,” mocked Scott.

“Very funny,” Jake breathed. “But alright.”

Jake slowly, but bravely took the wand. The trio worked their way through the crowd and boarded the train bound for the mall. All of them immediately received glancing stares from the other people in the car.

“They’re staring at us.” Jake said nervously, still gripping Tom’s hand like a vice.

“As well they should,” Tom assured his little brother. “It’s hard NOT to look at us.”

This eased his brother and his grip loosened.

Jake sat in between Jake and Scott in some nearby seats, while the lanky emo kid sat in a corner seat about ten feet away. Surprisingly, he was sitting next to a five year old kid and his father, who looked to be about thirty. Fortunately, no one was standing between them, which gave everyone a clear shot of the overly gothic teen.

Jake waited for the train to move before he took his aim. The emo kid sat sprawled out in his seat, listening to an I-Pod. “Of course, all black,” Jake remarked.

Confronting his fears, he came up with an idea he felt would help him conquer his fear. “Here we go.”

The emo was completely oblivious that an eight year old muscle boy was pointing a jewel tip wand directly at him. He was also unaware as Jake reared his arm back and flung the power of the wand directly at him.

Just at that moment, the train gave a huge jerk as it changed direction. The little five year old boy directly next to him was thrown from his seat. His father quickly leapt around to catch his son.

Did the streak of hot blue light find its mark, or did it hit the boy’s father instead?
1112212122221.title: Following the Emo

choices: The emo sees the trio and decides to talk to them
The trio makes it to the mall without further incident
11122121222211.content:
Fortunately, the father moved out of the way just in time for the bolt of light to streak past him unnoticed. The teen beyond was completely oblivious when a hot bolt of light entered his scrawny chest. Jake panted with anticipation, waiting to see what was about to happen.

Immediately, the tall teen’s body began to swell. It was harder to see his torso at first since his shirt was so loose, but it was painfully obvious in his already tight, skinny jeans. His legs quickly filled with thickening strength. Each one in turn blew up like a balloon filled with heavy rocks. It didn’t take long for the seams of his pants to split right down the side, exposing a field of rippling muscle, trapped under thinning pale white skin. Even his boots began to spilt down the sides as his calves continued to thicken. His clothes were not made to handle someone this large, and they quickly bowed down to their new master.

Finally, his shirt started to tighten. His chest quickly ballooned outward, forcing the graphic, flaming skull to crumple into the huge ridges between and beneath his growing pecs. His neck had gotten so large, that the chain choker was struggling to hold on. Every point violent shifted outward as his neck continued to swell. With one might bellow from the hulking teen, his choker popped straight off and flew several feet out in front of him.
His arms had the same problem. All of the wristbands and chains were struggling to fit around his growing forearms. As more muscle swelled and tightened underneath, all of his jewelry was painfully drug down his arm to his hands. A few of the popped of the same way his choker did, one right after the other.

All that was missing were sparks flying as Jake’s creation came to life. All of his clothes were ripping apart. His jewelry flew every which way. Even his groans were like those of a black and white horror movie where the monster threatens to destroy a town.

Finally, the growth was over and this heavily muscled emo now sat awkwardly in his, unable to fit his huge, tight butt in the cup. From beneath a thick head of straightened black hair were the eyes of a very confused tighten. With the body he had now, he looked like he was on his way to first place in a national bodybuilding competition. He even had the black bikini underwear to go with it.

“He’s even bigger than you Tom!” Scott excitedly whispered over to Tom.

“Yeah,” Tom gulped. “A lot bigger. Jake, what did you do?”

“Just watch.”

As the enormous teen tried to casually survey his new situation, he quickly realized that he was now half naked on the subway car. His legs were completely exposed and the remains of his boots barely covered his feet. All of those muscles rippled around the thick bone underneath, unable to find a comfortable place to rest. Even the boy he was sitting next to had started playing with his enormous thighs. The teen didn’t know what to do. The whole scenario was too much, so he just sat there as this tiny little five year old stuck his fingers into the deep cavities of his thighs and hamstrings. “These are so big daddy!”

The boy’s father quickly looked over and saw the sight of the monstrous teen. At first he was angry, but when he saw how enormous the gothic teen was, he just quickly scooped up his child and moved to the next car. “But daddy, I wasn’t done playing with the nice boy yet!”

The hulking teen tried carefully not to bring more attention to himself as he slowly collected all of his fallen jewelry and shredded clothes. Every muscle groaned with power as he bent over to casually pick up his tattered affects. His shirt struggled to contain the enormous pythons he now had for arms. The veins beneath that struggled to free themselves from the tight steel like chords of muscle that tried to strangle them. The trio could distinctly hear a low pitched voice complain, “I guess I put them on too tight this morning.”

As he sat back up, the enormous emo unsuccessfully fussed for minutes trying to sit comfortably in his tiny seat. His butt was so huge and hard, he knew if he tried, he could probably snap the thin plastic in half, just with the strength of his butt. And he didn’t know what to think of that kind of power. For the rest of the trip to the mall, the 6’4” titan, tried to casually cover his privates and legs for fear of causing a scene.

“I knew fear and now he does,” Jake smiled.

Tom was not expecting that to come out of Jake’s mouth. It actually shocked him.“That’s not very nice.”

“What I mean is, I think the way he looks is the way he feels. If he looks different, maybe he will feel different too.”

“I’m not sure it works that way,” Tom said.

“But look at him, he obviously feels different now.”

“Because he’s embarrassed.”

“Well, right now he is. But what about later when he finds some clothes that fit? How do you think he will feel then? Exactly the same?”

“Well, no,” Tom agreed.

“And maybe what was making him unhappy before will be gone now. Or changed. Maybe, while he sits there exposed to the world, he will think about how his actions and his looks affect others. Maybe, he will even make a change for the better.”

“Only from the mind of a child,” Tom thought to himself. “Jake, that was—insightful.”

Jake tilted his head. “What’s “insightful” mean?”
11122121222211.title: Muscled Up Emo

choices: Billy, an overweight bookwork in Scott's class
Jordan, a high school freshman and gaming buddy of Tom's
111221212222111.content:
As the trio, talked, they did not notice that the new titan had set his sights on them. His eyes hid underneath his long hair. However, one person in particular was all he could think about. Suddenly, as if from nowhere, he appeared directly in front of Tom, still holding his tattered clothes in front for “protection.”

“Excuse me.”

Tom suddenly twisted his head up to see the giant looming above him. His chest was so large that it partly obscured his boyish face. “Y-yes?”

“Is this seat taken?”

The enormous emo motioned to the open seat next to Tom. “Not at all.”

“Thanks.”

The emo’s voice was surprisingly sultry for the body it had previously been attached to. He sounded confident, but there was a hint of nervousness in his voice.

“I’m sure you’ve noticed my little problem.”

Tom couldn’t help but stare directly at him, for fear of his eyes drifting too low. “What do you mean?”

The emo grinned with his dark black lips and motioned down with his head. “Oh, that,” Tom chimed awkwardly.

“I figured, when I saw you, th-hat you have the same problem I do.” The enormous teen motioned to the huge rips in Tom’s shirt.
