And again, despite how quiet and confident he sounded, there was a hint of nervousness that he just couldn’t shake. Tom had no idea why he would be nervous beyond the fact of general embarrassment.

“Oh, yeah,” Tom replied, blushing deeply. “We’re, um, a-actually going to the mall to fix that little problem right now.”

“And I bet you know all the best stores to fix this kind of problem, right?”

Tom was turning into butter. As they continued to talk, Jake and Scott gave commentary. “Um, what’s going on?” Jake whispered to Scott.

“I think it’s one of those changes you were talking about. I think this it’s the same guy with a new shell.”

“But why is he so interested in Tom?”

Scott thinks he knew what was going on, but didn’t know how to explain it to Jake. So he merely said, “Because they have something in common. That’s how these things start.”

“Oh, like us!” Jake smiled.

Scott shook his head mentally, but kept it still for Jake. “Something like that.”

“—we would be glad for you to join us. This is my kid brother and his friend.”

Finally the two muscle boys were more than ghosts in the conversation. Both of them chimed with a simultaneous, “Hello.”

“Hey.”

“And this is Michael,” Tom continued, “He’s going to look for some clothes with us at the mall.”

“Nice to meet you Michael,” Scott nodded. Jake knew he was missing something, but he kept it to himself.

“You guys are pretty big for kids your age.”

Jake beamed with excitement. “We could say the same about you,” Scott added.

Michael blushed. “Always have been. And have always had trouble finding clothes that fit it seems.” Pointing at Jake’s hand, Michael added, “That’s also a pretty nice wand. Is that like Harry Potter or something?”

Jake froze. Scott chimed in. “Yeah, Harry Potter. We love that stuff.”

That was obviously enough to suffice Michael’s passing interest in the wand or Tom’s brothers. The two behemoths went back to their conversation. Jake leaned over to Scott. “Listen, if they stay too chatty, we’re not going to get to change anybody else. I don’t know if I want someone else to know what this wand really is. We just met this guy. We can’t trust him.”

“Didn’t you listen to yourself before?”

Jake shook his head. “What do you mean?”

“You said the whole reason you finally fired the wand at Michael was to change him in more ways than one right?”

“Yeah. I figured he should be happier or something.”

“And look at what’s happening,” Scott said, motioning over to Michael and Tom.

“He’s clearly happy.”

“Exactly. So what’s the big deal if he hangs around a bit?”

Jake knew exactly what the big deal was but couldn’t put words to it. He finally had Tom to himself and didn’t want to give it up. Tom’s girlfriend already took up enough of his time. Scott could sense Jake’s tension and gave him an inspirational half hug. “Listen, when we get to the mall, you can zap the first person we see. So long as we hold hands, we will both see the change and Tom can go on talking with his new friend unaffected. Deal?”

Jake smiled. “Deal.”

They finally arrived at their destination, and got off at the terminal. Tom barely fit through the subway doors, much less Michael. He had to walk sideways through the doors and duck his head down to fit through. Practically everyone in the terminal was staring at Michael, but with his enormous body, no one dared to say anything.

Finally, reaching the mall, Michael and Tom hurried for the first store they could find. While they did, Jake and Scott surveyed the sea of people. As they entered the mall, Jake had to look no longer. He actually saw someone they knew. Who was it?
111221212222111.title: "Excuse me..."

choices: Tom changes Jordan's little bro, who is also chubby
Tom changes other guys in the shopping mall
1112212122221112.content:
While walking through the shopping mall, Tom ran into Jordan, one of his classmates. Jordan was a short, chubby kid who was carrying a plastic bag containing video games.

"Tom! How are ya?" he smiled.

"Hey Jordy! Whatcha got in the bag?"

"Look at this! I got the newest versions of Diablo, Guild Wars, Resident Evil and SSX! I'm ready to play some serious video games! You wanna come over to my house?" Jordan said to Tom with a huge smile on his face.

"Uhmm sure, I gotta ask my mom first. I'm here in the mall with Jake and his friend Scott..." Tom said, pointing at his younger, muscular brother and his friend.

"Wow... Cool seeing you guys! Boy, you guys sure look great!" Jordan replied.

"I'll text you tonight, okay?" Tom added.

"Sure! See ya, Tom!"

Jordan then turned around and walked into a small clothing store.

"You guys wait for me for a sec" Tom said to Jake and Scott.

Tom walked into the store and saw Jordan trying on a t-shirt which was too small for him.

"Darn it... I need to loose this stupid weight... I hate this!" Jordan groaned.

Tom, while hiding behind a rack of t-shirts, fired the wand at Jordan. He knew that Jordan had a weight problem but he decided to help him since Jordan had always been nice to him in school.

The tip of the wand fired a blue light which struck Jordan in his big belly. From there, it travelled through the rest of his body, immedioately causing all of his body fat to melt away!

Within seconds, Jordan was skinny as a bone, and his clothes were far too BIG on him! His shirt was like a sheet and his jeans fell to the ground!

Next, his muscles began to expand! All of them! Jordan's calves inflated to the size of footballs! His quads added layers of muscle, to the point where they were even covered with veins as thick as ropes. His flat stomach was covered with a six-pack of abs and his upper torso was now holding large pectorals! His arms bulged as his biceps and triceps inflated like balloons and his delts and traps filled out his shoulders and upper torso, making him even wider with the V-taper. Jordan now looked like a junior bodybuilder.

Luckily, the boy was in a clothing store. He now fit everything that he wanted to buy. He bought new shirts and jeans, and he looked awesome! When he came out, he was greeted by Tom, who grinned when he saw the new muscular version of his gaming buddy.

"You look awesome, Jordan!"

"Thanks, dude! I feel great! So, I'll see you tonight?"

"Yeah!"
1112212122221112.title: Jordan, a high school freshman and gaming buddy...

choices: Jason becomes bigger than Jordan
Jason becomes just as muscular as Jordan
11122121222211121.content:
Tom and Jordan walked into the living room of the house where they were immediately greeted by Jason, Jordan's younger brother who was about 10 years old and just as chubby as Jordan used to be before Tom made him muscular using the wand.

"Hey, Tom!" Jason smiled, "Do you want to see my stamp collection?"

"Not now, Jason! We're playing a video game!" Jordan grumbled.

"I'll go take a look at his samps" Tom said calmly. "I also collect them, by the way!"

Jason took a big book from his shelf and opened it, showing off several stamps from various countries.

"Look at these! I got stamps from France, England, Norway and from Denmark!" Jason beamed as he showed off his book to Tom, who was standing next to him, while he quietly took the wand out of his pocket.

Jason was such a nice boy, but he was very overweight for his age, and it bothered Tom. He wanted to help Jason the same way he helped Jordan. So he pointed tha wand at Jason while the younger brother was busy showing off his stamp collection. Luckily, Jason was only wearing a tank top and shorts. So, Tom could see the results right away.

A blue beam of light shot from the tip of Tom's wand and struck Jason in his back. Immediately, Jason's muscles began to balloon into larger spheres of muscle while his rolls of fat and his stomach began to shrink, all at once!

How big did Jason become?
11122121222211121.title: Tom changes Jordan's little bro, who is als...

choices: Tom decides to use the wand on his friends.
Jake decides to use the wand on his friends.
11123.content:
"You know what Tom? I want you to feel this incredible strength and muscle for yourself," Jake said, picking up the wand.

"Really!?" Tom said, sounding excited. "Whenever you're ready."

"Okay, remember since you're not holding the wand you won't remember," Jake said. Tom nodded and saw Jake fire a stream of blue energy at him. He felt it pulse through him and every pulse made his muscles swell and grow. His back stretched into a perfect, rock solid v-shape, his shoulders became bowling balls of rock-hard muscle leading into thick cannon-like arms. His legs grew into massive trunks of steel-like muscle, while his pecs pushed out into massive slabs with even the nipples becoming solid as they pointed down. Beneath this was six massive, thick tiles accented by a v-shaped ravine as every thread of muscle thickened until they were like steel coils.

When the muscle growth ended Tom was now equally as massive as his younger brother, more massive in fact seeing as he was older, and pretty much devoid of clothes as they had been torn to shreds by his growth. Of course Tom's memories told him he was always this way, that he and his brother had always hung out and helped each other learn to control their superhuman strength, even if they occasionally couldn't manage. Now in Tom's memories it was both himself and his brother who'd crushed crayons. But now instead Tom had come to his younger brother's aid to teach him how to use the fragile little sticks of wax without snapping them. Tom was sure these memories were new, seeing as he knew the wand's secondary effect, but it didn't matter. He was just taking a moment to flex his massive muscles, enjoying the steel cords under his youthful skin, looking every inch an Olympian God like his brother, though also having not changed in height and retaining a youthful face. "It's nice being two massive brothers," Tom said at last, hugging his brother tight.

"Yeah, it's cool. So what do you want to do now?" Jake asked, handing the wand back to Tom, the one who had found it.

"Let's go grow some of our friends," Tom said, "That could be a lot of people though."

"Just the close ones," Jake suggested. "I think we should get some clothes on first."

A few minutes they were both clothed, their clothes being twice the size as they had been before and set out the door, being careful not to damage it.
11123.title: Jake wants his brother Tom to grow

choices: Tom takes the wand to the park and buffs up someone there
Jake takes the wand to a friend's house and buffs up a buddy of his
Tom and Jake go out and take the wand with them
1113.content:
“Hey! My wand!” Tom cried out, as he saw Jake fling the wand into the air.

Luckily, the boys lived in a two-floor house and they had a thirty-foot ceiling. The wand soared high into the air, with the pointed tip aiming straight down at the two brothers who were standing right next to each other.

As the wand came down, a blue beam emitted from the tip, striking both boys and making their muscles grow even more! Of course, Jake, being younger and smaller, was close to reaching his maximum size of muscularity by now, so his muscles grew until that maximum size had been reached.

Tom, on the other hand, felt his muscles grow even bigger, since he was taller and enjoyed having longer arms and legs, a bigger torso and a larger skeletal frame. His muscles inflated even more, and he still didn’t come close to reaching his max. However, he became quite impressive for a fourteen year-old! His calves became bigger than melons with large, thick veins running across them. His thighs swelled even further, with thick layers growing on top of other layers of muscle, while ropes of veins came to the surface of these thighs of steel, giving him that powerlifter-look. Truly, the teenager began to look like he had spent months working out in the gym after school! Tom’s amazing abdominals became even MORE defined, as an eight-pack turned into a sixteen-pack of ridges and buttons. Tom’s torso widened even more while his lats grew into wide sets of wings whenever he spread his arms out. And, speaking of arms, these thick pythons of power and muscle were now like cords of steel with bulging muscle and ropes of veins crawling over them. With biceps the size of basketballs, Tom was no kid to bully or mess around with at school anymore. Oh no: Tom was now to be feared, to be worshipped and to be respected at school and Jake was super proud to have Tom as his big brother. Tom was now the BIGGEST kid in high school!

Tom reached out his mighty arm and easily caught the falling wand with his huge hand. He had the height advantage over Jake anyway, so there was no way Jake could have caught the wand, which he had so carelessly tossed into the air.

As soon as Tom caught the wand, the two brothers stared at each other for a moment, both staring in awe at their impressive muscular physiques.

“Wow! I’m really happy to see that all those hours in the gym have started to pay off for you, Jake!” Tom said with a smile. “I’m so proud of you, little bro!”

“Hey! I’m not so little any more, Tom!” Jake beamed. “I wanna be just like you!”

“Well, you’re motivating me to work out even harder, little bro! You’ve been growing by leaps and bounds!”

“Speak for yourself, Tom! I mean… You’re a monster! You’ve gotten a lot bigger recently! All the guys at school are talking about you!” Jake grinned.

“Thanks, dude…”

“Tom… I’m tired of working out today. Can we do something fun now besides talking about working out and muscle? Can we play a video game now?” Jake pleaded with his big, muscular brother.

“Yeah! Let me put this away. Get the Xbox ready, bro!” Tom smiled.

Jake fired up the Xbox in the living room as Tom neatly stored the wand in the box in his bedroom before playing a few rounds of HALO with his brother. They had a blast, and Jake beat Tom in video games, as usual. But Tom didn’t mind, since he knew he was always bigger and more muscular.

Afterwards, Tom thought about something he could do with the wand…

112.content:
Tom just watched in awe as he watched his brother transform before his very eyes!

“Uhhhh…” Jake moaned, as every muscle in his body tensed up. Then, every muscle began to bulge! Jake’s calves suddenly began to swell, pushing out from the back of his legs, growing into powerful rocks like those calves that most bikers have.

“Holy crap!” Tom gasped, as he watched his little bro grow more muscular.

Jake’s thighs quickly followed suit, growing ever wider and thicker, as layers of muscle formed over them, turning those thin legs into pillars of thick muscle, making them as wide as oak trees! Thick lines and ridges formed over them, making Jake’s legs look like the ones bodybuilders had on the cover of muscle magazines.

Next, Jake’s flat stomach re-shaped into a field of ridges filled with buttons and rows and columns of mighty abdominals! His chest barreled outwards, becoming two large spheres of round rock-hard pectorals which stuck out from his chest, making it hard for Jake to look down and see his feet.

Finally, Jake’s arms swelled as his biceps and triceps filled out to the size of bowling balls. They were round and hard! Truly, the boy looked STRONG! His shoulders were broad and thick, and his neck was like that of a bull. His delts and lats were enormous and he now sported a V-taper like all bodybuilders had!

“Jake?”

Jake blinked for a moment, as he turned and looked at Tom. Then, he looked down and flexed his arms for a moment, admiring his enormous biceps. Then, he stood on the balls of his feet, flexing his titanic calves. He looked like a teenage Hulk! The only thing that gave away that he was still a kid, was his face.

“Hey, Tom… I want to play a video game with you before I go to the gym for my work-out!” Jake said. He walked over the video game console in Tom’s room and turned it on, without asking. Clearly, reality had changed, and it had become normal for Jake to be so muscular. “I want to play Halo 3 with you now! Come here and play with me, bro!” he ordered.

Clearly, Jake was now the alpha-male in the house, and he had become used to ordering Tom around. And, no wonder. The boys had always gotten along great, just Jake was the boss now.

“Sure… Uhh, Jake…” Tom said, as he sat down next to his hulking little brother. Jake was still shorter than Tom, but with his enormous muscles, Tom didn’t dare pick a fight with him. They rarely fought, actually. But Jake had gotten used to getting his way and he would be the alpha male in the house now.

The boys played a game until it was time for Jake to leave.

“There, I gotta go. Turn the game off, bro!” Jake ordered. “I’m going to the gym. See ya later. Then, I want to play another round with you when I get back!”

“Sure, Jake…” Tom replied.

After Jake had left, Tom decided what to do with the wand, now that he had a few hours to himself.
112.title: Jake Hulks out

choices: Tom uses the wand on his friend at school the next day
Jake borrows the wand and takes it to school with him
1121.content:
At first, Tom had no idea what he was going to do while his little buff brother was lifting weights in the gym. So, he just put on his walking shoes, and started walking. He figured he might as well walk towards the same gym where Jake worked out, which was right down the street from their house anyway.

While Tom was walking down the street, he spotted another kid, wearing a soccer uniform. He recognized the kid since he was about Jake’s age and he attended the same class as his little brother.

“Hey!” Tom said to the boy, who was wearing his black cleats, red shorts, red soccer socks and red jersey. Clearly, the boy was just coming home from soccer practice.

“Hi! Is Jake home?” the boy, whose name was Kyle, asked him.

“He’ll be home in a little bit. He’s working out at the gym right now. I’m going to get him now!” Tom explained to the soccer player. “You should lift weights with him!”

“Me? I guess… But, I’m probably too small and too skinny to be allowed to lift weights with Jake. I’m not as big as him!” Kyle responded, with a bit of shame.

Kyle then continued to walk past Tom, but Tom stopped and turned around, pulling the wand out of his pocket.

“Hey, Kyle!” he shouted.

The shy soccer player turned around and walked towards the tall, thin high school student.

“What’s up?”

“You’re gonna be one big, muscular soccer player!” Tom whispered.

“Huh?” Kyle wondered.

Then Tom held the wand in his right hand, just in front of his chest, before lowering the tip of the wand so that the tip was pointing right at the soccer player’s chest.

BBBBZZZZZZZZZZZZZZRRRRPPPPPP!!!!!!

A light blue stream of light emitted from the tip of the wand, striking Kyle dead center in his red soccer jersey. Immediately, his muscles started to grow! Kyle’s headed tilted backwards and the boy closed his eyes while he clenched his fists and flexed his arms.

“Ohhhh man… What is that? Uhhhhh!!!!” Kyle groaned, as he was overcome by an intense feeling of power as every muscle in his body began to inflate all at once! The boy felt an amazing surge of superhuman physical strength blast through his body like he had never felt before!

His calves and his thighs instantly bulged out from his legs, thickening and widening into enormous mounds of rock-hard slabs of muscle, totally unseen or unheard of for an eight-year-old boy! His calves practically exploded with muscle, inflating to insane properties as they grew to the size of lemons, sticking out from the back of Kyle’s legs like huge round balls of muscle which were harder than rocks!

Next, his thighs inflated and became too thick and so wide, that they were even wider than his torso! The slabs and layers of muscle which formed above his knees were so thick, that his soccer shorts began to tear by the seams. Thick veins that were as big as jump ropes formed over his thighs, covering his legs like the legs of an Olympic bodybuilder!

“What… the… heck?” Kyle groaned, feeling an incredible amount of physical strength coursing through his legs as the wand’s muscle-increasing power crept up his body from his legs to his torso. “I’m… getting… STRONG!”

Kyle’s flat stomach turned into a landscape of massive abdominals which looked like deep rows and columns of tiles, neatly placed side by side and with deep lines between them. He developed a twelve-pack set of abs that was just amazing! The same counted for his pectorals, which inflated like two huge, round medicine balls that were as hard as bowling balls, and sticking out in front of his chest by eight inches, making his shoulders incredibly deep and wide! His arms were sticking out from his shoulders and hanging from a forty-five degree angle, due to the soccer-ball-sized biceps and triceps which had formed on them. His massive lats and titanic delts surrounded his neck on both sides, making his neck seem as wide as that of a raging bull. Truly, the boy was about to burst out of his soccer jersey!

Finally, when Tom noticed that the growth had stopped, he realized that Kyle had maxed out. He gently pulled back the wand, and allowed the flow of magic to cease, leaving a very muscular soccer player standing before him.

Kyle opened his eyes and stared at Tom for a moment.

“Hey… Is Jake still at the gym?” Kyle said, as he walked over to Tom with a slight swagger. His shyness had all but disappeared, now that he had gained over a hundred pounds of muscle!

“Umm… Yeah!” Tom replied, as he looked down at the incredibly muscular boy, who looked like he was about to burst out of his soccer uniform with his enormous muscles. “I’m going to get him right now!”

“Oh, cool! Please… Please ask Jake to call me? I want to work out with him tomorrow… I had to miss the workout since I had soccer today… But I want to lift weights tomorrow!” Kyle asked him politely.

“Sure thing, Kyle! So, are you doing okay?”

“Oh yeah!” Kyle beamed, as he made a fist and flexed his arm, allowing a huge ball of muscle to form on his right arm that was even bigger than Tom’s fist! “Check out my guns!”

“Wow! That’s quite some muscle you got there!” Tom grinned, running his hand over Kyle’s mighty 20-inch bicep. “You must be really strong!”

“The strongest kid in school… After Jake, of course!”

“I’ll tell him that!” Tom grinned. “Well, I’d better go, or else we’ll be late coming home for dinner!”

“See ya, Tom!”

“Bye, Kyle!” Tom said, as he waved at the muscular soccer boy.

Tom couldn’t help but smile as he watched Kyle walk up to the front door of his house. He loved how the wand made his muscles grow! And he got better at using the wand and spotting when the “victim” had reached the point of maximum growth! There was no way Kyle could have gotten any bigger, and he ended up looking great!

Tom looked forward to picking up Jake and to planning what he would do with the wand the following day.

1123.content:
Tom was thinking of heading to the park, but the sight of his now very muscular little brother made him envious. He didn't want to take them away, he just didn't want to be a little runt amongst a bunch of muscle giants. So with that in mind he pulled off his white t-shirt and stood in front of his bedroom mirror in just his blue pyjama pants and eyed his thin frame. Though despite his lack of muscle he still had a good face, with dirty blond hair, blue-grey eyes and a boyish charm that remained even as he grew towards puberty. "Well, it's now or never," he muttered and, with a brief flourish, he fired the wand at the mirror.

The bolt of energy bounced off the mirror and right into his body, and immediately he felt a soothing warmth all across his body, though all his muscles also tensed up like when Jake had gotten hit. Then each and every muscle grew simultaneously. His pecs bulged out into firm, hard slabs of muscle over a solid, perfectly defined six-pack while his lats grew and spread until he had a perfect v-shaped back of rock hard muscle. His deltoids became round and hard and his biceps became thick pythons of muscle. His legs became thicker and harder while his calves bulged out and his pyjama pants became stretched to the limit before reality shifted and grew them.

It only took the transformation a few seconds to finish, and when it had Tom looked in the mirror to see an extremely well muscled fourteen-year old looking back at him. He took a moment to flex every muscle, particularly admiring his perfect abs and solid biceps. He was definitely larger than Jake again, though since his older age played into that he figured he was probably about equally muscled from a proportional view. He could feel the extra strength running through his limbs and it felt amazing.

"Oh um," Jake said, appearing back in the room with his gym bag slung over his large shoulders, "Do you wanna come with?"

"Um, I'll drop by later," Tom replied, his voice a bit deeper now thanks to his larger chest, "I want to spin by the park first."

"Ohhh, what's her name?" Jake teased.

"It's not that, I just want to go for a walk," Tom replied.

"I know, I'm kidding. I hope I manage to keep my size by the time I'm your age, the girls fall all over you."

Tom shrugged his large shoulders in response, "I have to change, catch you later Jake."

Jake left and Tom quickly changed into a large tank top and sports shorts before dashing off to the park, delighting in his new speed from stronger legs. It wasn't far from his house, an easy jog for his newly strengthened body.

When Tom got to the park he looked around for more people to practice the wand on. There were several kids on the playground structure, probably about six years old each, and some kids about his age, maybe a couple years younger, on the court playing basketball. Then finally there were some people skateboarding of various ages, from younger than him to older. The question was, who should he target?

As Tom stared around the playground and spotted the various kids who were playing there, the wand in his hand began to vibrate slightly every time he studied the physique of each one of the kids. It was as if the wand had bonded with him... It had become "one" with him!

Tom spotted a boy, about seven years old, named Tim. He lived a few houses down the street and Tom knew Timmy and his parents since they were neighbors. Timmy was short and wore shorts, a tank top and croc shoes as he played on the swings and climbed up the ladder so he could come down the slide. The wand vibrated even more as Tom studied his body, as if it was trying to tell him that Timmy was a good candidate to muscle up.

All Tom had to do was to point the wand at the boy, who had just come down the slide. Right away, a beam of light emitted from the tip of the wand and struck the boy in then chest, unseen by everyone except Tom.

Immediately, Timmy's arms began to bulge with amazing muscle, as well as his legs, his chest and his shoulders! Within seconds, Timmy was boasting bulging calves, rock-hard pecs, amazing abs, bulging biceps and titanic quads on his legs! He didn't grow taller, but he became a bit wider as he gained enough muscle to be noticeable!

The muscle boy ran up to his mother.

"Mom! Can I go play with the bigger kids over there?"

"Yes! just be careful that you don't hurt anyone! Remember, you're stronger than most kids who are your age and older, so don't hurt anybody, okay?" his mother said.

"I'll be careful!" the muscle boy replied.

Tom just chuckled. Reality had changed as his wand had given Timmy his little growth spurt. Now everybody accepted the fact that he was a muscle kid! Basically, Tom could muscle up anybody he wanted and nobody would notice the difference!

So, Tom looked around for other kids to muscle up...

11233.content:
Tom then recognized his friend Christian skating with the others. Christian was about fourteen and thin as a rail. He had short blond hair, a cute, boyish face, and bright blue eyes. He was often bullied in school for being so small.

Christian was skateboarding when he crashed headfirst into one of the largest seniors in the school, Jack.

"The heck is wrong with you pipsqueak?! Why aren't you watching where you're going?! You're lucky we even let you come here." "I-I'm sorry!" Christian stammered. "Yeah, so am I!" Jack replied, " Sorry I have to hurt you!"

Without thinking, Tom whipped out the wand and shot at Christian. The light caught him in the side, and he began to grow.

He first grew taller, shooting up from 5'4'' to a respectable 6'2''. His chest grew out the the size of beach balls, followed by his abs, which turned into a solid eight pack. His biceps were next to grow, turning the size of bowling ball. His thighs and calves grew massive, possibly weighing thirty pounds alone! His neck thickened greatly as well, and when he finished growing he easily dwarfed not only Jack, but any professional body builder. His clothes had grown to fit him, which led Tom to believe that reality had changed for Christian as well. Now instead of being the scrawny hipster dork, he was now the alpha male of the skatepark.

"I'm sorry Jack, but I still haven't received an apology for you crashing into me. You're lucky I even let you come here. Now what do you say?" "S-sorry Christian! I didn't mean to crash into you!" "Good, now run along before I forget to be nice." The roles of the two boys had switched, now it was Christian who dominated to others instead of Jack.

Christian turned and saw Tom.

"Hey Tom! We're all working out tonight still, right? You, your brother, and I, right?" "Sure thing, man!," Tom shoutedback.

Tom was able to help all of his scrawny friends become muscular and stand up to their once bullies. The question was, who to grow now?

112331.content:
Tom decided to see what he could do at school the next day. He was in the hall way going to first block when he saw Jack picking on another person. Apparently Jack was only timid around Christian, but was still a total jerk to the other small kids in the school. The person he was picking on was Shayne.

Shayne wasn't horribly small, but he wasn't big either. He had short, curly brown hair and tan skin. He often wore baggy clothes with bright patterns and dark blue contacts. He was an artist and openly gay. It was because of this that Jack was torturing Shayne.

'Poor Shayne!' thought Tom, 'He's such a nice guy but people give him so much crap for being gay. I bet they wouldn't do that if he was bigger than them though!' Tom reached for the wand and fired at Shayne, hitting him right in the chest.

Shayne began growing exponentially faster than the others boys Tom had grown. Much larger too. Shayne shot from being 5'6'' to a massive 7 feet tall. His pecs balooned out, becoming masses of rock hard muscle. His flat stomach transformed into a deep cut eight pack. His arms grew into massive biceps, and his legs followed suit. It was then Tom noticed that Shayne's baggy, colorful clothes had turned into a large football jersey, and Syayne now wore warpaint on his face. Apparently, reality had turned Shayne into the school's star quarterback, a position that Jack had previously filled.

Tom also noticed that Shayne was now surrounded by girls while Jack stood alone off the the side.

"Wow Shayne!" said one of the girls, "You're sooo hot! It's too bad you're gay! I'd totally be a guy for you!" "No!" interjected another, "I want to be a guy for Shayne!"

Tom walked over to Jack. "What's wrong with you?" he asked. "All the chicks are all over our football star who's not even interested while our star running back, me, is alone here willing to date all of them. Its not freaking fair man! All they guys that the girls want are gay!"

Tom actually felt bad for Jack. He wasn't the bully of the school anymore, the only two people he ever picked on were now twice his size! Tom decided to help him, but what to do?

"Well, Jack, I think I know how to help," said Tom, pulling out the wand. "How's that?" "I'm going to make you as strong as Shayne!" "How are you gonna do that? Are you gonna give me roids or something?" Tom laughed. No, not steroids, this!" He pointed to the wand. Jack gave an amused chuckle. "That stick? How's that gonna help?" "Its a magic wand that makes people's muscles grow. If I zap you with it, then you'll grow as big as Shayne!" Jack got visinly excited. "Duuuude! Ifthis thing works I could be a star! Zap me man!"

'Jack is awful friendly,' thought Tom, 'I guess the fact that he's not the alpha male made himm a fairly decent guy. I hope I don't regret doing this.'

Tom took a look at Jack's features, trying to visualize what he wanted to do. Jack had spikey blond hair, was about 5'11'' and already pretty muscular. He was also very attractive, which ment Tom wouldn't need to change too much to help him win back the girl's affections. He pointed to wand at Jack as long as he had Shayne, and Jack began to grow.

Tom didn't bother to think that with Jack already being as big as he was pointing the wand at him as long as he did Shayne would actually make him almost twice the size.

And it did.

Jack shot up to being almost 14 feet tall. His muscles ballooned out, becoming twice as large as Shayne's were. His six pack turned into a canyon-like twelve pack. His biceps grew to resemble cannon balls and his pecs became two boulders off solid muscle. His head somehow grew to fit his new frame, which kept it from being swallowed by his traps. Jack was now truely a muscle god.

"Duuude!!! That thing works freaking AMAZING! Just look at me!" Jack flexed and admired his new body. "Wait, you actually remember me doing this?" "Yeah, why wouldn't I? And I really owe you for this man! I really do!"

As Jack walked away he was swarmed by a group of infatuated girls. Tom saw that Shayne was now nowhere to be seen. It was obvious that Jack''s reality had changed, but why on Earth did he remember.

Then Tom figured it out.

"I told him beforehand what I was goingg to do! When people know about the wand, they become aware of the changes,but reality still changes as well. They basically know what I know!"

Tom would have to remember this whenever he didn't want to risk changing a person's personality like what had happened with his brother.

But what to do now?

11233121.content:
Tom was about to follow his new friend Jack when the first bell rang. Luckily, Tom and Jack had the same first bell together, Chemistry. Tom had always hated that class and was convinced that his teacher, Mrs. Worther, was out to get him. She didn't always target him, however, she targeted all of the shy students in her class. If any teacher could be called a true bully, it would be Mrs. Worther.

Mrs. Worther happened to be in one of her particuarily snippy moods. When Tom and Jack walked in, she snapped at them. "Just because you two are big and strong does not mean you can be late to my class! Especially you Mr. Fritz." she said, glaring at Jack. "Mrs. Worther, the tardy bell hasn't rung yet. We aren't late. Now please back off." "Humph!" said Mrs. Worther as she stormed back to her desk. With how she treated people, it was amazing that she was a Mrs. in the first place!

Jack and Tom took their seats. Tom sat in the middle of the room while Jack sat towards the back. The new Jack wasn't a slacker, as Tom found out he was now known as being a very good student. Mrs. Worther was judgemental, however, and put all the jocks in the back. Besides, it would be hard for anyone to see over a 14 foot tall 18 year old anyway.

The tardy bell rang and class began.

"Today we will be doing some alchemy. We will turn pennies into what looks like gold, but you'll find that they are still composed of zinc." She gave the class their instructions and told them to pick their partners. Jack asked Tom to be his partner, to which Tom happily agreed.

While the class was working on their experiment, there was a loud crash. David Kellson, another student in the class, had spilled a beaker of sodium hydroxide on the floor. This sent Mrs. Worther into a rage.

David was Mrs. Worther's target of choice. He always seemed to screw up, and she always berated and belittled him. The main reason for it was that David, standing at only 5'5'' was much shorter than her.

Tom couldn't stand watching Mrs. Worther torture poor David, who was already close to tears. Jack leaned over to Tom.

"Use the wand, Tom. Maybe you can make it so that David can intimidate that jerk of a teacher and keep her from bullying him." Tom very much liked that idea. He grabbed the wand and zapped David as Mrs. Worther sat down. David didnt grow drastically, only enough so he could intimidate Mrs. Worther. He grew to 6 feet tall. His muscles all grew as well,giving him the body of a light weight wrestler. Not too big, but enough to get noticed.

Throughout the whole process, Mrs. Worther watched from her desk. Like Tom and Jack, reality didn't change for her. She noticed the difference in David. She knew about the wand that Tom used. Possibly even more than Tom knew about it. But how did she know? Tom would soon find out.

The bell rung and the end of class, signalling that it was time to go to second period. Tom and Jack got out of their seats and headed to the door.

"I'll see you later, right, Tom?" Jack asked. "Sure thing, man. We can workout after school together or something." Suddenly, the boys heard a voice behind them. "Thomas, I need to see you." It was Mrs. Worther. "Good luck, man. I gotta go." said Jack as he left the room.

Tom went up to Mrs. Worther's desk. "Am I in trouble?" he asked nervously.

"No. But there is something you need to know. I saw your little magic with David. I know what happened. That wand you have there belongs to my family." 'Oh God. She knows about the wand.' Tom thought.

"What I am about to say may shock you. You see Tom, I come from a family of Witches. That wand was made by my great grandmother for use on her husband. She gave it to her granddaughter who was your grandmother. You probably found it in her old things. I would take that wand from you, but it likes you too much and actually bonded with you."

"Bonded with me?"

"Yes. All magica items have a soul of their own. They are very much alive. This one connects to humans who share its goals and desires, and bond with those who help it achieve them. It is literally in love eit you and does whatever you say."

"Wow. It likes me that much?"

"Not only that, but it can now work outside of its original parameters. Its only been used for muscle growth so far, correct? Well, now your spirits are so in tune, it can not only grow people but also teleport them, levetate them, alter their memories and change reality in general. Its quite dangerous. I would take it from you now, but it would only return right back to you. I ask that you take good care of it and BE CAREFUL."

Tom left the room shocked. This wand was that strong because of him? And he could now do so much? He thought of the fun he could now have. Where to start...

Tom went to his PE class and bid Jack farewell. His class changed into their uniforms and began withh that day's activity, running the track.

Tom went outside and saw a group of freshmen who were just a touch out of shape struggling far behind all the others. Tomm decided to try growing each of them, but it would be a challenge since there were five kids in total. 'NO!! NO!!'

Tom realized that he wasn't hearing words exactly, rather, the sense of the word no. A strong one too. Where could it be coming from? Then Tom realized that the wand was vibrating violently in his hand. "Was that you?" Tom asked.

11233121121.content:
Once school was over, Tom went back up into the attic and he went looking for the big box where he spotted the small box which had contained the wand. When he found it, he tossed everything out, looking for any other items which may have come along with the wand. He finally spotted a scroll, with a nice leather ribbon around it, which unrolled into a pretty document written on a thick cloth. The text on the cloth read:

“This cloth is for cleaning and storing the wand of muscle growth. Please keep the wand clean and dry. If the spirit of the wand binds with you, do not fight it. Some wands will only have the power to shrink and other will only have the power to grow. You cannot force the wand to do either one or the other.”

As Tom turned to face his old mirror, which was sitting against the wall in the attic, Tom took out his wand again.

“I guess you will only make other guys’ muscles grow, huh?” Tom mumbles out loud. “You won’t let me shrink their muscles?”

The wand vibrated and let out a warm, blue-and-yellow glow. It felt nice and peaceful, as the wand let out a soft, low humming sound as it quietly vibrated in Tom’s hands.

Curiously enough, the vibration became stronger and stronger after a few seconds as Tom turned to face the mirror before him.

“What? Do you like this? Are you happy now? So, you will only grow the m—“Tom said calmly, until the wand suddenly emitted a red ray of magic, stronger than ever, which struck the large mirror and bounced right back at Tom, striking him right in the chest!

“Urrhhhhkkk!!” Tom gasped, completely unable to move, as a wave of magic hit him and paralyzed him. Then, he began to feel something happening to his muscles! Every muscle in his body became stiff and started to ache like crazy!

“Ohhhh shit…. My own wand is… working on ME!” he whispered to himself as his arms became thicker, his chest expanded forward and sideways, his abdominal muscles became more defined and his quads and calves rapidly began to inflate like helium balloons!

“Uhh… Stop…. Please stop!” he said calmly when the burst of power from the wand ceased to emit from the wand’s tip, leaving him standing there, facing the mirror. Tom glanced at his reflection and he immediately noted some changes. He felt them too! He felt stronger already!

Tom was able to move again, but he also realized that his arms were thicker and his biceps had increased to the size of softballs. His chest had bulged a bit, and his shirt was very tight on his right now! It was getting quite uncomfortable.

“Ugh… It’s so stuffy and dusty in here… All this dust is itching my nose and… ahh… ahha… AHHHCHOOOO!!!”

The moment Tom sneezed, the rapid motion of expanding his chest and blowing air out of his lungs caused his t-shirt to rip in half!

RRRRIIIIPPPPPPPP!!!!

“Awww man! I ripped my shirt!”

Tom looked down and glanced at the wand in his hand. Then he felt a vibration and he heard a faint voice speak just one word…

“Bigger…”

The wand had spoken!

“P-p-please s-s-s-stop…. Help me….” Tom uttered, almost unable to move anything else but his mouth and his eyes as his muscles tensed up.

Finally, the beam of light from the wand weakened and the beam faded. The wand itself changed color and turned completely white, as it if had become completely drained of all its power! It had expelled every ounce of its magical powers into Tom’s muscles!

“Oh gosh… Ohmygosh… It’s over! The wand…. It’s all pale! It turned white!” Tom gasped as he bent over, adjusting to his greatly increased size and weight, picking up the small stick. The wand was nothing more than a plain, hollow white stick now. But where had all its magical powers gone?

Tom just stared in complete awe at his oversized, overgrown, 8-year-old giant, muscular “little” brother. While still contemplating what to say next, Tom absentmindedly tapped the wand, which still had the blue tip pointed towards his little brother. “I better put this away!” Tom said as he quickly placed the wand back in its box and he closed the lid. Then, he turned back and focused his attention on his little brother.

His arms grew thicker with thick, long veins covering his massive biceps and triceps. His calves exploded into giant footballs of muscle, covered with thick veins, implanted in the back of his legs. His quads grew into giant, thick and wide pillars of rock-solid muscle, becoming so wide that they were even sticking out from the side of his body like huge, wide columns of muscle covered with cords of muscle above the knees.

Jake’s torso was like a washboard, a wall of buttons like tiles on the kitchen wall. He had a well-defined six-pack of muscles which made any pro bodybuilder jealous now, even though the boy was only 8-years-old. Above his abdominal muscles hung his massive, thick, and wide pectorals, which were mighty orbs of solid steel and huge balls of muscle, added on to the powerful, thick and wide lets which gave the boy such super-wide shoulders. Bowling-ball-sized biceps packed on the power on his arms with huge delts and big, thick traps on the mighty shoulders, giving him the look of a professional, seasoned bodybuilder. Lastly, his balls and cock were so huge now, that he looked more like an adult than a preteen boy.

“Uhh… Jake?” Tom said softly. His sweet, little, playful 8-year-old brother had now morphed into a Muscle God!

“Hey, Tom!” Jake now replied, still in his same, usual, friendly voice as always. “Umm… I know I’m bigger than you but… You’re still my big bro and the oldest, so… Can I get a ride to the gym?”

Tom couldn’t help but chuckle as his gigantic muscle-bound Titan of a big brother stood there, totally looking down on him and yet, he still needed to ask Tom for a ride.

“Sure, big guy!” Tom replied playfully, tapping Jake on his mighty shoulder. “Get dressed and I’ll meet you downstairs, okay?”

“Do you have a towel and a bottle of water?” Tom reminded him.

“Oh! Let me get that!” Jake said. The giant boy quickly found a water bottle in the kitchen cupboard, which was now easy to reach. He also got a towel in the bathroom and he was ready to go. Tom led him to the garage where they got in the car and Tom was happy to give his new, huge brother a ride to the gym.

Once they arrived, everyone thought that Jake was the older, bigger brother and Tom was the younger bro. But Tom explained his younger bro just had a much bigger body than him as Jake started lifting weights as Tom looked on while sitting on a bench and playing with his cell phone…

14.content:
Who to show, if this thing worked then the possibilities were endless, you stood there thinking, when a shout broke the silence, "Tom" your mother screamed, "where are you? You're going to be late for school", you sighed school day, then as quick as it had come, your frown parted, and a smile replaced it as all the new possiblys occurred to you.

You were still smiling on the bus as it drove through each neighbourhood, as the incredible ideas flooded into your mind, you sat there as visions of giant cheerleaders lifting the footballer boyfriends; of nerds beating up there previous bullies, you chuckled, this would be fun. The bus stopped, and you among the ominous crowds of groaning teenagers got out.

First period went by very slowly, you sat there at the back, you kept the Muscle wand in your bag as you couldn't find any situation to test it, you considered turning Mr Henricks into the next Mr Universe, but decided against it. You just sat there at the back, you felt like falling asleep, you normally enjoyed history but to do you couldn't focus.

Second period was no better, Mrs Gregory droned on, it felt just like a normal school day, only worse, as you had something to make it interesting, but so far, no opportunity to use had presented its self to use it. You groaned again, however it wasn't long before first period ended, and you walked out on to the field hoping that break would be more interesting.

And then that's when you spotted Andrew, Andrew was probably your best friend you had known him for years, and you got on very well with him, you shared interests and basically you enjoyed each other's company, Andrew was almost a year older than him, but looking at him, it would be impossible to tell this, he was only about five foot four, and his limbs looked like twigs, he only weighed about 100 pounds, and the rest of his body wasn't any better.

And all of this didn't help him, he was the constant prey of the schools bullies, as you watched, you saw bone cruncher Boris, lifting him with one arm, and hanging him on the fence, before leaving to find other victims, you felt sorry for Andrew and wished there was something you could do to help him, and then an idea hit you.

Quickly you ran over to him, and helped him get down "thanks mate" he said, "Man I hate Bone cruncher Boris, what I would give to show him what that feels like." you smiled, "Well Andrew" you began, "today's your lucky day." "What?" He said, you didn't answer, you only smiled and pulled out the wand and pointed it at him, the wand started to glow "Activate" you said, and a blue burst of light shot out of the wand and hit Andrew.

It was only a short burst, but when the dust cleared, you were shocked dot discover nothing had happened, you stared at the wand, as if wondering if it was broken, when suddenly a voice said "Reality Mode initiated", and then Andrew started to glow again, and you stared at him in shock, his whole body started to grow.

His arms gained Muscle, his legs expanded, outwards till they were the size of tree trunks, he chest became colossal, he gained almost a foot in height, by the time he was finished you weren't even sure if he was the same person any more, his whole body was different, he looked like an escaped power lifter, you continued to stand the gaping at him, but then he spoke, "hey mate" he said in his usual friendly tone, "how are you?"

You didn't answer you were still staring at his bulk, he looked down at himself, and then said "I know, but I haven't been able to get to the gym recently", before you could continue your conversation, a hearty laughter broke out through air, you turned, and watched Bone cruncher lifting another small kid, in the air by his shirt.
Andrew sighed, "Excuse me a minute mate, got to go straighten this out."

You watched as Andrew walked across the field to Bone crusher, now standing a good four inches above him, he posed no threat to him, you couldn't hear what they were saying, but you could tell from there expressions, that Bone cruncher was clearly terrified of Andrew now, you watched, as Andrew grabbed him, by the shoulder and hauled him on the fence.

You smiled, happy to watch the tyrant get his comeuppance, you watched ahead as he walked off with a large gang of Brone crusher's previous victims, and you smiled knowing you had greatly improved your best friend's life. This was fun, you had to try it again, you smiled as memories of your previous fantasies came flooding back to you, but then it dawned on you, you didn't know much about this wand, surely it would be safer to run some tests first, after all that is what any good scientist would do, and you had always wanted to be a scientist.

You stood there at the cross roads, trying to decided which course of action to take, after a while you decided, to...
14.title: Andrew, his friend from school, age 15

choices: you hear the front door opening and decide to use it on Jake, your younger bro
You hear the front door opening and decide to use it on one of your friends
You wait till tomorrow and use it on one of your friends at school
141.content:
You longed to have more fun with this device but you knew that you had to do some experiments first, if you didn't then if something went wrong at least you would have some idea of how to fix it, so you didn't use it for the rest of the day, you left Andrew alone with his new found strength and popularity, and simply sat at the back throughout the remainder of the school day.

Eventually the final bell rang, and your teacher let you all go, you jumped on the bus, and just sat there as bus shot down the roads, till after what felt like an eternity it arrived at your stop, you jumped out and ran down the street, then down your drive and finally up to the front door, you grabbed your key out of your pocket.

You opened the door, and in a flash, you ran round the house gathering everything that you would need, you had the house to yourself for the next good part of two hours, your older sister Julie, always hung out with her friends at the Mall, your younger sister Jane had dance class, your younger brother Jake was at a friend’s house, and parents were still at work.

As you worked you stopped for a brief moment to bonder why all your siblings had the same initials, before shrugging the feeling off and returning to your work, you got your camera, a note book, your tape recorder and your three pet rats, and took the lot down to the garage, once there you set everything up, you got a tape measure and scales, before beginning writing:

Muscle Wand Tests

Test subject A: Brown rat, Length: 6 inches (Not including tail), Weight: 18oz, Gender: Male

Test subject B: Brown rat, Length: 7 inches (Not including tail), Weight: 21oz, Gender: Male

Test subject C: Brown rat, Length: 5 inches (Not including tail), Weight: 13oz, Gender: Female

After that you took your camera and took pictures of the rats (you had an old fashioned instant camera, that produced a picture after each shot, old fashioned maybe but very useful for what you needed it for.) And began your tape recording (Again old fashioned but effective) "I am about to test out my experiments with my new Muscle wand, test subject A: Six inches long, weights 18oz"

You pointed the wand at your rat, and said "Activate" again a bream of bright blue light short out of the wand and then after it stopped a voice said "Reality mode initiated" and the rat began to expand, just like Andrew it grew, its increased a good two inches before stopping, you examined it with your measuring equipment, and went to write this change down in your book, only as you were writing, for you to spot something odd.

The top line had changed, it now read "Test subject A: Brown rat, Length: 8.3 inches (Not including tail), Weight: 21oz, Gender: Male" which was the exact same measurements that it had at the moment, suspicious of this change you then noticed something else odd, looking at the pictures you had taken previously, you discovered that the rat in the picture looked identical, to how the rat looked now, it was like it had never changed.

To confirm your suspicions you played by your recording, it stated "I am about to test out my experiments with my new Muscle wand, test subject A: 8.3 inches long, weights 21oz", you gasped, it was the exact same thing that had happened with Andrew, everyone had reacted to the change as if it hadn’t happened, as you pondered over this, you suddenly remembered what the voice had said, before each change.

Curious, you pointed at your second rat and said "Activate, disable reality mode" and again a bright blue beam shot out of the wand and into the rat, and again, shortly after the beam had dissipated, the rat began to grow, its small muscles expanding, its length increasing, it body mass doubling, once it was finished you ran to your results, to find that you were right, this time they hadn't changed.

Smiling you wrote down your findings, before deciding to do another test, you made Rat A grow another inch, you returned to your notes only to discover that they had changed again, "interesting" you said out loud, it appeared that unless specified the wand always reverts to reality changing, after jotting this down another idea occurred to you, could you also shrink the muscles of another?

You pointed the wand at Test subject A and said "Activate reverse" and this time a dark green beam hit the rat, and soon it shrunk down to the size it had been, you smiled, and decided to do another test, you pointed the wand at Subject C and again said "Activate Reverse", again a dark green beam hit the rat, but this time it didn't get any smaller.

Confused you repeated the test several times on each rat, and discovered that you could only shrink them down to their original sizes, no smaller, and like growing it changed reality unless you told it not to. You were quite pleased with your discoveries and considered calling it a day; however other questions burned in your mind, so you decided to do some more tests.

First you test whether you could control how much the subject grew, and you discovered that to a limited degree you could, you could make them slightly more muscular to hulk, but your control on the variation was limited. Next you tested if you could make them more muscular without increasing their height, so you pointed at Rat C and said "Activate, muscle only" and watched as the yellow beam hit the rat, this time the effects were much quicker, it grew more muscular before the ray stopped firing.

There was only one final question that occurred to you, could you increase the amount of time the proses took, you pointed at Rat A and said "Activate..." you paused for a moment thinking of something to say, before finally coming up with "Time index five minutes", the ray fired, and you watched and waited, and sure enough over five minutes the rat reached the maximum size you had set it.

You smiled at your handy work, happy that you were now armed with this knowledge, you fix any problem you might meet, and go back to having fun, looking at your rats, you sighed and pointed at rat B and said "cancel", there was a flash (Not from the wand, from the rats) and they were all back to the way they were before.

It appeared that saying cancel deleted all changes since the last save, but that was not import now, the question was who to use it on?
141.title: Run the tests, better safe than sorry.

1411.content:
You walk into the house and settle into your bedroom where you examine he wand. Does it really work? You're just dying to try it out, but on who?

Just then your little brother Jake walks in and asks if he can play a game on your Xbox. He sits down and plays a game while he sits on the floor, in front of your TV.

You point the wand at Jake, who is sitting just a few feet away from you, facing the other way. You have a good side view of Jake from where you're sitting.

You see a blue ray of light fire from the tip of the wand and strike Jake in the shoulder. jake doesn't notice anything at all. You look on and wonder if anything will happen to your little brother.

Suddenly, you see Jake's biceps inflate! His biceps grow bigger and bigger, on both arms, right before your eyes! Your brother's arms are become thick with muscle!

What do you do next?

1412.content:
“Hi Tom! Are you home?”

You walked out of your room and saw that it was Sean, your neighbor from down the street! Sean was thirteen years old, and he lived three houses down and went to the same school as you.
“Hi Sean! Come on in!” you say to him.

“Hey I brought my HALO game with me! Wanna play it on your Xbox?”

“Sure!”

Sean popped the CD into the Xbox while you turned on the TV. You grabbed the controller and you held on to the wand in your other hand. You set the wand on the ground next to you as you sit on the floor.

The two of you play a few levels of the game until you get tired.

“Hey, want something to drink?” you offer him.

You get up and walk to the kitchen, leaving Sean in the living room with the game. While you’re pouring two glasses with juice, you decide to take the wand in your hand and aim it at Sean, while he’s totally concentrated on playing his game.

The moment you point the tip of the wand at Sean, a bright, blue light shoots from the tip and strikes Sean in the shoulder. Luckily, Sean doesn’t even notice and he just continues to play the game. You breathe a sigh of relief that Sean doesn’t feel anything, so that’s a good thing.

Right away, you notice a change. Sean’s arms begin to fill out. His biceps begin to harden as his shirt sleeves gets very tight. You notice how his biceps are growing! They are inflating like balloons!

Sean stretches out his legs in front of him, and boy what a difference! Since he was wearing shorts, you suddenly notice his bulging calves! Rock-hard calf muscles burst from his legs, while his quads seemed to grow wider and thicker as well!

His shoulders seemed to grow wider as well, and his t-shirt seemed to be getting really tight around his chest. His pectorals began to push against the fabric, to the point where the top three buttons from his shirt popped off!

“Whoops!” Sean uttered, when he realized that he had burst out of his shirt.

You retract the wand, stopping the blue light from striking your friend and causing his growth spurt to cease.

You walk back to where he’s sitting and you hand him his glass of soda. As he reaches for it, you notice how muscular he has become!

A thick, muscular arm reaches for the glass. As he drinks his Coke, his bulging biceps flex while he’s holding the glass to his lips. He looks like a young bodybuilder!

“Uhh… I see your buttons have popped off your t-shirt!” you say, while you pick up the three round plastic buttons. The threads had snapped, which held the buttons on his shirt. When you turn to face him, you see his pectorals practically bulging out from his enormous chest!

“Ohh yeah… thanks!” he says, as he takes the buttons from you and puts them in his pocket.

You smile at your friend. He has no idea what has happened to him!

“Wanna go to the mall?”

“Sure!”

Sean stands up, revealing his huge muscles. He’s ripped! He’s maybe an inch shorter than you, but he almost looks like he could pass as your bodyguard!

You walk out the door and he meekly follows behind you as you walk towards the bus stop.

“Which mall do you wanna go?” you ask your muscle friend.

“I don’t care… Wherever you want to go is fine by me!” he shrugs, raising his mighty shoulders.

You decide to take your wand with you so you can have more fun with it at the shopping mall…

"This should be fun!" you chuckled away to yourself as you aimed the wand in the direction of the eight cheerleaders who were practising one of their routines, Tanya, Sophie, Lauren, Tammi, Michaela, Susan, Erica and Angie. Her bouncy breasts became a lot firmer as her muscle was piled onto her chest and her abdomen...giving her incredible pecs and a firm six-pack. In just a few seconds...she was muscular than any of the guys on the football team. And once you had done...several moment later...so were her seven friends, all of whom had ripling muscles, rock-hard stomachs and all had gained several inches in height, stretching...and some cases...tearing their skimpy outfits.

"Awesome!" you grinned, seeing the results of just a few seconds 'work'. And you found it even more amazing that none of the girls...nor anyone around seemed to notice anything wrong.

Seeing one of the football players miss a touchdown, you couldn't help but laugh at him. "HEY! Maybe you should let the girls play instead" you shouted to the prostrate boy.

Next you moved on to...

1422.content:
Tommy's eyes scanned the halls for someone else to use the wand on. He finally settled on Megan and Vanessa the two smartest girls in their class who just happened to have gigantic crushes on him and Andrew. They weren't exactly supermodel material though with their pink and black braces, horn rimmed glasses, ankle length skirts, saddle shoes and long white blouses over their flat as a board chests. Tommy decided, "What the heck, they're both good dating material. All they need a little fine tuning." He hid around the corner and as they walked passed him he zapped them both with the wand. The girls were discussing math problems.

"Nessa we've done this before! When you solve quadratic equations you have to make sure you <ZAP!!!> - do dumbbell curls or you'll never get your arms to grow. And for the record, my abs look waaaay better than your's."

"Yeah right Meg. I do 5000 crunches a day to get my abs tight, 2500 in the morning and 2500 at night. All you do is rely on a machine!"

"And you wonder why your stomach is always hurting. Dial back on the crunches you ding-a-ling!!"

"Never!!"

"Alright fine, let's settle this once and for all. Tommy, sweetie you and Andy decide. Who has the better abs?"

The two girls lifted their tank tops which caused their 56 DD cup boobs to bounce in their athletic tops. On Megan's was written "Beauty, Brains and Biceps" On Vanessa's were two anime eyes and the caption underneath read, "Now can you look me in the eyes?"

The girls flexed their spectacular abdominal muscles and their quadriceps muscles swelled in their super-tight spandex pants.

"Well???" Vanessa asked.

Tommy and Andy looked at the girls and then at each other and said, "Tie!!"

"Ugh!!! You guys suck!" Megan said.

"Listen love. Tommy and I are not stupid. We pick one of you and there will be NO peace in the land for days." Andrew said.

"You got that right my brother."

"Besides, Tommy, my boy, I don't think that's what we are focusing on are we?"

"Well...I am still trying to look into Vanessa's eyes."

"If you two weren't our boyfriends, we'd be kicking your horny butts right now."

"I'm feeling lucky, eh Tommy old mate?"

"Like an Irishman on St. Patty's day bro."

"You two are so freakin' corny!! Now let's go to lunch"

As the couples went on a double date for lunch, both of them was able to relax again. The window was open to let in the fresh cool air in the drafty room. Some of the jocks were amazed at the change of Megan and Vanessa but did not say anything to them. Besides the girls were teased by them on a regular basis.

The couples got their lunch and sat down near the window. Tommy was trying to find another to make stronger that might need it. He was still standing up. Vanessa looked at Tommy and said 'Sweetheart, we are all seated now. Let's have lunch. This spinach soup looks delicious. Maybe Chef Ramsey was in the kitchen today.'

Tommy smiled as he sat down. But Tommy missed the chair and went splat on the floor. And the power of the wand went off. Quickly and sheepishly Tommy sat down to eat.

Mr Kotter was drinking a cup of coffee when the impact of the wand hit him. Almost immediately he felt much better and felt a little bit stronger. Slowly his strength was improving.

1422122.content:
After Tom sat down in his chair in the classroom, another boy sat in a chair right next to him. The boy was new, it was his first day since Tom had never seen him there before.

"Hi" Tom said to him.

The boy wore glasses, he was short and skinny and he had black, short hair. He wore a plain t-shirt and jeans and tennis shoes.

"Hey..." was his reply. He seemed very shy at first.

"Hi! I'm Tom! What's yoiur name?"

"Oh... I'm Anthony... Just call me Ant... I just transferred from a school in New Jersey. Today is my first day..."

"Cool, dude! Welcome!"

Tom wanted to be friends with Anthony right from the start. He realized that Anthony had a hard time getting started since he was the new guy at the school and he didn't know anybody. Plus, he was very shy and insecure, so Tom figured he woiuld help the boy out. Lastly, Anthony seemed a bit of geek, wearing those glasses and carrying the calculator in his shirt pocket.

As the teacher started the lecture for the history class, Tom quietly pulled his wand out of his backpack. The wand powered up right away, since it recognized Tom's hand and fingerprints. It had gotten used to Tom's hands and it had almost become "one" with Tom.

Tom quietly pointed the wand's tip at Anthony, as he held the wand low and far from sight, so that nobody would see it. A blue ray of light shot from the wand and struck Anthony in his left thigh. That was good enough, the wand's power travelled through the rest of the boy's body from there.

Slowly, Anthony's muscles started to inflate. His biceps and triceps expanded slightly, as well as his thighs, his calves and his abdominals. Anthony cringed for a moment, not knowing what was happening to him. Within seconds, he had gained about 25 pounds of muscle!

Tom looked over and smiled slightly as Anthony made a fist and flexed his arm, admiring his bulging bicep. How did he suddenly become so muscular?

Tom quietly chuckled and pondered what to do next to the friendly, new geeky kid...

14223.content:
"So what is that thing Tommy?" Vanessa asked as they walked toward the cafeteria.

"It's a magic wand."

"What does it do?"

"It makes people's muscles grow. I used it on you and Meg a few minutes ago."

The girls nearly doubled over with laughter as Tommy got angry.

"It's true!!"

"So wait a minute. You're trying to tell me that I got this.", Vanessa said, placing Tommy hand on her flexed bicep, "And these.", pressing his hand against her breast then moving it down to her abs, "From that?"

"Yeah- why did you do that just now?"

"Because I know how much you enjoy feeling me up and you know much I enjoy HAVING you feel me up."

"Yeah.....But yes that's exactly what I'm telling you."

"Are you feeling ok mate? Uh you're starting to worry us."

"I'm fine!! I guess you don't believe I used this on you too right?"

"Ok..NOW you're talking a buncha crap Tommy. Andrew has been this big for years. We all remember when he came to this school he was all skinny and sickly and stuff. Then his doctor put him on this high protein diet and made him work out every day. I mean, we should know! Meg and I starting hitting the gym like not too soon after him!"

Tommy smirked.

"You only THINK you did."

"Okay fine. Let's settle this once and for all. Tommy? Can that thing work on anybody?"

"Yup."

"If it can add muscle it can surely take it away right?"

"That's what I read in the instructions"

"Okay. Andrew, Nessa and I want to see you use it. Right here. Right now."

"On who?"

"On Billy Barrett."

"The school quarterback?"

"Yes, THAT Billy Barrett."

"O...k...What do you want me to do?"

"He insulted one of our girlfriends the other day. I want you to take him down a peg or two."

"Shrink him?"

"Bingo."

"Ok. Stand back..."

Tommy turned a secret knob on the end of the wand and the jewel turned a blood red. He then pointed it at the table with the jocks where Billy was regaling his buddies with the story of his latest conquest.

"Yeah guys, she had one or two of those Long Island iced teas and then <ZAP!!!> I realised it was my duty to make sure she arrived home safely."

"Aww!!! Who the hell told Barrett he could sit with us?"

"Hey Barrett, just because your dad is the coach doesn't mean you can hang with the jocks. Towel boys sit over THERE with the rest of the dweebs!!"

As Billy got up and took his tray over to the other table, one of the cheerleaders tripped him. The boys started howling with laughter. Embarrassed, Billy jumped up in anger. Until the almost six foot tall girl stood up in front of him, her biceps slowly bursting through the sleeves of her sweater.

"Can I help you with something?"

Billy just turned around and slowly trudged away in defeat. The boys and girls howled even louder.

"Aww. Poor Billy!!" Megan said.

"Yeah, but he should know better than that. It's all Megan and I can do to keep those stuck-up bitches in their place. Billy is no match for them." Vanessa added.

"So I'm guessing now you're gonna tell me that you don't remember Billy being the star quarterback of the football team?"

"In his dreams maybe...." Megan snorted.

"Okay. I think I figured it out now. When I make the changes only I realise what's happening because I'm holding the wand. Tell you what. Pick someone else this time. But I want you all to hold on to me before I change them."

"You pick this time Vanessa."

"O...k... How's about Yoshioka?" Vanessa said, pointing at the petite Asian girl who was sitting by herself reading a book.

"Yoshi, come here a second." Megan said.

"Hey Mega-Meg. Hi Super-Vanessa." Yoshi said, smiling up at her two massive friends.

"Yoshi, we want to know if you'll help us with an experiment."

"Anything for science. You're not gonna hurt me are you?"

The three girls looked at Tommy, who immediately shook his head.

"Ok. Just don't turn my hair green ok? Mom would go nuts."

"We won't. "Nessa you hold on to me. Megan take my hand and Andrew you hold on to her."

"Just don't get any ideas mate."

"Ok here we go. <ZAP!!!>

The four teens watched as the kitten face on Yoshi's blouse changed into a snarling tiger and was soon stretched out to comical proportions by her rapidly expanding breasts sitting on top of her thick powerful pectoral muscles Her shoulders and back widened stretching the already over taxed blouse even further. If it weren't for the elastic panels in the sides it would have been obliterated. It did however shrink until the bottom of the blouse stopped just below her very prodigious bosom, exposing her diamond hard 8-pack abs. The knee length skirt quickly became a mini due to the her tree-trunk like quadriceps muscles. Her black and white striped stockings were starting to fray near the tops of her thighs unable to accommodate the expanded girth. The knee-high black boots she was wearing had to be folded down because she could not get them up over her bulbous calves. The sleeves of Yoshi's blouse then disappeared to show off her 17 and half inch biceps. The four friends stared in amazement at the small Japanese muscle-girl standing before them.

"Uhh...Guys? What are you staring at?

"Huh? Oh nothing Yoshi, nothing!"

"I thought you guys wanted me to help with an experiment? When are we gonna start?"

"We changed our our minds Yoshi. We'll do it next time."

"Ok then. Drew, Tommy see you guys later. Megs, Vanessa, we're still going to the gym after school today right?"

"Yeah, we're going."

"Good. I've been trying to get my guns to grow for the past week and it's pissing me off right now!!" Yoshi said, as she stared in disgust at her biceps.

"Ok. Yoshi we'll see you there."

Yoshi then went back to her table and her sandwich. The romance novel she was reading had changed to a autobiography/workout manual by Paula Suzuki.

"Oh my gawd Tommy!! That thing works!! Did you all see Yoshi?? She's huge!!" Vanessa exclaimed as they walked out the room.

"See? I told you."

"So who do we use it on next?"
14223.title: They go have some more fun and change some more...

They change Vanessa's mother next
142231.content:
"Hey mates, I just had a crazy thought."

"Well don't keep us in suspense Drew. Spill!!"

"How's about we try using the wand on our parents? Just for a laugh."

"That could be alot of fun." Megan said.

"So who do we try it on first?"

"What about my mum and dad? We're close to my house now anyway."

When they arrive at Andrew's house no one is around. They find a note taped to the refrigerator door. "Andrew, gone to the hardware store and to pick up your sister from ballet. Be home soon. Mum."

"Well that's no fun....now we have to wait." Vanessa said.

"Maybe not babe."

"That's my mate Tommy. ALWAYS thinking."

Tommy then pointed the wand at a picture of Andrew's parents' on the shelf. The photo was soon bathed in blue light. When the energy wave dissipated they look at the picture again. Nothing had happened.

They heard a car horn honk outside. The teens went to see Andrew's mother back into the driveway in her blue, full-sized pick-up truck. There was a pallet-load of cement and re-bar in the bed.

"Andrew darlin' How are ye?" Mrs. Mc Ewen said as she parked the vehicle. Even Andrew was unprepared for the huge, tall muscle-goddess that got out. Heather Mc Ewen stood over 6 feet 5 inches tall and weighed 275 pounds of pure muscle. She was dressed in her gardening clothes. The boys and girls carried the re-bar in the back and watched with total amazement as Mrs. Mc Ewen would put 2 bags of cement on her shoulders and carry them like they were weightless.
