143.content:
You were very pleased with the results of your first experience using the wand of muscle growth, especially when you saw what happened to Andrew, your best friend ever since grade school!

"Hey Tom! Wait up!" the muscle jock said, as he ran up to you.

Your mouth dropped as he walked up, now standing a whole foot taller than you with his bulging muscles everywhere. You were now looking straight at his massive pecs! Luckily, Andrew was still the nice guy he had always been, even as he now resembled a professional weight lifter who had just come from the Olympics!

"Hey, Tom! I gotta go by the computer lab and drop off a CD with my homework assignment. Wanna join me?" he said in his usual friendly voice.

"Sure, big guy! I gotta go there anyway and work on my program!" you replied.

"Well, I can't stay long. I gotta go to the gym and lift weights..." Andrew grinned as he flexed his arm, making his melon-sized bicep pop up. "You know me, Tom! I gotta stay in shape so I can protect my friends from the bullies!"

Andrew rested his massive arm on your shoulder, making you blush a little bit.

"You work out... to protect me?" you ask him.

"Absolutely! You're too important to get beat up by those bullies! That's why I go to the gym!" Andrew smiled. "To protect and defend you so the thugs leave you - and the other geeks in school - alone."

"Thanks, big guy!"

You arrive at the lab and he opens the door for you. He drops off his CD and leaves, letting you stay behind with a few other guys who are quietly working at the computer stations.

You find a PC and log on. You check your emails and read your assignment for the IT class. You decide to print out the assignment page and walk to the printer.

As you walk to the printer, you walk past Eric, one of the geeks. He's also in your class. He has glasses, short brown hair, and he wears braces. He is short and skinny as a rail.

"Hey, Tom! If you need help with the assignment for the IT class, then I can help, okay?" Eric says to you.

"Oh man... I appreciate that, Eric!" you reply.

You sit down, but you can see Eric from your side of the small lab. He is sitting just on the opposite side of you, facing the other wall. You know that Eric always gets bullied in school, and you decided to reward Eric for his generosity. Eric is always helping all the other kids in the computer lab, so you decide it's your turn to help him out this time.

You quietly remove the muscle wand from your backpack and you turn around in your chair. You decide how big you want to see Eric's muscles become, before you slowly point the wand's tip straight at Eric, who was facing the other way.

A beam of light blue light emitted from the tip of the wand, and struck Eric in the back.

Immediately, Eric's shoulders began to widen! Luckily, his clothes grew, to match his muscular growth. Since Eric was wearing shorts, you could see his legs inflate as well, as you looked down. You noticed right away that his calves began to swell, growing from thin to the size of rock hard footballs. His thighs swelled up as well, becoming as thick as sewer pipes! Layers upon layers of muscle added on to his legs, giving him the look of a rugby player! His entire torso widened as amazing abdominals formed over his previously flat stomach, while massive pectorals of rock hard steel bulged out from his amazing chest, seperated by a deep cleavage. Biceps the size of bowling balls grew on his arms while his delts and his lats completely made his shoulders transform into a landscape of lumps of hard muscle. He continued to hulk out, until you slowly retracted the wand, causing the blue light to stop.

"Wow... That was so awesome!" you whispered.

Eric got up and walked over to the printer, giving you a first glance at the impressive muscle geek! He still wore glasses, but he was just amazing, now that he had all this muscle!

"Hey! Have you seen Andrew today?" Eric said, as he walked up to you.

Eric's body was breathtaking. You had to take it all in for a few seconds, before you could reply.

"I-I think he went to the weight room..."

"Good! We're gonna work out together after this!" Eric said, as he turned around and walked away.

You just smiled. You turned two skinny guys into muscle jocks, with your muscle wand! You couldn't wait to try it out on others!

1431.content:
(Written from Tom’s POV)
You were so excited. You had just added a ton of muscle to a few guys at school. What a feeling! You actually felt so generous and yet so powerful at the same time. You had the ability to change the nerdiest and geekiest guys in school into the biggest, strongest and most athletic guys around, just by pointing a wand at them! How awesome was that? And, to make it more fun, nobody seemed to notice or care that you were doing it. Reality changed and you were the only one who knew what had changed!

So, you walked around the halls from the weight room into the computer lab. This was where you needed to be. Yes, this was the domain of the geeks, the biggest nerds on campus. These were the math and science nerds. What was cuter than a smart math and science nerd who was super muscular as well? Where to begin?

You grinned as you spotted your first victim. There he was, sitting right in front of you. There he was, a short, tanned, Indian boy with glasses, shorts and t-shirt, tapping away at the computer keyboard while he was reading over an assignment from his book which was on the desk in front of him. Those Indian kids were always over-achievers, working two chapters ahead of everyone else, and this was no exception. You walk up to the boy, who was short, skinny, and who was wearing glasses. He had chocolate, brown skin, deep, brown eyes and straight, short, black hair.

“Hey, Rishon… What’s going on?” you asked him.

“Oh, hey Tom… I’m working on a little program for math class… I think I got it to work…” Rishon said as he clicked here and there and BOOM! A little window popped up on the screen, asking me to enter two numbers.

I typed in two numbers and the program calculated the sum of the numbers and displayed it in a message in the center of the screen.

“Yay! It works!” Rishon cheered. “And that only took a few lines of code! Awesome!”

“Congrats, dude! You’re gonna be a famous programmer some day!” I grin.

“Yeah! I wanna work for Google or for Microsoft!” Rishon grinned, as he saved his little programming project. “Hey, can you watch my bag for me? I’m gonna use the bathroom. I’ll be right back!”

“Sure!” I said as I just stood there and looked around.

He got up and walked over to the door which was at the other end of the room. So, I pulled out my wand and I waited for him to return, figuring he would come back through the same door.

About three minutes later, my Indian friend came back. The door opened and he walked in. Now, it took him a few moments to walk back to his computer. While he was walking this way, I aimed the wand at him and fired.

Rishon stopped in his tracks and froze. Every muscle in his short, brown body tensed up and he craned his neck back. He let out a soft moan as his chest suddenly pushed out, his arms bulged with ripping muscle, and his stomach was suddenly forming mighty rows and columns of well-defined abdominal muscles which were clearly visible under his now tight Under Armor t-shirt.

Next, his shoulders widened as his quads grew thicker and wider all over while his legs above the knees became covered with thick cords of muscle which were draped in veins all over. Lastly, his calves inflated into mighty soccer balls which grew into big lumps of diamond shaped muscle in the back of his legs. He was totally ripped!

When the growth stopped, he opened his eyes and he finally continued walking over to the computer.

His shirt was so tight, he looked like he was about to rip out of it!

“Thanks, Tom, for watching my stuff! I’m so happy I got my project done! Now I can go to the gym and…” Rishon said as he picked up his backpack when his shirt sleeve ripped due to his large bicep being flexed.

RRRRIIPPPPPPP!

“Awww! Here goes another shirt!” Rishon groaned.

“You’re looking great, dude!” you grin, since the Indian dude was all big and buffed up now. He looked like a big, Indian muscle nerd!

“Yeah, well, I used to get bullied for being a nerd but…. Not anymore!” Rishon smiled as he flexed his arm, allowing a huge bicep to pop up. “I’m the strongest kid in my class!”

“I bet you are!” I said as I started to walk around the lab.

“Come! Let me introduce you to some of my friends, okay?” Rishon said.

You shrugged. This was a great chance to grow some other guys, right?

15.content:
Running to his room and jumping on the bed, Tom clutched the wand tightly, thinking about all the possibilities it could bring. Even though he had been a teenager for two years, he hadn't become jaded or sullen yet (like some of his classmates had). He let his imagination fully run away with thoughts of him and his friends going from skinny kids to musclebound hunks; the idea that the wand could be a fake didn't even cross his mind. 

Before he could drift off into his fantasy, he looked out his bedroom window and saw his best friend and next-door neighbor Alex outside, mowing the grass in his yard. The light-brown-skinned Hispanic boy sang along to the song he was listening to on his iPod as he pushed his ancient, rusting jalopy of a mower. The sticky heat of the day had forced him to take off his t-shirt, and that combined with the substantial effort he had to exert to push the old mower around the yard caused his slender body to glisten with sweat, dripping down his smooth chest and flat stomach to the waistline of his long black cargo shorts that hung below his knees. His black hair, normally spiked up several inches high, had been matted down by his sweat and the humidity in the air, and every so often he had to blow it out of his eyes. 

Both Tom and Alex were exactly the same age; they had been born on the same day at the same hospital in adjacent rooms. Their parents, after meeting there, found that they really enjoyed spending time together as a group, so Tom's family eventually moved next door to Alex's, when the boys were a little over two years old. From that point, Tom and Alex's friendship grew into a thing of legend. The boys couldn't remember a time when they didn't see each other practically every day. 

There wasn't anything Tom wouldn't do for Alex. When they were nine years old, they were hiking in the wooded mountains that overlooked their town when they came face-to-face with an angry mountain lion. They both panicked and started to run, but in the confusion Tom got his foot tangled in a mangled tree limb. Instead of abandoning his friend, Alex rushed to his side and helped him free, getting swiped by the mountain lion's paw in the process. Luckily, the two boys escaped with their lives, but Alex had to spend a week in the hospital, and to this day still had the scars in his chest from where the claws had sunk in. Tom never forgot Alex's sacrifice and bravery, and swore that, for the rest of his life, he would do whatever he could to repay his friend for saving him.

As they grew up, their paths diverged a little, but they wouldn't let that destroy their friendship. This year, the school district had assigned them to high schools on opposite ends of the county, so they started calling or texting each other on breaks and lunches. Their interests started to split, too. Tom became more obsessed with sports, watching UFC matches on TV, going to the closest NFL team's home games whenever he could, and even trying out for (and barely making) his school's wrestling team. Alex took a decidedly different approach, becoming more involved in music and technology, teaching himself guitar and occasionally recording and mixing songs on his computer. Recently, Tom had also started to suspect that Alex might be not quite on the same page as him as far as interest in girls was concerned, but that didn't matter. Alex was still his absolute best friend, and Tom would accept and support him, whatever happened. 

Thinking everything over, Tom realized that the only person he wanted to show the wand to, at least at first, was Alex. He knew his friend would get a kick out of it, and he could just imagine the two of them walking down the streets, getting stunned and awed looks from everyone in town. Excited, Tom temporarily dropped the wand and bounded out of bed and stuck his head out the window. "Hey, Alex!!" he yelled. His friend, however, couldn't hear him over the sound of the lawn mower roaring combined with the music blaring in his ears. "ALLLEEEXXXXX!!!" Tom screamed at the top of his lungs, but that didn't get his attention either. Tom waved his arms wildly, trying to catch Alex's eye, without any luck. Frustrated, Tom turned back to his room, trying to decide how to best get his friend's attention. As he saw all the junk lying in the floor of his room, his eyes fell on the wand he had left on the bed, and a smile formed on his lips.
15.title: Bestest of Best Friends

choices: He grows himself to Alex's size, and they go to a gym.
He grows himself smaller than Alex, and they go to the beach.
Hmm, the wand's powerless; it must need to recharge. They go to an outdoor mall.
152.content:
Tom picked up the wand and casually tossed it from hand to hand, smiling as he prepared himself for using it. If it worked as advertised, this could be a life-changing moment for him. If it didn't, well... there always would be something else to look forward to, he guessed. Taking a deep breath, he reeled it back, somewhat like a fishing rod, then flung it forward.

As soon as he did so, a hot white beam shot out of the wand, traveling out the window and across the yard in a split-second, hitting Alex square in the back. Tom was so shocked and ecstatic to see that the wand actually worked that he nearly dropped it out of the window into the bushes two stories below.

He put his hand over his mouth in awe as he watched Alex's body begin to transform. His whole frame widened, his shoulders becoming broader as his deltoids seemed to push them apart and his neck thickened. His legs also began to swell slightly, causing his shorts to look a bit tighter.

But Alex hadn't seemed to take any notice of his changes and went right on mowing the yard. Excited as he was at discovering that the wand worked, he was a little disappointed that he still couldn't get Alex's attention. As he leaned against the window sill, slightly discouraged, the wand accidentally slipped from his grip a little. Luckily, Tom caught it, but it discharged another bolt of light, amazingly hitting Alex again. 

He had just turned a corner and was mowing in Tom's direction, so the light hit him right in the chest. Instantly, his pecs started to swell, hills of rock-solid muscle forming on the young teen's body. His abs began to separate and become more defined, giving him the beginnings of a washboard stomach that looked even better with the sweat highlighting it's crevices. His biceps and triceps were also beefing up, and his thighs ballooned outward, straining his shorts even further, while balls of muscle formed on his calves. 

Alex still intently focused on his task at hand, and he seemed to have a hop in his step, able to push the mower much easier than before. Tom looked at the wand with an almost-unbelieving smile on his face. "So it works multiple times on the same person?" he said to himself. "This could get interesting." Alex certainly looked impressive now for a fourteen-year-old, but there were still boys in either of their schools that had better, more developed bodies, and Tom didn't think he should stop here.

He hesitated for only a moment, then fired the wand a third time, striking Alex once more, this time in the stomach. His body continued it's impressive bulking up, his biceps approaching the size of bowling balls, and his chest pushing even further outward, his nipples becoming larger and very perky. As Alex turned another corner, Tom could make out the sculpted figure of Alex's bubble-butt which, combined with his enlarging legs, now caused the fabric of his shorts to begin to tear slightly at the seams. Tom could also see, if only barely, Alex's shoes in distress, being pushed out on the sides and ends, and he noticed that Alex seemed a few inches taller, his height increased to be able to handle the increasing muscle mass.

Alex now jogged as he pushed the mower along with one hand, whipping around turns at a much faster rate than before, but he still had over half the yard to finish. As Tom stared at Alex, he thought, "He's now bigger than almost any boy at my school; even all of the guys on the wrestling team! But still... Maybe if I just..."

Deciding to act on the idea taking root in his head, just to see what would happen if he did, Tom once more brought the arm holding the wand up. But this time, he rapidly flung it Alex's direction not once, not twice, but three times. Sure enough, three distinct bolts flew out of the wand's tip, all hitting Alex one after the other. The combined effects of three shots at once caused Alex to be bathed in a white glow, and his body instantaneously exploded with growth.

The muscles on his biceps and forearms started to ripple outward, his hands getting huge as a result. He looked like he could now palm a giant one-hundred--pound medicine ball with ease, or rip a tree from it's roots if he wanted to. The hills on his chests turned into mountains, each bigger around than a beach ball and firm as granite. His deltoids pulsated with power, forcing his shoulders even wider and thickening his neck to the point where it was bigger around than your entire waist! His legs grew into massive pillars of solid muscle, wide as a Greek column, causing his shorts to rip completely below his crotch-line, leaving him only in what looked, on his statuesque body at least, like a pair of black Daisy Dukes. His shoes exploded outward, completely shredded by his expanding feet, and he continued to mow the grass barefoot, oblivious to it all. All this extreme muscle growth had necessarily pushed his height up by nearly a foot, just to cope with the increase in his body mass. There was no doubt about it now; Alex was a hulking teenage muscle god.

Impressed by the results of the wand, Tom still was amazed to see that Alex still didn't seem to notice. However, he zipped through the yard at an inhuman rate, and within a few more minutes, he had finished. Turning off the mower, he finally looked up at Tom and smiled broadly.

"Hey, little buddy!" he called out. "Sorry I didn't see ya there! You know how I love a good workout!"

Tom was slightly taken aback. Workout? Little Buddy? He quickly realized that the wand must have changed Alex's mind or even reality as a whole to make it seem like he had always been such an impressive freak of nature. Tom wasn't sure what to think about this unexpected effect. On one hand, it would certainly make concealing the wand easier so that no one would try to take it from him, but on the other, the whole point of having the wand was that he wanted people to take notice and be jealous of the changes he made.

As Tom thought it over, he hadn't noticed that Alex had made his way over towards Tom's window. Even standing at 6' 4" now, Alex still had to look up at Tom up on the second floor. Noticing that Alex was staring at him, waiting for an answer, Tom snapped back to attention. He smiled at his friend, shrugging. "That's okay, Alex. It was fun watching you."

Alex brushed his hair with his hand and blushed slightly. "Aww, well..." he said, chuckling in the same humble fashion as he had before the transformation. "I'm glad you enjoyed it." His eyes quickly lit up. "Hey, are you free today? Like right now?"

Tom nodded. "I finished cleaning out the attic. Why? What's up?"

"Well, I'm itching to go do something! I don't care where or what it is. I just want to get away from home for a while!" 

"Okay," Tom agreed, "just give me a second to get ready!"

He pulled his head back into the room, turning his attention to the wand. He knew he wanted to bring it with him wherever they went, that was a given. But he wasn't sure if he wanted to use it on himself before they went. He was more than pleased with how Alex had ended up, but should he let his best friend have all the fun?
152.title: Mowing and Growing

Gym was packed with people, they went somewhere else
1521.content:
Tom, looked out the window again.

"You've just had a workout, but... wanna go to the gym together?", Tom asked.

"Finally! I thought you'd never ask.", Alex said,"I've been asking you to join me forever".

Alex was very happy that Tom would finally join him in the gym. He wanted his little friend to try and get big like him... well that might be near impossible considering how huge Alex was, but with his help Tom could get pretty big!

"We're leaving in 10 minutes, get ready little buddy!", Alex said and run back to his house to prepare for gym, his heavy steps shaking the ground under him, so much that Tom could feel them.

Tom looked as the hulking, teenage muscle god run to his house and smiled. He turned around, closed the window and stood in front of the mirror in the attic. He closed his eyes, took a couple breaths and relaxed.

He opened his eyes and saw his reflection in the mirror. He liked how he looked, but more muscle would be nice. And we couldn't let Alex call him 'little buddy' all the time, could he?

Thinking for a second, Tom decided to take off his clothes and just keep his underwear on, so he could see clearly all the changes.

Tom raised the wand and quickly fired at the mirror 6 times. Each beam hitting the mirror, then being reflected back at Tom, all of the beams landing on different places on his body. He tensed his body as he felt the energy being absorbed, the he felt it.

His muscles were growing, no, not just growing, they were exploding from his body. It wasn't the one or the three beams he gave Alex. No, this was 6 beams all aimed at him.

Looking at the mirror he saw the changes, his biceps grew huge within seconds, becoming huge and round, as big as his own head, even. His pecs ballooned out, forming a thick pec-shelf casting a shadow over his abs. Speaking of his abs, they didn't just get deeper cuts, they grew big and round and were struggling for room.

As he noticed his neck growing and enormous traps raising on its side, and his back and shoulders growing massive, he started growing taller. soon he was too tall and too wide for the mirror. It was time to look and appreciate what had happened to his legs. Big and powerful, his new thighs would have easily ripped right through his trousers, if he had kept them on. Each thigh had to be wider than his old body.

The growth came to a halt, it probably lasted only for a few seconds, but it felt like minutes to Tom.

He noticed his briefs were barely clinging to his body due to his enormous glutes in the back, but they seemed to adjust as the new reality came to be.

Not wanting to keep Alex waiting, he made his way to his room to get ready for gym. It was hard moving around the house with his new size, but it seemed like things had adjusted a bit, because he didn't remember some of the hallways being this big.

After a few minutes Alex and Tom met outside.

"Hey big Tom!", Alex said excitedly. "Ready to pump some iron?"

Tom noticed that although he was big, he wasn't as big as Alex, though he was very close. It was okay though, he liked his best friend being bigger than him.

"I am ready! Do you have your lifetime gym membership pass with you ? ", Tom said and laughed. Alex winked at him and they made their way to the gym.
1521.title: He grows himself to Alex's size, and they g...

15211.content:
"Finally, we are here. Can't wait to start the real workout now", said Alex as they walked in the gym.

Tom wasn't used to this reality yet, being the biggest guys in the gym, most probably even the country. Everyone looked at them with awe and envy, people greeted them and even took photos. Some even tried touching their muscles as they walked by, Tom reflexively pulled himself when somebody tried to do so, but Alex seemed to welcome the gesture.

"Hey Mark!", Alex greeted one of the regular gym goers. He was a 35 year old man, had just started to get some gray hairs, but he didn't look a day older than 25. And his physique was amazing, not enormous like Tom's or Alex's, but still with big and tight muscles.

"Hey Alex, Tom", Mark greeted them. "You having another one of your 8-hour sessions today?"

"Nah, probably just 4 hours today, gotta run some errands later." Alex said and kept walking inside the gym.

Mark just waved at him and smiled.

"Tom, can I talk to you for a sec?", he beckoned at Tom.

"My son is here with me today for his first time at the gym and as you know he's about your age so... would you be so kind as to hang out with him and maybe help him a bit with the machines? If it won't be a problem for you, of course."

Tom looked at him for a second without replying, Mark's son was about one year younger than Tom and he knew him from school. His name was Adrian.

"I know what you are going to say, but I think he doesn't wanna be seen too much around his old man as much now AND you are someone I know for quite some time and can trust you"

Tom was about to refuse, he'd be doing some heavy lifting with Alex and didn't really want to spend time with someone who couldn't probably lift 1/10 of what he can now. Then he remembered that he was like that just earlier today... he felt bad, but he DID have the wand with him inside his gym bag, perhaps he could do something.

"Sure, and it is no problem at all. I am sure Alex will be glad to help too!", Tom said and winked at Mark.

"Hahaha, please don't overdo it, he just started working out!", Mark said and gave Tom a pat on the chest.

Mark then pointed at the direction his son Adrian is and went to finish his own workout.

Going towards the dumbbell rack Tom noticed Adrian sitting there, doing some bicep curls with a pair of really small weights.
Adrian was incredibly thin, but he was quite tall for a kid his age, he was taller than Tom was before he zapped himself with the wand. His hair was blonde and kinda curly, and he wore just a yellow t-shirt and a pair of green shorts at the gym, a water bottle and a small towel by his side.

Then Tom saw a couple of guys approaching him, he tried to hide himself behind a machine, well, hide himself as best he could at his current size.

"Yo kid, move your scrawny ass from here and let us men lift some real weights", one said. He was quite tall and was obviously lifting for some time, and appeared to be about 18 years old.

"Yeah, just get away from here", said the other one and pushed Adrian from the bench. He looked about the same as the other guy, just a bit younger maybe, they were probably brothers, Tom deduced.

Adrian landed on the ground with a thud, many of the other gym goers were focused on their workouts, so they didn't notice. Some decided to ignore them, while a couple stopped their workouts and went to call Adrian's father or the manager.

Tom was about to intervene, but his gym bag was caught on the machine and made him stop instantly. The zipper had opened a bit and the wand was clearly visible inside it. He smiled, it felt like this was fate.

He picked up the wand quickly and aimed it at Adrian, firing two shots at him.

Then....

152112.content:
Tom's smile fell like a rock; he hadn't aimed properly, and now the two beams missed the intended target, which was Adrian. Instead, the shots struck the two bullies, enveloping them in the light of the magical wand.

The wand worked indiscriminately despite being only usable by Tom, and the magic began to affect the two boys.

Their muscles expanded as they grew bigger and firmer, surpassing their previous sizes to new heights. Biceps bulged as they seemed to inflate, as if someone was pumping them up with air, while the muscle cords in their triceps went through a similar process. More meat was packed to their forearms, and veins crawled all over their tight skin over the large muscles underneath.

Their shirts began to strain against their widening shoulders. Each deltoid didn't just grew larger, they also became more defined, with deep striations appearing. The bullies' pectoral muscles jutted outwards, turning into plates of thick armor. Their obliques changed too as they morphed into round, block-like muscles, just like how their abs became solid bricks. Their six-packs even became eight-packs. On their backs, their lats and traps gained more muscle mass, looking akin to labyrinths of muscle fibers.

Further down below, their shorts became as shredded as their legs. The bullies' thighs gained so much mass that there was no space left in between, presenting solid quads with pronounced vastus muscles, of which each resembled a teardrop. Their calves bulged outwards, striations creasing them, and becoming as hard as rocks.

The two bullies grew even taller, further displaying their physical superiority over those around them; like Adrian.

Due to having been quite muscular before, and the two shots having been powerful, the two bullies were about the same size as Tom now. Their clothing clung tight to their tall, massive bodies.

Reality adjusted to his interference to the wand, and to everyone but Tom, both bullies had always been this huge.

The two boys wore confident smirks on their faces, while Adrian looked even more terrified. Tom would be too, if he was so much smaller than the older boys.

"Little runts like you shouldn't be messing around here." The older boy grinned in a demeaning manner at Adrian, "You think you're going to get muscles? Grow up, kid. And while you do, make sure to get a bit taller, if that's possible."

The other heavily-muscled boy chuckled, "You tell him, Eric."

Eric grinned mockingly, "What were you going to do with those weights, huh?"

"P-p-please, I j-just wanted t-to work out in p-p-peace..." Adrian stammered fearfully, staring up at the much bigger bullies.

"Man, listen to him speak. He's so scared he can't even talk properly." The younger sibling laughed cruelly, "And you think that means you can intrude on our favorite spot?"

"This guy needs to learn the consequences." The other nodded, his thick neck muscles tensing with each nod.

Adrian's eyes widened, "But that's-"

"Shut up, pipsqueak!" Eric snapped, raising a balled fist. His meaty forearm bulged and widened, while his bicep stood out, "You only speak when spoken to, got it?"

"Yeah, no one gets to talk back to us. Look at this." The younger bully raised his own arms, before doing a double bicep pose. His massive biceps exploded with mass, power and veins as they rose to a peak that surpassed what the adult bodybuilders in the gym had, "You see these biceps? They're bigger than your head, weakling."

Eric joined in as he flexed his pectorals and abs, which were more than visible through the tight sleeveless shirt that he wore, "Billy is right; we're both bigger than any adults in this town, despite being 18 and 16. We were already as strong as our father when we were ten, so what chance do you have against us? Absolutely nothing."

Both bullies began flexing their massive muscles. People nearby stared in awe, wonder and fear at their extremely muscular bodies. Their wide backs and torsos loomed ominously over others, and they didn't hesitate to show off their sizes. Their thighs were bigger than a man's waist, and whenever they flexed their legs, their quads and hamstrings bulged even larger.

"That's right! This is what real power looks like!" Eric grinned savagely, leaning in to scare Adrian.

"Not even adults dare to stop us." Billy demonstrated this by staring down two other bodybuilders, both of them adult men.

He puffed up his chest, causing his massive pecs to break out of the confines of his shirt, revealing their bloated shape that was riddled with veins. They were so wide and thick that they could be mistaken for books! Similarly, he made sure to tense his whole body as if he was about to go to war. The two adult bodybuilders possessed impressive muscles, but they looked like children next to the sixteen-years-old, and they cowered under his fearsome scowl, which was made more intimidating by how his thick neck flared up.

Eric smiled in satisfaction as he saw Adrian shiver in fear, "That's right; we're so big and strong that we can do whatever we want. I could lift you with one two fingers and not get tired."

"He's so light that you could probably throw him all across the room, bro." The other bully smirked cockily.

"I can with these guns!"

Eric flexed his arms, causing his biceps to balloon as they tensed. His were so big and defined, that the top of his biceps had small splits on them, due to being so well-developed. They were truly massive, being as big as bowling balls. His veins rushed to bring nutrition to the huge muscles of his jackhammers that he called arms.

Billy smirked confidently as he boasted, "Yeah, and afterwards I can squeeze like a watermelon between these tree trunks!"

The bully's legs exploded, becoming larger and gaining more striations everywhere. The seams of his already tight shorts lost another fight, ripping apart and revealing more of his massive thighs. Billy's calves were poking past his shins by a good margin. His legs truly were pillars of massive strength. It wasn't hard to imagine a watermelon to pop in less than a second when being squeezed by such extremely muscular limbs.

The older bully placed his hands on his hips, towering menacingly over Adrian who looked as if he was about to faint, "Do you understand now, pipsqueak? This place if for real men, like us, and weaklings like those guys around us. But you? You're so pathetic and thin that you belong in kindergarten."

Tom watched the whole display in silence, hand tightening around the wand. He knew he had to do something.

1521122.content:
Tom was about to raise the wand again, but stopped at the last second. Truth be told, he was interested in seeing where this was going. There was something about the way that the two incredibly muscular bullies used their large physiques to show their dominance over others that excited him.

Therefore, he kept the wand close to him if needed, but remained silent as he watched the situation play out.

Adrian was literally shaking as the two bullies kept demeaning him, using their muscular bodies to do whatever they wanted. Eric and Billy truly were teenage powerhouses, and they knew this all too well.

"Man, I'm getting all pumped up just from showing off." Eric grinned, his hands on his hips. In addition to his wide chest and imposing arms, the pillars of strength that were his legs looked very intimidating as well, "You hear that, ant? I bet next week I'll have added even more muscle mass to this amazing body of mine. All the while you remain so weak!"

Billy smirked cruelly, "Not that difficult, bro. Just look at his arms; those twigs look like they'll snap if I just squeeze them between my finger and thumb."

From his position, Tom was inclined to agree. Adrian's arms were skinny, while the 16-year-old bully's biceps probably measured around twenty or so inches of beefy muscle. His skin was covered in thick fat veins that stood out especially around the peak of his biceps.

Comparing Adrian's arms to his was cruel and sad, which somehow made Tom wish the bully was even bigger.

"Please, stop..." The much smaller boy whimpered.

"Or what?" The older bully grunted, looming over him with an immense bulk, "You're going to stop us? You're going to cry and tell daddy, so he will stop us? I'd like to see him try."

As if to prove his point, Eric took a deep breath, his powerful lungs taking in volumes of air. He clenched his fists into tight fists, tensing the sinewy muscle cords in his arms. The tall bully's pecs inflated like hard balloons, torso expanding and shoulders widening. He growled loudly as he flexed his upper body even more.

Tom stared in awe at the Herculean boy as his shirt began to tear at the seams. Large rips appeared all over his chest, growing larger by the second; like his huge muscles. The article of clothing couldn't keep up with Eric's mighty physique, and within seconds the shirt exploded off of his muscles, leaving his entire torso barren. Even his sculpted abs were revealed.

Everyone could see his pumped muscles in their ripped glory. The bully's pecs were so wide and big, Tom was certain that the tip of his finger would fit in the deep line that ran between Eric's pectoral muscles.

A large grin formed on the oldest brother's face, "Still think anyone can save you?"

Adrian was too speechless to even answer that question.

"I think you broke him." Billy chuckled, crossing his beefy arms over his own huge pecs, "Well, mentally at least. Breaking him with our large muscles would be easy too, of course. I think just pushing him over would snap his ribs."

The two bullies laughed out loud, much to the embarrassment of Adrian. However, no one moved to intervene and save the boy, Tom noticed. All of the adults were by no means pro bodybuilders, and they would stand no chance against the much larger teenagers.

Which is why it was another teenager who decided to stop them.

"Hey, knock it off, you two!" Alex yelled angrily as he walked up the scene.

The giant of a 14-year-old made his way over to the bullies, his enormous muscles glistening from his workout. He was scowling at the two, his height and muscle mass making for an intimidating sight.

Tom stared quietly as his friend came to a halt next to Adrian. While both of the bullies had grown exceptionally big, Alex was still bigger by a noticeable margin, and they flinched as he glared at them.

"Don't you have anything better to do than pick on someone smaller than you?" He asked coldly, his thick neck muscles flaring up.

"Shut up, Alex. Don't think you're better than us." Eric retorted hotly, returning the cold glare.

"Really, because as far as I can see, I outweigh both of you." Alex said proudly, displaying his own jackhammer-like arms, packed to the brim with solid muscle.

"We can take you on!" Billy yelled angrily.

"Then bring it on." Alex clenched his fists, sinewy forearms bulging with sinewy tendons.

Tom debated what he should do. He could choose the winner with his wand, but did he really want to boost the bullies who wanted o pick a fight with his friend?
1521122.title: He wants to see where this is going

1522.content:
(This chapter is told from Tom's point of view).

Wow. I couldn't believe it. Here was Alex, my best friend since grade school, and I had just caused his muscles to bulge to the point where he had grown into a muscle God, and all I had to do was point this wand at him a few times and presto! Alex has magically transformed into a bodybuilder! Not only that, but the wand has altered reality as well. He hasn't even stopped to question how or why his muscles suddenly grew so fast and so big while he was out mowing his lawn. He just accepted it and took it in stride as if he had been a muscle dude all his life! In other words, I realized that I could just point the wand at anyone and grow their muscles without having to offer any explanations! I didn't have to tell them about the wand at all! For them, their reality would be altered in such a way that their lives would be rewritten so that they would never remember NOT being muscular! Awesome!

I just looked down and stared at the wand while thinking of the possibilities. I kinda liked the idea of having Alex be bigger than me. He has always been protective of me, and I kinda liked that. Especially now that he was a big muscle hunk! So, maybe a trip to the beach would be cool. Just seeing Alex hulk out was amazing, and I was just dying to use the wand on other people right now. However, I definitely wanted to have a shot at making my own muscles grow as well, but I would never want to be as enormous as Alex!

I just walked to the bathroom and I stared at my reflection in the mirror before me. Then, I pointed the tip of the wand at the mirror, and I saw a beam of light shoot from the wand and strike the mirror before it bounced back and struck me in the stomach. It didn't hurt when it hit me, but it just tickled all over like crazy! It felt nice and soothing as that tickling sensation spread from my stomach all over to my chest, my waist and then from there to my arms and finally to my legs. That weird tingling sensation then hung around certain areas of my body, around my muscles and muscle groups in particular. Then, I felt my shirt feel a little tighter and my shorts as well. As I looked down, my thoughts were absolutely correct: My muscles were growing, just like they did when I pointed my wand at Alex!

"Wow..." I whispered to myself, as I looked down and then looked straight ahead at the reflection in the mirror.

My chest bulged out a little bit while my abdominals became more defined. My arms swelled up while my biceps and triceps became harder and more visible. My thighs were certainly a bit wider and thicker than before, and my calves swelled some. I was nowhere near as huge as Alex, but I had a little more "toned" and "athletic" look to my body. I began to resemble a member of the high school swim team, which was fine by me for now. Alex was my big muscle god, and I was content with that. Let him tower over me with all his brawn and muscle. I knew he loved me and would watch over me and protect me always, just like he always had since we were little kids. I didn't aspire to make myself huge with this wand. It was a lot more fun for me to make other kids huge, and I was just drolling to go to the beach and to try it out on other guys and girls.

I quickly changed into my sandals and swimming trunks as I grabbed a towel and my beach bag. I wrapped the wand in the towel and placed it in my bag along with my sunglasses and my bottle of sunscreen lotion. I was all ready to go when I heard a loud knock on my bedroom door. Then, the door opened when my muscle dude walked in.

"Hey, little man! The ocean is waiting for us!" Alex grinned, as he walked in the door.

My goodness. He barely fit through the door frame. His shoulders were so broad and his arms were so thick and muscular, he barely fit. I was almost afraid he would crack the door frame as he walked through the door. His torso was enormous as he sported his enormous pectorals and his massive abdominals. As I looked on, it was as if I was staring at a wall of muscle!

"Are ya ready?"

"Yeah..."

Alex reached out with his massive arms and he easily lifted me off the floor by placing his shovel-like hands under my armpits. I felt my feet leave the floor as he kept me suspended three feet above the ground. He just loved to lift me up when he talked to me.

"Hey! You gained some weight for me, huh? Awesome! You know how much I love to lift you, Tommy-boy!" he said, as he lifted me up higher before bringing me down. Then, as he almost set me down, he lifted me up again like a barbell. He did about six reps, lifting me up and bringing me down, before he finally set me down on the floor. I was totally at his mercy for I had to wait for him to finish lifting me.

"Ahh... That was a great workout using my favorite set of weights... my friend Tom!" Alex said, as he released me from his iron grip. "Let's go!"

We walked out and got a ride in a friend's car to the beach, which was only ten minutes away from the house. Once we arrived, I suggested I rub his back and legs with suntan lotion, and he agreed. Oh boy!

When we arrived at the beach, we walked up to the shore where Alex laid a large beach towel over the white sand. Then, he lay on his stomach and closed his eyes, but not before asking me if I could rub some suntan lotion all over his back and arms and legs. Oh boy! What a job! He didn’t need to ask that twice! I was just drooling over the opportunity to rub the nice, warm liquid from the bottle over his nice, huge, hard muscles!

As I got on my knees next to his hulking body, I stuck out my tongue. My mighty muscle god was on the ground before me; practically sound asleep in the bright sun. He was all mine and mine alone, and I had just retrieved the wand out of my bag along with the bottle of suntan lotion.

Holding the wand in my right hand and the bottle of suntan lotion in my left hand, I just pondered the possibilities. I could make Alex's muscles even bigger than they were now, and then rub some lotion on them. Wow!

I flicked the wand at him and watched as a beam of light struck his legs. Right away, Alex’s monster calves inflated even more so, and his grotesque thighs grew slightly bigger and wider, filling out with even more muscle. All Alex did was let out a soft moan while his leg-muscles expanded. Then, I poured some lotion on the palm of my hand, which I rubbed over his left calf muscle. Wow! I had never felt a muscle that was so big, so hard, and so round. His calves felt like melons which were implanted on the back of his legs! It was just amazing watching his muscles glow after I had rubbed them in suntan lotion. I must have been the luckiest boy on earth, to have a friend like Alex who was the most muscular kid on the beach!

152212211.title: Use the wand on the bulldogs?

15222.content:
Growing Alex more was certainly tempting to Tom, but at this point it would be like trying to add on more dirt to the top of Mount Everest. His friend was already so enormous, it didn't seem fair or right to keep using the wand on him, at least for now. "I'll see ya in a bit, buddy," Tom said to his sleeping muscle-god friend. He turned around, his eyes sweeping over the rest of the beach, looking for other subjects to test the wand out on, not seeing anyone interesting at first.

People that walked by who had never seen Alex before certainly took a double take when their eyes landed on the huge muscle boy, staring at him almost lustfully, no matter what their leanings were. Tom couldn't blame him; he was straight, but he still had a hard time keeping his eyes off of Alex's ginormous body, his muscles just begging to be admired. No one stopped to talk to either of them, though several people certainly slowed down as they passed.

Tom then noticed a couple of guys he recognized from school a few hundred feet away. They were playing beach volleyball with seven or eight guys that Tom didn't know. Jon and Will were both nice guys, and even though Tom wasn't good friends with either of them, they always would be open to chatting, and sometimes the three (or four, if Alex joined in) would work on homework together. Jon was a bit overweight, and Tom noted he was the only boy in the volleyball game who still wore a shirt, ashamed of his physique, Tom guessed. Will was much skinnier and shirtless, but his pasty thin body definitely looked unimpressive amongst the more toned guys the two boys were playing with.

Watching the game for a bit, Tom soon realized that both boys were not very active in the game, hanging out at the back of the side of the court that their team was on. Every once in a while, the ball would come their way, and Jon or Will would make an effort to hit it, only to either whiff at the ball completely and let it fall to the ground, or hit it too hard and in the completely wrong direction, out of bounds.

The other boys on the team, put off by their lack of skill, started to grumble at them. "C'mon, losers," one of the taller, more athletic boys finally berated them. "This is the winning point. Either get your heads into the game, or just go make sand castles or whatever with the little kids." Will and Jon hung their heads lower, definitely appearing depressed.

Tom felt the hair on the back of his neck bristle a bit, upset that these nice boys were being treated so meanly. "It's just a game," he said to himself, "why are these other guys being such jerks?" He thought about the situation for a moment, realizing there was something he could do. Smiling, he picked up the wand and edged closer to the court, making sure to stay out of the sight of the volleyball players for the time being.

As the other team got ready to serve, Tom aimed the wand at Jon first, pulling it back and letting it fire. The beam shot out again, and hit Jon straight in the chest. Tom watched in awe as the boy's flab began to morph into muscle. Instead of being loose and a bit jiggly, Jon's arms and legs now were becoming rock-solid, pulsing with the power of the wand. His shirt was pushed outward, forming around the firm hills of his chest muscles, and his sleeves started to strain against his biceps, while his legs became like firm pillars of steel.

With Jon's changes finishing, Tom thought to himself, "Not bad. Let's see if the sequel is any better than the original." He changed his aim to Will, firing the wand at the skinnier, bare-chested boy. The pale skin began to bulge outward as powerful ridges of muscle started appearing everywhere. Will's abs were the first change Tom noticed, a six-pack quickly forming, widening his narrow waist and giving the boy a washboard stomach. Will's shoulders broadened as his pectorals pushed apart, the swelling also making its way to his biceps and triceps, making them more powerful than one would have thought possible on such a skinny boy. His legs swelled too, his butt becoming more firm and round, the glutes stretching the fabric of Will's board shorts, and the calves now looking like hard softball-sized slabs of muscle.

Tom stepped back, watching his handiwork. The two boys now seemed to be much more enthused and energetic, and as the other team served, Jon quickly ran underneath the ball, hitting and popping it high into the air. Will then used his enormous leg muscles to jump up high into the air and spike the ball right into the ground. A boy on the other team dove for it but wasn't able to save it, the ball hitting the sand, giving the point, and the game, to Jon and Will's team. Their teammates mobbed them, giving each of them a series of high-fives and lifting them up into the air, heroes. The two boys just beamed, blissfully unaware of the weaklings they had been only moments ago.

Tom smiled to himself, happy to help out guys who had been so supportive and helpful to him and his friends. He pocketed the wand, trying to decide what to do next.

152221.content:
Still grinning over his good deed Tom decided to stroll over and say hi to the ones he'd helped. Even if he couldn't explain what he had done for them, he could at least share in the celebration of their victory.

By the time he got there Jon and Will's admirers had set them back down on the ground, undoubtedly tired from even briefly lifting up and carrying two such hunks of teenage muscle mass. The group was beginning to break up when Tom approached the deeply tanned, mega-buff beach boys.

"Hey, guys, great game!" Tom congratulated them. To his surprise he received twin glares in response to his compliment. "Thanks," Jon answered in a sneering, sarcastic tone. In unison the two began to turn their broad backs on him.

Confused and a little hurt by this cold greeting Tom quickly spoke up.

"Wait a minute! What's wrong?"

"You tell us," Will snapped, turning back toward Tom. "Why are you talking to us?"

"Why wouldn't I?" Tom asked in utter bewilderment.

Jon and Will shared what looked like an incredulous glance and then they both burst out laughing, their expression of mirth making their powerful, defined muscles ripple across their statuesque forms.

"Because you're Alex's best friend," Jon explained, "and you know what we think of Alex."

"Where is the Hispanic Hulk anyway?" Will asked contemptously as he slipped around behind Tom. "Usually you two are joined at the freaking hip."

"He's back down the beach," Tom explained uncomfortably, extending his arm as he turned to point toward his best friend. Unfortunately he hadn't realized how close Will was and ended up accidentally jabbing the gorgeous blond muscle-boy in the face.

Will swore, using a word Tom wouldn't have even guessed the meek teen knew, seized his wrist in an iron grip and slammed a sledgehamer-like fist into Tom's gut. Tom collapsed instantly, wretching and heaving, wrappin his unrestrained arm around the injured area. Dear god, Will was so STRONG! Tom had never been hit this hard in his life!

"You shouldn't have done that, man!" Jon scolded. "You know he's Alex's pet!"

"Let him poke you in the eye then and see how you like it!" Will fired back, letting Tom go. "Besides, how long did you wanna keep taking that crap he was dishing out?"

For a few seconds there was nothing but silence and Tom simply lay there, gasping. Then a hard yank on his hair pulled his head up, forcing him to look at the one holding onto him. Tom stared at Will, the He-Boy towering over him and blotting out the sun like a god.

"You don't say a word about this to Alex!" Will ordered, his deep voice confident and commanding. "Otherwise whatever he does to me, I'll do double to you. Got it?"

How on Earth had things ever come to this? Will had always been such a nice guy before! What was going on?!?!

The grip on his hair tighened painfully and Will pointedly flexed his fantastic free arm, his very defined, cannonball-sized bicep peaking higher than any Tom had ever seen before-with the exception of Alex's, of course.

"Got it?" Will repeated with menacing emphasis.

"Yeah, yeah, I've got it!" Tom cried. The punishing hold on his hair was released and Tom slowly stood up under the hostile gazes of the two incredible adolescent Adonises.

He still had no clue as to what had gone wrong. Why were they acting like this? And what problem could they possibly have with Alex? They'd always gotten along with him before, and he hadn't changed; he was still the kindest and best guy Tom knew. The only thing different about him was his body.

But they couldn't possibly dislike him for that! He'd seen with his own eyes just how much Will and Jon enjoyed their own amazing athletic ability and phenomenal physical prowess. Alex was just like they were, except a lot bigger.

That was it, Tom realized with a sudden flash of insight.THAT was why they disliked Alex so much! When the wand changed you it also changed your memories so that you thought you'd never been any different. Jon and Will remembered always being the strongest boys growing up, the popular top jocks. They were used to being the dominant alpha males and then, this year, they'd met Alex for the first time. Alex, who made Hulk Hogan look like a scrawny little wimp. They were jealous of him!

And because they hated Alex, they hated Tom too. No wonder they'd reacted so coldly to Tom coming over!

"Now beat it!" Jon said, pushing him hard from behind.

Slowly Tom began to walk away, glancing back sadly at the two angry teen powerhouses. How could he have known that changing their bodies would change their personalities too? He was going to have to be a lot more careful with the wand in the future.

As he headed back twoard Alex he heard Jon ask behind him, "Hey, what's this?"

Turning to look he saw Jon straighten up from having bent over to pick something up-and that something was the wand!

Tom clutched frantically at his pocket, but it was empty. The wand must have fallen out after he'd collapsed onto the sand!

"Abracadabra!" Jon intoned playfully, brandishing the wand at . . .

"Oh, are Steven and Tyler here?" Tom asked, remembering the two boys who lived across the street from him. Steve was seven years old and Tyler was nine.

Tom looked over and slowly walked over to the two small, skinny boys. Just then, one of them got up and grabbed a handful of sand,. throwing it at the other.

1522222.content:
Tom fired the wand at the older brother, the energy playing over Tyler's scrawny form. Immediately the nine year-old's muscles began to swell with size and power. His pecs inflated and defined themselves while his flat stomach changed to a set of chiseled, six-pack abs. His arms grew to the size of Tom's and then became far bigger, with ripped, cannonball-sized biceps and taut, iron forearms. His thin legs were soon thick as tree-trunks with solid muscle and they even got longer, making Tyler taller to accomodate his much buffer and more developed build.

The now-tremendously stronger Tyler caught up to his little brother almost instantly, sprinting across the sand like an Olympic athlete. Steven screamed when Tyler grabbed him by the shoulder, but it didn't sound like they were playing anymore; it sounded like a cry of fear.

Tyler took seized Steven's ankle with his other hand and effortlessly hoisted the smaller boy high overhead. He started to rapidly twirl his sibling in the air, asking menacingly, "What have I told you about bugging me, shrimp?"

"I-I'm sorry, Tyler!" Steven cries out helplessly, utterly at the mercy of his mighty big brother.

Tom wondered if he should do something, when Mrs. Chaney's exasperated voice called out, "Tyler, put your brother down!"

Grudgingly Tyler lowered Steven to the sand and Tom saw that, far from being the same size, the elder was now a full head taller than his younger sibling, and far broader and thicker. In fact Steven looked like a stick-figure next to Tyler's power-packed, Herculean physique.

"Watch it, wimp! Remember, Mom won't always be around to save you," Tyler warns, before intimidatingly pumping up a bronzed bicep nearly the size of Steven's head! The younger boy seems virtually hynotized by the sight of the massive muscle, staring at it for several seconds before swallowing hard and nodding. "Now get outta here!" Tyler commands, and Steven turns and runs away.

Tom stood there, a bit non-plussed by the results of his intervention. Apparently Tyler's unbelievable physical superiority had completely changed the relationship between the brothers. Instead of them playing with and pranking each other on a more or less equal basis, it was clear Tyler was large and in-charge, with Steven obeying him or else. Maybe this was inevitable. After all, now Tyler had to be what? Thirty, forty times stronger than his younger brother? He could snap Steven in two like a twig if he wanted to, and both boys undoubtedly knew that.

How often, Tom wondered, had the muscle-bound, superhuman nine year-old shown off for his brother, proudly flaunting his amazing strength? It was pretty surprising that the seven year-old still had the courage to defy his dominant, He-Boy big brother in any way whatsoever.

A sudden shout of "Hey, Tom!" interrupted the wand-wielder's train of thought as Tyler spotted him and ran toward him at blinding speed.

"What've you got there?" Tyler asked and Tom quickly put the wand in his back pocket. "Nothing, just something I found on the beach," he said hastily. "How are you doing today, Tyler?"

"Great! Every day's a good day to be me," Tyler said with a sly smile. Up close Tom could fully appreciate just how much the child had changed. For a boy who'd not yet hit puberty he was impossibly, inhumanly muscular and cut, putting that Richard Sandrak bodybuilder to shame. Even as he stood relaxed, his immense, sculpted muscles still seemd to ripple across his statuesque frame. Like Alex he radiated pure physical power, and Tom knew without question that Tyler was much, much stronger than he was.

Unlike Alex, however, Tyler also seemd to exude an almost tangible pride and self-confidence. He faced Tom fearlessly, like an equal or even a superior, with none of the shyness or deference he had displayed toward the teen in the past. Even his voice had changed, carrying in its tones an authority and self-assurance which no nine year-old should possess.

"So have you seen Alex anywhere around?" Tyler asked.

"Yeah, he's resting right over there," Tom answered, pointing to his slumbering behemoth of a best friend.

"Good! Maybe he can come back with me to work out then."

"Work out with you?" Tom questioned.

"Yeah! You know Alex is the only one I can lift weights with; everybody else is too weak," the young superboy said disdainfully.

"Have you and Alex worked out together before?" Tom asked.

"What? Course we have! You've come over and watched us sometimes, remember?"

Tom didn't remember, but he supposed it made sense. Alex and Tyler were certainly the two of the strongest people in the world, if not the strongest; it was only natural that they would spend time together. Knowing Alex, he was probably serving as a mentor to Tyler, though he could be working a bit harder on the little alpha male's attitude.

"Oh, yea, that's right," Tom agreed unconvincingly. Tyler stared at him strangely, then shrugged his extremely broad shoulders and headed for Alex.

Tom started to follow, then turned back toward Steven, who was playing by himself in the sand. Should he use the wand on Steven now? Or should he wait and first satisfy his curiousity about how Alex and Tyler got along in this reality?

He pointed the wand at Michael and fired off 5 or 6 separate shots, all of them hitting their intended target. Instantly, Michael’s body exploded with more growth, his muscles swelling much faster than before.

His shoulders broadened further, the deltoids becoming as large as bowling balls. Then larger. His neck thickened out, as his traps pushed upward, into an impressive mound of thick muscle. His arms swelled to monstrous proportions, the enormous horseshoe shape of the triceps clearly visible, while his biceps approached the size of softballs.

Michael’s chest plowed forward, farther and farther, growing larger and thicker with each passing second. Before long, it appeared as if his shirt was painted on, every muscle on his massive frame threatening to get out. Right before his shirt was ripped to pieces, however, it morphed into a tank top, to display his impressive physique.

Michael’s pants soon changed onto a pair of shorts, his massive quads and hamstrings clearly visible. His back widened considerably, as his lats thickened into two huge slabs of muscle, while the remainder of his trapezius muscles bunched up greatly halfway down his back. Finally, Michael’s abs formed, becoming an 8-pack, while his waist narrowed, creating a V-taper.

Tom just stared at Michael, who was still unaware of any changes that had occurred. In fact, he was still playing with his toys, making the occasional gun sound effect as he sat on the porch.

Even from here, Michael looked enormous, Tom thought. Had he gone too far?

He looked down at the wand, then decided to...

15323.content:
Tom stuffed the wand into his back pocket and walked next door. Alex had just finished mowing the lawn and was slowly pushing the lawnmower back into the garage.

“Oh, hey, Tom,” Alex said, out of breath, as he passed. Tom waved back.

“Hey, Mike,” Tom said, as he approached the front porch and walked up the steps. “You doing okay today?”

“Yeah, I guess,” the 7 year old replied. “It’s too hot to be outside, though.”

Tom looked Michael over as he went back to his toys. He was bigger than anyone he had ever seen. His arms alone appeared larger than a Mr. Olympia competitor. Maybe he DID overdo it with the wand. On the plus side, though, it didn’t look as if any kid from Michael’s school would ever pick on him again.

Just then, Alex appeared from the side of the house.

“Finally!” Michael said, standing up. “Can we go back inside now? I wanna play video games.”

Immediately, Tom noticed that Michael had grown nearly a foot in height, to accommodate all of his newly acquired muscle. Instead of reaching Tom’s stomach, he now came up to the top of his chest.

“Sure, come on,” Alex said, unlocking the door, as Michael ran past him and made his way to the TV.

“I don’t know why you’re always looking after me, anyway,” Michael said, turning on his Xbox. “It’s not like I can’t defend myself.”

“Well, Mom and Dad are worried something might happen to you,” Alex replied. “After all, you ARE only 7 years old.”

“Yeah, but I’m like, the strongest kid in school,” Michael pointed out.

“Well, you’re probably the strongest kid in the WORLD by now,” Alex corrected. "I mean, I haven’t seen a lot of 7 year olds walking around with a body like yours.”

Alex turned on the air conditioning and the overhead fan, in an effort to cool off, then sat down on the couch. Tom soon joined him. Before long, Alex had drifted off to sleep, his skinny arms folded over his chest. With Michael preoccupied with his video game, Tom brought out the wand from his back pocket.

The wand had worked like a charm. Michael was still essentially the same 7 year old kid he had always been, he was just built like a professional bodybuilder now. His personality hadn’t changed. He wasn’t a jerk. He didn’t turn into some Alpha Male who ordered everyone else around.

He was just a normal kid. A kid who liked videogames and playing with action figures. And the only person who had noticed anything was different was Tom.

With this in mind, Tom took and wand and used it on…

153231.content:
Tom was sitting on the couch when there was a knock on the front door. Alex was sound asleep, and Michael was playing video games.

"I'll get it for ya!" Tom said to Mike.

"Thanks, Tom!" the younger, but very muscular boy replied happily, so that he didn't have to pause his game.

Tom opened the door and was greeted by another boy, with short black hair and blue eyes. He was holding a video game in his hand. It was Taylor, a boy who lived down the street. He was short and skinny, and he was probably eight years old.

"Hi... Is Mike home?"

Tom opened the door and let the boy in.

Taylor sat on the floor next to Mike, who was obviously happy that his friend hand come over to join him. Tom saw how the two boys got along great, but the only thing that bothered him was the fact that Michael was far more muscular than Taylor. Luckily, Taylor was wearing shorts, a tank top, and tennis shoes. He was very skinny, and Tom was determined to change that.

Tom sat on the couch and pulled out the wand, as he studied Taylor, who was sitting right before him. Then he decided how big to make the boy.

1532311.content:
Tom watched as the two boys played on the XBOX, noticing the stark contrast between their bodies. Taylor was shorter than Michael had been; his skinny frame the first thing Tom had seen when he opened the door. His arms and legs were rail thin and his entire body didn’t seem to have an ounce of fat on it. He looked like an extreme ectomorph, someone who would probably struggle his entire life to gain weight.



Compare that to Michael, who easily dwarfed his friend, in both muscle and height. His arms were enormous, his legs were insanely huge. Michael’s deltoids were bigger than bowling balls, making his frame more than twice the width of Taylor’s.



And like Alex said, he was probably the strongest kid in the world. Michael could easily hurt Taylor if he wasn’t careful, even if it was an accident.



So, Tom decided to help Taylor out. He pointed the wand at the 8 year old and fired once, hitting him in the back.



Immediately, Taylor’s body responded, his muscles swelling, though not that much. His arms became more defined, his back muscles and traps grew slightly. Taylor’s shoulders widened a little, with all three deltoids clearly visible. And, although Tom couldn’t see it, Taylor’s legs and abs became more muscular.



In the end, Taylor had gained all of 10 or 15 pounds, making his body incredibly defined—which was impressive for a kid his age. But Tom wanted him to have more.



So he fired the wand twice, hitting him in the left shoulder this time, watching as pounds of muscle appeared out of nowhere. Taylor’s chest started to swell larger, while his back muscles thickened considerably, the combination of the two muscle groups starting to stretch his tank top. Taylor’s arms were a lot more impressive than before, his biceps approaching baseball-sized mounds, his massive triceps and forearms flexing every time he mashed a button on his XBOX controller. His neck thickened out as Taylor’s traps and shoulders became wider. His thighs piled on pounds of muscle, looking huge as he sat Indian-style in front of the TV, while his calves bulged into heart-shaped mounds.



Tom stopped for a moment, looking Taylor over. The 8 year old was a lot bigger than him, probably outweighing him by at least 20 pounds. Taylor looked like a middleweight bodybuilder now, his muscles appearing even bigger, thanks to his shorter frame.



He then glanced over at Michael, realizing he was still TWICE the size of Taylor. Tom hesitated for a moment, debating in his head whether or not to use the wand again, before curiosity got the better of him. He fired the wand two more times, watching, in fascination, as Taylor continued to grow.



Soon, his arms were enormous, almost the same size as Michael’s. His shoulders broadened further, the deltoids becoming huge, causing his neck to thicken more and push his traps to swell larger.



Taylor’s chest inflated to the size of twin cannonballs, the fabric of his tank top growing along with him. His legs had become huge slabs of muscle the size of tree trunks, his quads clearly defined, while his calves were larger than grapefruits.



Tom watched as the two boys continued playing video games, both oblivious to anything that had happened. They were both roughly the same size—with Taylor STILL smaller than Michael, though not by much now. Taylor was also around 4 inches shorter than his friend, his height increasing to support all of the muscle he had just gained.



Just then, they both stood up, stretching, while Michael reached over and turned off the XBOX. Tom pointed the wand again and fired at Taylor, watching as he finally grew to Michael’s size, before quickly hiding the wand.



“Well, that was fun,” Taylor said, as he picked his game off the floor. “What do you want to do now?”



Michael glanced up at the clock, realizing it was a little past 2:30 in the afternoon. He made his way over to his brother, shaking him by the shoulders until he finally opened his eyes.



“Okay, okay. I’m awake,” Alex said groggily, as he sat up. “What do you want?”



“You were supposed to take somewhere today, remember?” Michael reminded him. “You were supposed to take us to…”

Tom began to feel sorry for Alex, as he watched his best friend while he was walking to the soccer field from the parking lot, with his brother on one side and his brother’s best friend Taylor walking on the other. Both boys were just enormous compared to him, even though Alex was several years older than either one of them! The boys were at least four years younger than Alex, but they were much bigger, taller, and stronger than him, all thanks to Tom and his wand.

“I need to fix this...” Tom felt, as he watched Alex surrounded by these hulking boys who were towering over him. “This isn’t right!”

Michael and Taylor ran to meet their soccer coach, and Alex walked over to the bleachers. He walked up the steps and decided to sit on the highest level, overlooking the soccer field.

“Tom! TOM! Come here! You can see the entire field from here!” Alex shouted.

Tom decided to have some fun and to join Alex at the top of the bleachers, especially since nobody else was sitting there at that moment anyway.

Tom sat next to his friend, and glanced out over the field. The players were just lining up on the field, as the referee whistled and indicated the start of the first half of the soccer match. Of course, Michael and Taylor were having a really easy time, since they were among the biggest, the tallest, and the fastest boys on the team!

While Alex was intently watching the soccer match below, Tom quietly turned to observe his friend, who was sitting next to him with his chin resting in the palms of his hands and his elbows on his thighs. Then, without anyone noticing what he was doing, Tom pulled the wand out of his back pocket. When nobody was looking at him, Tom quietly and slowly pointed the tip of the wand at his friend Alex, who was sitting just a few feet next to him.

A thin, light blue stream of light emitted from the tip of the wand, striking Alex in the shoulder. Right away, Alex closed his eyes for a moment and let out a soft moan. Tom could notice almost immediately how Alex’s muscles began to inflate at a rapid pace! Alex’s biceps grew right away, since the wand’s beam struck him right in the shoulder to begin with. From there, Alex’s chest began to bulge, with his pectorals pushing out from his chest. His entire torso began to widen at the same time, as his abdominals became more defined as well. Of course, Tom couldn’t see that since Alex was wearing a t-shirt to cover his muscles. But Tom could make out that his friend was slowly becoming very muscular.

Alex was wearing shorts and socks on his feet, so the muscular growth on his legs was very noticeable. Right away, Tom could spot the bulging thighs and the inflated calves. Alex’s calf muscles had grown dramatically, becoming hard and round, pushing outward from the back of his legs to the point where they were as big as softballs. His quads had widened and grown thicker as well, with the additional growth of many more layers of muscle, which made his legs much more muscular as he sat there with his elbows resting on his thick legs of steel.

Alex’s arms had doubled in width and his biceps had become the size of bowling balls. He was now just a little bigger than Michael and Taylor, which is about right for a boy who was a little older than the two soccer players if he had gained about the same amount of muscle in a short amount of time.

When Tom realized that the growth began to stop, he pulled back the wand, stopping the growth ray, and put the wand back in his pocket.

“Good game, huh?” Tom said to his friend.

“Yeah…” Alex said, as he looked a little bored. “Thank goodness, after all those hours of soccer practice… They’d better win a few games! They’re winning 4-0!”

Tom just smiled. Now all three boys: Alex, Taylor and Michael are super muscular!

Now, he could just look forward to muscling up other kids at the soccer field or in their neighborhood.

So, who would Tom use his wand on next?

His so pack was like a package of eggs, smooth and curved. His triceps flared outward, supporting a tree trunk of a neck. His shoulders, wide and brawny, held up arms bulging with manliness. Eyes traveling downwards, he saw his legs, were brawny, cut like diamonds. Every single part of his body was a masterpiece. He allowed his hands, thick and large, to examin his body.

"Hey! Tom! Are you home?" Snapping out of his reverie, Tom rushes to the window, his footsteps making booming thudding against the floor. Leaning out the window, having to duck to do so, he sees Alex beaming up at him. Tom smirks back.

Each door has widened to make room for his broad shoulders. The ceilings were higher, leaving Tom at least five inches of free space. You're my best buddy and my 'brother'. We've done everything together and I won't ever allow that to happen." Alex smiles, lunging onto Tom's neck and hugging it.

Now I must trick that young fool into transferring ownership to me and it's true power can be unleashed just as it should have been two hundred years ago!"

So saying, the figure removed something from his coat pocket. It was another wand much like Tom's but dark purple in color. This was the Wand of Desire, evil counterpart to the Wand of Wishes. It had the same powers but turned anyone touched by it into a dark reflection of themselves, addicted to muscle and strength. After so many decades, it was time for it's power to be unleashed upon the world.

1543121.content:
Tom’s friend Alex had walked into the gym just moments earlier and he was looking for his friend. When he had found Tom, he noticed that a commotion was taking place.

A man wearing a big, dark coat had taken a purple wand out of his coat and he suddenly aimed the wand at Tom, striking Tom in his chest! Tom suddenly froze and he dropped his own, white wand on the floor.

The man then tossed the purple wand on the ground and rolled it to Tom, who bent over and picked it up. Suddenly, Tom’s face turned angry.

“Why am I growing other guys and making them big and muscular? I should make myself muscular and strong, instead! I’m going to grow into a muscle GOD from now on! Ha ha ha!!!” Tom said with a loud, evil laugh as he took the purple wand and aimed it at one of the bodybuilders in the gym.

Suddenly, the young bodybuilder saw his muscles shrink! His big pecs, his biceps, his quads and his bulging calves all dwindled down, leaving the man suddenly standing there, skinny and weak!

“OH NO! My muscles!!!” the man shouted.

Moments later, Tom’s own muscles started to inflate with big, bulging muscle power! Tom had gained the stolen bodybuilder’s muscles! He grew thicker, taller, stronger and wider as he now looked exactly the way the bodybuilder did, just a few minutes before!

“YES! YES! I LOVE THIS!” Tom shouted as he flexed his arms and showed off his massive arms. “LOOK AT ME!”

Now, Tom started to walk around the gym as Alex ran after him, just before he picked up the white wand on the ground. But the man with the coat saw that and started to chase after him.

“GIVE ME THAT WAND, YOU BRAT!” the man shouted.

But, Alex was faster than him and he ran into the locker room and hid behind a row of lockers. Then man walked into the room and looked and looked, but Alex outsmarted him and dashed out the back door.

Meanwhile, Tom was using the purple wand to shrink the muscles of the muscle guys in the gym because he was evil now! Can Alex stop him with the white wand before the man with the coat gets to him?

He also knew he couldn't have done it without the Wand's help.

Then and there, Tom decided to share his gift with his sister and made his way to her room, where she had stomped off to after her loss. "Hey Jules, it's me, open up." "Go away!" Tom was a bit shocked by the tone of voice coming from the door. He knew his sister didn't like losing but she had never shouted at him before.

She was a head taller than him with muscles that made him look as though he never found the wand at all. Her eyes were also glowing red and there was an aura of menace about her.

"DIDN'T YOU HEAR ME PIPSQEAK!? I SAID GO AWAY!!!" As his transformed sister stomped towards him, Tom looked and saw that his wand was also glowing red. Something was definitely wrong.
