Tom was working out in the gym while several of the gym members were watching him since he was so big and muscular. Not only that, but the members surrounding him had suddenly become big and muscular as well. Few people seemed to notice that Tom would occasionally remove a small wand from his pocket and aim it at other game patrons, making them bigger and stronger as they lifted weights or used the machines in the weight room.

Among the people in the crowd, there was a mysterious figure wearing a long trench coat and dark sunglasses. Just when Tom removed his wand and started to use it on another person on the gym, he removed what looked like a purple wand as well.

While Tom was using his own, white wand of muscle growth, the person in the crowd aimed his purple wand, which was the wand of Desire, at him.

A beam of magical light emitted from the diamond at the end of the Wand of Desire, striking Tom in the chest. However, the strange, dark, corruptive powers of the Wand of Desire could not do what they were supposed to, since Tom was holding his own wand in his hand. The Wand of Muscle Growth reacted to the dark forces of the Wand of desire, and there was a flash of light followed by a loud BANG!

A loud explosion forced Tom to fly through the air and tumble a few feet away. The explosion made everyone fall over, including the mysterious figure.

After a few seconds, Tom slowly woke up and he got back on his feet. As people recovered from the blast and looked around, they began to notice something strange about Tom.

Tom’s body started to react to the combination of the powers from the two wands as they came together in his body: He began to grow larger and and gain more muscle, very rapidly!

A very bright, blue aura of light surrounded and engulfed Tom’s entire body as he started to grow bigger and taller, enlarging to 15… 20…. 25 feet tall within just a few seconds!

“Uhhh…. UUUUHHHHH!!” Tom moaned loudly, as his muscles burst out of his gym clothes! His mighty chest ripped apart his shirt while his arms burst apart his sleeves. Mighty, thick and large legs blew away his gym shorts as every part of him grew to gigantic proportions!

Suddenly, Tom was almost touching the 30-foot ceiling with his head! All the gym patrons ran out of the weight room, screaming loudly, as the giant boy stumbled through the room, trampling weights and machines with his giant feet!

The giant, Hulking boy then stumbled towards the small door as he smashed through the wall, leaving bent steel, crumbling stones and smashed concrete and bricks behind.

The giant, teenage muscle God steps outside and lets out a mighty roar, before he stumbles towards the city, leaving the gym patrons standing there, absolutely terrified. In the meantime, a mysterious figure is watching from a distance and he is very pleased…

155.content:
Tom decided to go outside and actually talk to Alex without shouting from the window.

He picked up the wand and run down the stairs, almost bumping into his younger brother on the way down, who started shouting at him that their mother would scold him if she finds out he was running down the stairs. Then walked outside and looked at Alex's direction. He was just finishing mowing the lawn and was about to stop and go inside the house.

Tom rushed to Alex and stood behind him. He hadn't been spotted yet. Alex was too focused on the music playing on his earphones and he only just stopped the lawnmower.

"This is the perfect opportunity", Tom thought and prepared to tap Alex on the shoulder.

He just took a second to look at his friend's body. And Alex wasn't hiding much since he was doing the yard-work shirtless. His body was sweaty, his back looked toned but you wouldn't call it muscular, same for his shoulders and arms.

Alex had just started drying himself and had grabbed a bottle of ice cold water when Tom decided to act.

With the wand in his right hand Tom tapped Alex's shoulder.

That moment it felt like time froze, then Alex started to grow.
First his shoulder, it started bulging, getting bigger and rounder. Then the growth moved to his back, muscles started popping all over it, growing and making everything thicker, and at the same time much much wider. His small waist tightened more but then the growth reached his legs.

Tom was speechless, the wand actually worked and he made his best friend bigger. He was still growing!

His gaze was following the growth, noticing how Alex's glutes started blowing up, becoming thick and round masses of muscle. Tom wanted to feel them, see how hard they were, but held himself from doing so. Then Alex's thighs grew, muscles popping up around them, making them into thick muscular pillars of power.

Tom looked up, he was following the growth move down Alex's body that he hadn't noticed his friend was now taller as well.

Alex's arms look phenomenal, they had grown while Tom wasn't looking. Ripped cords of muscles now decorated them along with thick veins. And he hadn't see Alex's front yet...

Just then time seemed to resume.

"Huh? Oh it's you Tom. You surprised me there buddy", Alex said as he turned around and saw him.

Tom didn't say a thing.. he was still taking in all that had happened before his eyes.

"Is everything okay ?", Alex said with a worried tone in his voice.

Tom looked up and saw Alex's torso, now he could see the front of the masterpiece his friend's body had before. Thick, meaty pecs and a cobblestone row of eight abs were now popping out on his once flat torso.

"Yes.. Yes! Yes. Everything is okay", Tom replied to Alex. He wasn't really sure what happened, it was really cool, but he didn't know how to explain it to his friend.

Then a thought flashed in his mind, did Alex notice?

"Ah okay, I was just worried a bit there, little man.", Alex said.

"Little man?", Tom thought. So, Alex was not aware of what had happened?

Just then another idea popped in his mind. Alex had turned his back again finishing drying off the sweat, then Tom with the wand still in his right hand...
155.title: He decides to walk outside and just tap Alex on...

info.brief_description: A teen finds a wand that causes amazing muscular growth! Who does he use it on?
info.description:
A 14-year-old boy named Tom was told to clean out the attic by his parents when he discovers an old dusty box hidden in the back of the attic, buried there for decades. He brings the box down and opens it, to find a wand, covered in a nice linen cloth. An old note which comes with the wand simply states that pointing the wand at someone will cause muscular growth!

How much fun can a boy have with a wand, which can cause muscles to grow on anyone? Also, the longer this wand is pointed at someone, the bigger the muscles grow until the person becomes "maxed out" with muscle. Pointing the wand at this person again will cause the reverse to happen and his or her muscles will decrease. The wand works on males and females, children and adults, and people of all ages, races, and ethnic origins.

The holder of the wand may also stand before a mirror and point the wand at his or her reflection in order to cause muscle growth in himself or herself by having the ray from the wand bounce off the mirror.

Tom has a few friends and a girlfriend. You may also add other characters. No vore, no severe foil languages, are allowed.

****Chapters of only one line will be deleted at my discretion.****

300 GP's awarded for good chapters of 100 words or longer which follow the rules of standard punctuation, grammar and this story intro.

HAVE FUN!

*****NEW RULES FOR CHAPTERS ADDED IN 2012*****
1. Since Tom is the main character in the story, he should be in every chapter.
2. Tom becomes the Master and Owner of the wand. He always carries the wand with him.
3. The wand ONLY works for TOM and nobody else. If anyone else tries to use the wand, it doesn't work. This is because Tom was the first one to discover the wand in many years, therefore the wand will ONLY work on him.
4. Nobody can take the wand away from Tom. If they do, then Tom can wish for the wand to come back to him. The wand disappears and pops up in Tom's hand. Tom can never "lose" the wand, it is "bound" to him and him alone.

These new rules should make the story even more fun!

Please email me if you have questions.
